[\[1a\]]
[\[1a.1\]{D3846}]@#/_/bstan bcos bzhi brgya pa zhes bya ba'i tshig le'ur byas pa bzhugs so/_/[#]
[\[1b\]]
[\[1b.1\]]@##/_/rgya gar skad du/_tsa tuHsha ta ka shAs+t+rA [#]kA ri kA nA ma/_bod skad du/_bstan bcos bzhi brgya pa zhes bya ba'i tshig le'ur byas pa/_'phags pa 'jam dpal la phyag 'tshal
[\[1b.2\]]lo/_/gang la 'jig rten gsum mnga' bdag_/rang nyid 'chi bdag byed po med/_/yong nges [#]rnal bzhin gnyid log na/_/de las ma rungs gzhan ci yod/_/'chi bar bya
[\[1b.3\]]phyir skyes gyur cing /_/gzhan dbang 'gro ba'i ngang can la/_/'chi ba bya ba ltar snang ste/_/gson pa bya ba min ltar ro/_/khyod kyis 'das dus thung ngu ltar/_/mthong zhing ma
[\[1b.4\]]'ongs gzhan du na/_/khyod mnyam mi mnyam ltar sems de[#]/_/gsal bar 'jigs pa'i 'o dod 'dra/_/gzhan dag la yang spyi mthun phyir/_/khyod la 'chi ba'i 'jigs med na/_/
[\[1b.5\]]gcig la gnod gang de phrag dog_/sgo nas sdug bsngal skyed [#]'gyur ram/_/nad bcos rga ba gso bya des/_/de dag la khyod mi 'jigs mod/_/chad pa phyi ma bcor med pas/_/
[\[2a\]]
[\[2a.1\]]khyod ches gsal bar de la 'jigs/_/gsad par bya ba'i phyugs rnams ltar/_/'chi ba kun gyi thun mong zhing /_/gzhan yang 'chi bar snang gyur [#]na/_/khyod la 'chi bdag 'jigs cis
[\[2a.2\]]med/_/dus la nges pa med pa'i phyir/_/bdag rtag snyam du sems na [#]ni/_/nam zhig dus na 'chi bdag gis/_/khyod la gnod pa byed par 'gyur/_/ma 'ongs pa yi don lta zhing /_/gson pa zad pa ma yin na/_/
[\[2a.3\]]bdag nyid 'tshong la bdag nyid ni/_/rnam dpyod ldan zhes [#]su zhig smra/_/bdag nyid gta' mar bzhag byas te/_/sdig las ci yi phyir na byed/_/nges par khyod ni mkhas rnams ltar/_/bdag la 'dod chags
[\[2a.4\]]bral bar zad/_/su la'ang gson pa zhes bya ba/_/sems kyi skad cig las gzhan med/_/skye bos de nges mi rig pa/_/des na bdag nyid shes pa dkon/_/khyod ring gson pa la dga' zhing /_/rgan
[\[2a.5\]]nyid la khyod mi dga' na/_/e ma khyod spyod skye bo ni/_/'dra la dam pa lta bur snang [#]/_/khyod rang 'chi la mya ngan na/_/bu sogs rnams phyir ci ste yin/_/rang nyid spyo bya smra po ni/_/ci lta bur na smad mi
[\[2b\]]
[\[2b.1\]]'gyur/_/gang tshe 'ga' zhig ma bcol bar/_/rang nyid bur gyur de yi tshe/_/ma dris nyid du de 'gro ba/_/rigs [#]par mi 'gyur ma yin no/_/gti mug phyir na bu yi ni/_/rnam par [#]rtog pa med par zad/_/'di yi 'gro bar spro ba nyid/_/rgas pas [#]
[\[2b.2\]]ston par byed par 'gyur/_/ji ltar pha la bu sdug pa/_/de ltar de la skye ma yin/_/'jig rten 'di ni 'og tu 'gro/_/de phyir mtho ris kyang rnyed dka'/_/gang tshe rjes su mi mthun pa/_/'ga' yang sdug ces bya yod min/_/de tshe chags pa 'tshong [#]dang
[\[2b.3\]]ni/_/'dra ba 'ba' zhig skye bar zad/_/bral bas bskyed pa'i sdug bsngal ni/_/mi rnams snying las myur ldog ste/_/chags la'ang sdug bsngal bral ba yis/_/mtshon pa'i mi brtan pa nyid ltos/_/gnod pas gzir ba [#]byas zin kyang /_/yon tan med
[\[2b.4\]]snyam shes bzhin du/_/khyod bdag nyid la phyi 'chos [#]'gyur/_/de yang bdag la mi rigs so/_/sdug bsngal rnam par 'ged lta bur[#]/_/'jig rten 'di ni yongs su 'khyam/_/sdug bsngal gyur pa'i skye bo la/_/sdug bsngal 'ged pas ci zhig bya/_/gang
[\[2b.5\]]gi [#]'du ba dga' yin de'i/_/'bral ba ci ltar dga' ma yin/_/'du ba dang ni 'bral ba dag_/lhan cig rgyu bar snang min nam/_/'das la thog ma yod min la/_/ma 'ongs tha ma yod min na/_/cis na khyod kyis 'du mthong zhing /_/ring por gyur
[\[2b.6\]]kyang bral [#]ba min/_/skad cig la sogs dus de rnams/_/nges par dgra dang 'drar 'gyur te/_/des na dgrar gyur de dag la/_/rnam kun khyod 'dod chags mi bya/_/blo ngan bral ba'i 'jigs pa yis/_/khyim nas nges par mi 'byung na/_/mkhas pa
[\[2b.7\]]su zhig nges par ni/_/bya dgos chad pas byed par 'gyur/_/khyod 'di byas nas gsal bar ni/_/nags su 'gro bya snyam sems na/_/gang zhig byas kyang gtang [#]bya ba/_/de byas yon tan ci zhig yod/_/bdag ni 'chi'o snyam sems pa/_/gang la nges par
[\[3a\]]
[\[3a.1\]]yod gyur pa/_/de ni chags pa yongs btang phyir/_/'chi bdag la yang ga la 'jigs/_/byang chub sems dpa'i rnal 'byor spyod pa bzhi brgya pa las rtag par 'dzin pa spang ba'i thabs bstan pa ste rab tu byed pa dang po'o//_//
[\[3a.2\]]lus ni dgra ltar mthong mod kyi/_/de lta na yang de bsrung bya[#]/_/khrims ldan yun ring 'tsho ba ni/_/de las bsod nams chen po byed/_/mi rnams sdug bsngal lus nyid las/_/skye zhing bde ba gzhan las na/_/sdug bsngal kun gyi snod gyur pa/_/khog
[\[3a.3\]]pa la khyod ci ste gus/_/gang tshe bde ba sdug bsngal ltar/_/shas cher mi la mi 'byung na/_/de ltar sdug bsngal chen po de/_/chung ngo snyam du sems byed dam/_/'jig rten bde la mngon phyogs shing /_/bde gyur dag kyang rnyed dka' ste/_/des na skye bo
[\[3a.4\]]'jig 'di la/_/sdug bsngal rjes su snyegs pa 'dra/_/sdug bsngal 'dod pas rnyed 'gyur gyi/_/'dod pas bde ba ga la yin/_/khyod cis dkon pa la gus shing /_/mod la ci ste khyod mi 'jigs/_/bde bar gyur pa'i lus po ni/_/sdug bsngal
[\[3a.5\]]snod du 'gyur ba de[#]/_/lus la gus dang dgra la gus/_/de dag gnyis ni mtshungs par snang /_/lus ni shin tu 'gor bas kyang /_/bde ba'i bdag tu mi 'gyur te/_/rang bzhin gzhan gyis zil gnon ces/_/bya ba [#]rigs pa ma yin no/_/mchog la yid
[\[3a.6\]]kyi sdug bsngal te/_/tha ma [#]rnams la lus skyes so/_/sdug bsngal gnyis kyis 'jig rten 'di/_/nyin re nyin re 'joms par byed/_/bde ba rtog pa'i dbang gyur cing /_/rtog pa sdug bsngal dbang gyur pa/_/de phyir kun na sdug bsngal las/_/shin tu
[\[3a.7\]]stobs ldan ci yang med/_/ji lta ji ltar dus 'gro ba/_/de lta de ltar sdug bsngal 'phel/_/de phyir bde ba lus 'di yi/_/gzhan po lta bur snang bar 'gyur/_/sdug bsngal gyi ni rgyu mang po/_/nad rnams dang gzhan snang gyur pa/_/de snyed [#]du ni mi rnams la/_/
[\[3b\]]
[\[3b.1\]]bde ba'i rgyu dag snang ma yin/_/'phel bzhin pa yi bde ba las[#]/_/ji ltar bzlog pa mthong gyur pa[#]/_/de ltar sdug bsngal 'phel bzhin las[#]/_/bzlog pa yod pa ma yin no/_/rkyen dang lhan cig bde ba las[#]/_/bzlog pa mthong gi [#]sdug bsngal la/_/
[\[3b.2\]]rkyen rnams nyid dang lhan cig tu/_/bzlog pa yod pa ma yin no/_/khyod 'chi bzhin la dus song zhing /_/'gro ba dang ni 'gror 'gyur na/_/'chi bzhin pa ni bde 'gyur zhes/_/rnam pa kun tu [#]rigs ma yin/_/lus can rnams la bkres sogs
[\[3b.3\]]kyi[#]/_/gnod pa rtag tu yod gyur [#]na/_/gnod bzhin pa ni bde'o zhes/_/rnam pa kun tu [#]rigs ma yin/_/nus pa med pas 'byung kun la/_/tshogs pa zhes bya skye 'gyur te/_/'gal ba rnams la bde'o zhes/_/rnam pa kun tu mi rigs so/_/
[\[3b.4\]]grang sogs rnams la phyir 'chos pa[#]/_/rtag tu yod pa ma yin na/_/brlag bzhin pa ni bde'o zhes/_/rnam pa kun tu [#]rigs ma yin/_/'bad stsol [#]med par spyod pa zhes/_/bya 'ga'ang sa stengs [#]yod min na/_/las byed bde ba yin no zhes/_/rnam
[\[3b.5\]]pa kun tu [#]mi rigs so/_/'di dang gzhan du bdag nyid ni/_/rtag tu sdig las bsrung bar bya/_/ngan 'gro yod na bde ba zhes/_/rnam pa kun tu rigs ma yin/_/gzhon [#]pa sogs la mi rnams kyi/_/bde ba rtag tu yod min te/_/dang por gang la rtsom med
[\[3b.6\]]pa/_/de la mthar 'phel ga la yod/_/gser gyi snod du skyug pa la[#]/_/ji ltar 'ga' zhig dgar [#]'gyur ba/_/de bzhin sdug bsngal phyir bcos pa[#]/_/bde'o snyam du sems par byed/_/brtsams [#]pas skyes pa ldog 'gyur na/_/sdug bsngal rtsom pa'ang [#]
[\[3b.7\]]bde ci yod/_/de phyir thub pas skye 'jig dag_/sdug bsngal yin zhes gsungs pa snyam/_/so so'i skye bos sdug bsngal ni/_/bde bas g.yogs ltar mi mthong na/_/gang gis sdug bsngal sgrib 'gyur ba/_/bde ba zhes bya ci yang med/_/khyod sdug chags
[\[4a\]]
[\[4a.1\]]bral med do zhes/_/so so'i skye bo bstan bya des/_/nges par de bzhin gshegs rnams kyis/_/gti mug kun gyi tha mar gsungs/_/mi rtag pa la nges par gnod/_/gang la gnod yod de bde min/_/de phyir mi rtag gang yin pa/_/thams
[\[4a.2\]]cad sdug bsngal zhes byar 'gyur/_/rnal 'byor spyod pa bzhi brgya pa las bde bar 'dzin pa spang ba'i thabs bstan pa ste rab tu byed pa gnyis pa'o//_//yun ni shin tu ring pos kyang /_/yul la mur thug yod min te/_/sman pa ngan ltar khyod yul [#]la/_/
[\[4a.3\]]ngal ba 'bras bu med pa 'byung /_/bsten par byed pa 'ga' zhig la/_/sa sred ldog pa med ji bzhin/_/bsten [#]bzhin pa yi mi rnams la/_/'dod re 'phel ba'ang [#]de bzhin no/_/bud med kun la 'khrig pa la/_/tha dad cung zad yod min zhing /_/gzugs gzhan gyi
[\[4a.4\]]yang longs spyod na/_/khyod la mo mchog gis ci byed/_/gang la gang yid 'ong 'gyur ba[#]/_/de ni de yis 'tshengs par rlom/_/khyi sogs rnams la'ang thun mong pas/_/blo gros ngan pa khyod ci [#]chags/_/khyed [#]la yan lag kun mdzes mo/_/gang de [#]sngar kun
[\[4a.5\]]thun mong na/_/de rnyed [#]khyod la ngo mtshar ltar/_/ji ltar yang ni 'gyur ba min/_/yon tan ldan pa sdug pa dang /_/bzlog pa la ni bzlog mthong nas[#]/_/rnam par gnas med snga ma'am/_/cig shos las ni gang zhig bden/_/blun po'i 'dod chags yon tan dang /_/
[\[4a.6\]]ldan pa 'ba' zhig la mi skye/_/rgyu med pa las [#]'jug rnams kyi/_/ldog pa rgyu las ga la zhig[# ]/ji srid gzhan shes ma gyur na[#]/_/de srid de ni khyo la sdug[# ]/nad ngan dang mtshungs bud med ni/_/rtag tu rkyen las bsrung bar bya/_/dar mar rang gis byas pa gang /_/
[\[4a.7\]]de ni rgan por [#]mi 'dod na/_/ji lta bur na grol ba rnams/_/de la shin tu gdung mi 'gyur/_/ma chags pa la bde med cing /_/de yang blun min la med na/_/gang yid rtag tu phyir phyogs pa/_/de yi bde ba ci 'dra zhig_/khyod la gus bzhin rtag par ni/_/mo dang lhan
[\[4b\]]
[\[4b.1\]]cig phrad pa med/_/'di nga [#]gzhan gyi ma yin zhes/_/yongs 'dzin 'di ko ci zhig yin/_/gal te 'dod chags bde yin na/_/bud med dag gis dgos med 'gyur/_/bde ba dor bya zhes bya bar/_/ji ltar yang ni ma [#]mthong ngo /_/bud med lhan cig sbyor na yang [#]/_/
[\[4b.2\]]bde ba gzhan las skye 'gyur na/_/de rgyu mdza' mo nyid yin zhes/_/blun po min pa su zhig 'dzin/_/mdze po 'phrug bzhin 'dod chags kyis/_/mdongs [#]pas 'dod pa'i skyon mi mthong /_/chags bral rnams la mdze po ltar/_/chags can sdug bsngal ldan par
[\[4b.3\]]snang /_/mgon med bkres pas nyen rnams la/_/mu ger bya ba gang 'byung [#]ba/_/de ni bud med phrad pa'i tshe/_/sems [#]can kun gyi [#]g.yo ba yin/_/dregs pa yis ni kha cig la/_/bshang khang la yang chags skye zhing /_/bud med la la la chags pa/_/'ga'
[\[4b.4\]]zhig 'ga' la phrag dog byed/_/mi gtsang ba la gti mug ni/_/'byung zhing khro ba 'byung rigs kyi/_/rnam pa kun tu 'dod chags ni/_/'byung bar rigs pa ma yin no/_/mi rnams ma gtogs mi gtsang ba'i/_/snod ni smad par 'byung 'gyur na/_/gang la [#]mi
[\[4b.5\]]gtsang 'byung 'gyur ba/_/de ni smad par cis mi sems/_/dngos po gtsang ba thams cad kyi/_/tha ma gang du dmigs gyur pa[#]/_/de la gtsang ba yod do zhes/_/blo ldan mi ni su [#]zhig smra/_/gang zhig bshang khang nang 'dug cing /_/de med par ni mi gnas par[#]/_/
[\[4b.6\]]mi gtsang ba yi srin de la/_/rmongs las dregs pa skye bar zad/_/thabs gang gis kyang lus kyi ni/_/nang phugs gtsang bar [#]mi 'gyur na/_/khyod ni nang la 'bad byed pa/_/de ltar phyi rol la ma yin/_/gal te mdze can bzhin de ltar/_/gcin can kun la
[\[4b.7\]]mtshungs min na/_/mdze can ji bzhin gcin can de/_/de ltar mi kun gyis spong 'gyur/_/yan lag nyams pa 'ga' zhig ni/_/sna yi tshab mas dag 'gyur [#]ltar/_/mi gtsang phyir 'chos [#]me tog la/_/sogs pa [#]'dod chags de bzhin 'dod/_/gang du 'dod
[\[5a\]]
[\[5a.1\]]chags bral skye ba/_/de gtsang zhes byar mi rigs la/_/nges par 'dod chags rgyur gyur pa'i/_/dngos de gang na'ang [#]yod ma yin/_/mdor na mi rtag mi gtsang dang /_/sdug bsngal ba dang bdag med ces/_/bya ba bzhi po thams cad ni/_/gcig
[\[5a.2\]]nyid la ni srid par 'gyur/_/byang chub sems dpa'i [#]rnal 'byor spyod pa bzhi brgya pa las gtsang bar 'dzin pa phyin ci log [#]spang ba'i thabs bstan pa ste rab tu byed pa gsum pa'o//_//bdag gam bdag gi [#]snyam dregs pa/_/srid par dam pa su la
[\[5a.3\]]'gyur/_/gang phyir lus can thams cad la/_/yul rnams thams cad mtshungs phyir ro/_/tshogs bran drug chos stabs [#]gyur pa/_/khyod kyi dregs pa ci zhig yin/_/gang ngam de ru bya ba ni/_/dbang du byas la [#]rag las 'gyur/_/ji ltar gso bya 'thob
[\[5a.4\]]thob pa/_/rje bo gtong por [#]sems de bzhin/_/rje bo sbyin bya byin byas nas/_/bdag ni gtong ba po snyam rlom/_/gzhan rnams kyis ni [#]sdug bsngal gnas/_/khyod la phyin ci log tu dran/_/gzhan gyi las kyis 'tsho khyod kyi/_/dga' ba gang gis bskyed
[\[5a.5\]]par 'gyur/_/'jig rten gyi ni bsrung po dang /_/bsrung byar sa bdag snang gyur na/_/ci ste gcig gis dregs yod cing /_/ci ste gzhan gyi dregs bral min/_/rigs kun nang nas rang las la/_/dga' bas 'tsho rnams rnyed pa dka'/_/gal te khyod la mi
[\[5a.6\]]dger 'gyur/_/des na khyod la 'gro bzang dkon/_/gzhan gyis bskul [#]te byed pa gang /_/de ni sa stengs [#]blun zhes bya/_/khyod dang mtshungs pa'i gzhan dbang gzhan/_/'ga' yang yod pa ma yin no/_/bsrung ba nga la rag las zhes/_/'jig rten la ni
[\[5a.7\]]gla [#]len zhing /_/rang nyid kyis kyang sdig byed na/_/de mtshungs brtse med su zhig yod/_/skye bo sdig to byed rnams la/_/gal te brtse ba bya min na/_/byis pa so so'i skye bo ni/_/thams cad bsrung byar mi 'gyur ro/_/bdag nyid dga' ba skyed [#]pa yi/_/rgyu ni
[\[5b\]]
[\[5b.1\]]gang du med [#]mi 'gyur/_/lung la sogs pa'i rgyu rnams kyis[#]/_/bsod nams min pa'ang [#]'jig yod min/_/yang dag srung [#]byed ces bya ba/_/gal te sa bdag chos yin na/_/nyon mongs gzo mkhan rnams la yang /_/ci ste chos su 'gyur ma yin/_/'jig
[\[5b.2\]]rten sa bdag rag las kyi/_/sa bdag de ni smad de dper/_/dam pas 'jig rten kun gyi ma/_/srid pa yi ni srid [#]pa bzhin/_/blun min rgyal srid mi thob la/_/blun la brtse ba yod min na/_/bsrung po yin yang mi yi bdag_/brtse ba med la [#]chos mi gnas/_/
[\[5b.3\]]drang srong rnams kyi spyod pa kun/_/mkhas pas byed pa ma yin te/_/gang gi phyir na de dag la/_/dman 'bring khyad 'phags yod phyir ro/_/sngar gyi sa bdag dge rnams kyis[#]/_/'jig rten bu ltar [#]bskyangs pa de/_/rtsod dus chos la brten rnams kyis[#]/_/deng
[\[5b.4\]]sang ri dgas dgon par byas/_/glags su bsnun [#]pa'i rgyal po la/_/gal te sdig pa yod min na/_/rkun po gzhan rnams la yang de/_/dang po nyid du yod ma yin/_/chang sogs dag la bdog pa kun/_/yongs gtong mchod pa ma yin na/_/g.yul
[\[5b.5\]]ngor bdag kyang yongs gtong ba[#]/_/mchod pa snyam du sems sam ci/_/rgyal po 'jig rten mgon khyod la/_/mgon 'ga' [#]yod pa ma yin na/_/mgon nyid de yis [#]bdag nyid ni[#]/_/ma btang su zhig dga' bar 'gyur/_/rgyal po shi bar gyur pa la'ang /_/
[\[5b.6\]]grags pas yon tan 'ga' mi 'byung /_/khyod yon med dang khyi 'tshed la/_/grags pa chen po ci ste med/_/gang tshe kun gyi dbang phyug nyid/_/bsod nams kyis bskyed de yi tshe/_/'di ni dbang phyug rten min zhes/_/brjod pa [#]rnyed pa ma yin no/_/'tsho ba'i
[\[5b.7\]]thabs so cog la yang /_/'jig rten na ni rigs zhes bsnyad/_/des na sems can thams cad la/_/rigs las [#]dbye ba yod ma yin/_/'das dus shin tu ring ba dang /_/mi mo rnams yid g.yo ba ste/_/de [#]phyir rgyal rigs zhes bya ba/_/rigs las 'ga'
[\[6a\]]
[\[6a.1\]]yang yod ma yin/_/gal te las kyis dmangs rigs kyang /_/rgyal rigs zhes byar 'gyur na ni/_/las kyis dmangs kyang bram zer ni/_/gang gis 'gyur ba min par sems/_/rgyal po [#]sdig la dbang phyug ltar/_/'geng ba [#]yod pa ma
[\[6a.2\]]yin na/_/gzhan gyi don du mkhas pa ni/_/su zhig phyi mar 'joms par byed/_/dbang phyug gis bskyed nga rgyal ni/_/mnyam dang khyad par 'phags pa yi/_/pha rol nus ldan blta bya ste/_/dam pa'i snying la mi gnas so/_/rnal 'byor spyod pa bzhi brgya pa las
[\[6a.3\]]bdag tu 'dzin pa spang ba'i thabs bstan pa ste rab tu byed pa bzhi pa'o//_//sangs rgyas rnams kyi g.yo ba ni/_/rgyu med 'ga' [#]yang yod min te/_/dbugs kyang sems can rnams la ni/_/sman slad kho nar yang dag 'byung /_/'jig rten kun la
[\[6a.4\]]'chi bdag sgra[#]/_/ji ltar 'jigs pa skyed [#]'gyur ba/_/de bzhin kun mkhyen sgra [#]'di ni/_/'chi bdag la yang 'jigs pa bskyed/_/thub la [#]mdzad dang mdzad min dang /_/gsung bya gsung bya min mnga' ba/_/des na kun mkhyen kun mkhyen ni/_/min zhes bya [#]
[\[6a.5\]]la rgyu ci yod/_/sems ma rtogs pa [#]'gro sogs la/_/gang phyir bsod nams la sogs pa[#]/_/ma mthong de phyir las kun la/_/yid ni don por bsgrub par bya/_/bsam pas byang chub sems dpa' la/_/dge [#]'am 'on te mi dge [#]rung /_/thams cad dge
[\[6a.6\]]legs nyid 'gyur te/_/gang phyir yid de'i dbang gyur phyir/_/byang chub sems dpa' sems dang po/_/sa stengs [#]skye bo thams cad ni/_/'khor los sgyur ba nyid 'gyur ba/_/de dag bsod nams las khyad 'phags/_/rin chen rang bzhin mchod rten ni/_/
[\[6a.7\]]'jig rten rnyed mtho 'gas byas pa/_/de bas sems bskyed bcug [#]'dul po/_/mchog tu bkrabs par brjod pa yin/_/de la phan 'dod bla ma yis/_/slob ma la ni sri [#]zhu bya/_/gang phyir nges [#]phan mi shes pa/_/de phyir slob ma zhes bya'o/_/khro yang
[\[6b\]]
[\[6b.1\]]'byung bos bzung ba la/_/sman pa 'khrug pa min pa ltar/_/thub pa nyon mongs dgrar gzigs kyi/_/nyon mongs dang 'brel gang zag min/_/gang zhig gang gang la dga' ba/_/de yis [#]de de sngar dpyad [#]bya/_/nyams par gyur pa dam chos kyi/_/snod ni cis
[\[6b.2\]]kyang ma yin no/_/ji ltar ma ni khyad par du/_/nad thebs bu la gdung 'gyur ba[#]/_/de bzhin byang chub sems dpa'i brtse/_/dam pa min la khyad par du'o/_/la la'i slob mar 'gyur ba [#]ste/_/la la yi ni bla mar 'gyur/_/thabs rig [#]sna tshogs thabs
[\[6b.3\]]kyis ni/_/ma rtogs sems can rtogs par byed/_/ji ltar sman pa mkhas gyur pas/_/nad pa sgrub [#]med dkon de bzhin/_/byang chub sems dpa'i [#]stobs rnyed nas/_/gdul bya ma yin shin tu dkon/_/byang chub sems dpa'i yul du ni/_/gal te
[\[6b.4\]]'ga' zhig ma bskul bas[#]/_/ngan song 'gro bar 'gyur na de/_/blo ldan gzhan gyi [#]smad byar 'gyur/_/gang zhig nyen pa gzhan dag la/_/snying brtse legs zhes mi 'dod pa/_/de rjes brtse bas mgon med pa/_/dag la ji ltar sbyin pa gtong /_/'gro
[\[6b.5\]]la phan phyir gang zhig la/_/'jig rten srid du gnas yod pa/_/de la sor gnas dag phung na/_/sdang la bsam thag [#]ci zhig yod/_/gang la skye ba thams cad du/_/mngon shes lnga char yang yod pa/_/de yi dman par [#]dman lta'i dngos/_/'di ni
[\[6b.6\]]shin tu bya dka' ba'o/_/thabs kyis kun tshe bsod nams gang /_/shin tu yun ring bsags pa de/_/thams cad mkhyen pa'i gzhal bya yang /_/min zhes de bzhin gshegs pas gsungs/_/'chi dang chos dang srid pa gzhan/_/sbyin pa'i sgra yis gsal
[\[6b.7\]]byed pa/_/de phyir byang chub sems dpa' la/_/sbyin pa'i sgra ni rtag tu snyan/_/'dir byin pa yi sbyin pa las/_/'bras bu chen po 'byung 'gyur zhes/_/len dang yongs su gtong ba ni/_/tshong spogs [#]bzhin du smad par 'gyur/_/gang la sngar byas sdig pa yang /_/
[\[7a\]]
[\[7a.1\]]yod nyid yod pa ma yin pa/_/dge ba'i las can de la ni/_/bsgrub min zhes bya yod ma yin/_/rlabs chen yid can de la ni/_/'di na'ang gnod pa yod min te/_/des na de la srid pa dang /_/mya ngan 'das la khyad par med/_/gang
[\[7a.2\]]la kun tshe sems dbang ni/_/nyid las [#]skye ba yod gyur pa/_/de ko rgyu cis 'jig rten ni/_/kun gyi mnga' bdag 'gyur ma yin/_/phul 'gro las ches phul 'gro ba/_/'ga' zhig 'jig rten 'dir yang snang /_/des na bsam mi khyab mthu yang /_/nges par
[\[7a.3\]]yod ces rtogs par gyis/_/blun la shin tu zab chos la/_/skrag pa skye ba ji lta ba/_/de bzhin zhan [#]la shin tu ni/_/rmad byung chos la skrag pa skye/_/rnal 'byor spyod pa bzhi brgya pa las byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa bstan pa ste rab tu byed pa lnga pa'o//_//
[\[7a.4\]]bde bas 'dod chags 'phel 'gyur zhing /_/sdug pas khro ba 'phel 'gyur na/_/cis bde dka' thub can min zhing /_/sdug pa dka' thub can cis yin/_/'dod chags las ni sdud pa ste/_/khro ba'i las ni rtsod pa'o/_/'byung ba kun la rlung bzhin du/_/
[\[7a.5\]]gti mug las ni gsos 'debs so[#]/_/ma phrad pa las [#]'dod chags ni/_/sdug bsngal spungs med las khro sdug_/yongs mi shes las gti mug ste/_/de dag gis de dag mi rtogs[#]/_/ji ltar bad kan la mkhris dang /_/lhan cig phrad pa med mthong ba/_/de
[\[7a.6\]]bzhin khro la 'dod chags dang /_/lhan cig phrad pa med par mthong /_/'dod chags bran bzhin bkol bya ste/_/gang phyir mi phangs de'i sman phyir/_/khro la rje bo bzhin lta ste/_/de'i [#]sman phangs pa yin phyir ro/_/dang por gti mug yang dag 'byung /_/bar du
[\[7a.7\]]khro ba 'byung 'gyur [#]zhing /_/phyis ni 'dod chags 'byung ba ste/_/nyin la rim pa gsum du'o/_/'dod chags mdza' min mdza' 'dra ba/_/des de la khyod mi 'jigs te/_/mi phan mdza' bo khyad par du/_/skyes bus spang bar bya min nam/_/'dod chags
[\[7b\]]
[\[7b.1\]]rgyu las skye 'gyur zhing /_/rkyen las kyang ni skye ba ste/_/'dod chags rkyen las skye ba gang /_/de ni sgrub sla cig shos min/_/khro ba brtan [#]zhing nges par ni/_/mi dge nyes chen byed pa ste/_/de [#]ltar rnam kun dbye shes pas/_/nyon mongs rnam [#]mthar byed par 'gyur/_/
[\[7b.2\]]lus la lus dbang ji bzhin du/_/gti mug kun la gnas gyur te/_/de phyir nyon mongs thams cad kyang /_/gti mug bcom pas bcom par 'gyur/_/rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba ni/_/mthong na gti mug 'byung mi 'gyur/_/de phyir 'bad pas [#]kun
[\[7b.3\]]gyis 'dir/_/gtam de kho na [#]bsnyad par bya/_/rtag tu sa 'dzin sogs dga' la/_/gtong po za po gtsang zhing 'gyur/_/de 'dra la sogs mtshan nyid rnams/_/'dod chags can gyi mi la snang /_/sangs rgyas rnams kyis chags can la/_/zas dang
[\[7b.4\]]chos gos gtsug lag khang /_/dge legs spangs [#]pa thams cad dang /_/rtag tu bla ma'i thad gnas [#]gsungs/_/nus med la khros bdag nyid la/_/mdog mi sdug pa 'ba' zhig byed/_/nus pa gang la'ang brtse med pa[#]/_/de ni tha chad ces byar brjod/_/
[\[7b.5\]]yid du mi 'ong ba yi sgra/_/sngar byas sdig mthar byed par brjod/_/rmongs shing dam pa ma yin pa/_/bdag nyid rnam par dag mi 'dod/_/snyan pa yid du mi 'ong ba[#]/_/ngo bo nyid kyis gnod mi byed/_/de phyir rnam rtog las byung ba/_/gzhan las yin no snyam du
[\[7b.6\]]rlom/_/ji ltar gshe ba po la ni/_/chad par bya ba mngon brjod pa/_/de bzhin snyan par [#]smra po la/_/mchod par bya ba [#]cis mi 'gyur/_/khyod kyis smad bya ma smras kyang /_/gal te gzhan gyis shes na [#]ni/_/smra po la khro mi rigs na/_/yang dag min smra la ci smos/_/
[\[7b.7\]]dman las mi snyan zhes bya ba/_/nges par 'byung ba ma yin te/_/de phyir dman byung [#]mi snyan pa/_/yan gar nyung zad lta bur snang /_/gzhan gnod byas pas bdag la ni/_/yon tan cung zad kyang med na/_/khyod khro yon tan med pa la/_/gus pa zhen pa rkyang bar
[\[8a\]]
[\[8a.1\]]zad/_/gal te bzod pas 'bad med par/_/bsod nams chen po thob 'gyur na/_/gang zhig de la gegs byed pa/_/de mtshungs blun po su zhig yod/_/khro ba zhes bya khyad par du/_/stobs ldan dag la skye mi 'gyur/_/des na gzhan
[\[8a.2\]]'joms khro ba la/_/ci nas khyod gus gyur ta re/_/gang zhig khro gnas la bzod pa/_/de la bsgom pa skye bar 'gyur/_/yon tan gnas la 'jigs zhes pa/_/khyod kyi blun pa 'ba' zhig yin/_/su zhig khyad bsad mthar byas nas/_/'jig rten
[\[8a.3\]]pha rol 'gro ba yod/_/de phyir bdag ni [#]sdig pa bas/_/brnyas pa legs so snyam du sems/_/gang gis rnam shes gnas la sogs/_/yang dag tu na rnam shes pa/_/de yod na ni nyon mongs rnams/_/nam yang blo gros la mi gnas/_/rnal 'byor
[\[8a.4\]]spyod pa bzhi brgya pa las nyon mongs pa spang ba'i [#]thabs bstan pa ste rab tu byed pa drug pa'o//_//sdug bsngal rgya mtsho 'di la mtha'/_/rnam pa kun tu'ang [#]yod min na/_/byis khyod 'dir ni bying ba la/_/'jigs pa cis na skye mi 'gyur/_/lang
[\[8a.5\]]tsho rgyab tu byung gyur nas/_/slar yang mdun du 'byung bar 'gyur/_/gnas kyang 'jig rten 'di la ni/_/'gros kyis 'gram [#]pa lta bur mngon/_/srid par khyod la rang 'dod kyis[#]/_/'gro ba gzhar [#]yang yod min na/_/gzhan gyi dbang dang 'jigs med par/_/
[\[8a.6\]]blo dang ldan par [#]su zhig 'gyur/_/ma 'ongs tha ma yod min zhing /_/kun tshe'ang so so'i skye bo ste/_/khyod 'das ji ltar [#]de bzhin du/_/de yang mi 'gyur de ltar byos/_/nyan po mnyan bya 'chad po rnams/_/'byung ba shin tu rnyed dka' ste/_/des na mdor na
[\[8a.7\]]'khor ba ni/_/mthar [#]med ma yin mtha' bcas min/_/phal mo cher na [#]mi rnams ni/_/dam pa ma yin phyogs yongs 'dzin/_/des na so so'i [#]skye bo rnams/_/phal cher nges par ngan 'gror 'gro/_/sa stengs [#]sdig pa'i rnam smin ni/_/co 'dri kho na yin par
[\[8b\]]
[\[8b.1\]]mthong /_/des na srid pa gsod gnas [#]dang /_/mtshungs par dam pa rnams la snang /_/rnam shes gnas pa med pa las/_/gal te smyon par 'gyur na ni/_/srid gnas smyon pa ma yin zhes/_/mkhas pa su zhig smra bar 'gyur/_/'gro la sogs pa'i sdug bsngal
[\[8b.2\]]dag[# ]/bzlog la nyams pa mthong gyur [#]te/_/des na las kun zad pa la/_/blo gros ldan pas [#]blo bskyed do/_/gang tshe 'bras bu gcig gi [#]yang /_/thog ma'i rgyu ni snang min pa/_/de tshe gcig la yang rgyas par/_/mthong nas gang la 'jigs mi 'byung /_/'bras
[\[8b.3\]]bu thams cad nges par ni/_/'grub par 'gyur ba ma yin zhing /_/grub la nges par mthar 'gyur na/_/de yi don du ci ste 'joms/_/las ni 'bad pas byed 'gyur zhing /_/byas zin 'bad pa med par 'jig_/de ltar gyur kyang khyod la ko/_/las la chags
[\[8b.4\]]bral 'ga' yod min/_/'das la bde ba yod min zhing /_/ma 'ongs pa la'ang yod min la/_/da [#]byung ba'ang 'gro nyid de/_/khyod kyi ngal [#]'di gang phyir yin/_/mkhas pa rnams la mtho ris kyang /_/dmyal ba [#]dang mtshungs 'jigs skyed [#]'gyur/_/rnam pa
[\[8b.5\]]kun tu de rnams la/_/srid gang 'jigs pa mi skyed [#]dkon/_/gal te byis pa'ang rnam kun tu/_/'khor ba'i sdug bsngal shes gyur na/_/skad cig de la sems dang ni/_/lhan cig gtan tu 'jig par 'gyur/_/sems can rlom pa can min dkon/_/rlom
[\[8b.6\]]can snying rje ldan pa med/_/des na snang nas snang bar ni/_/'gro ba shin tu rnyed dkar gsungs/_/'di na yul log [#]gyur pa la/_/yul ni dmigs par grags gyur te/_/phyin ci log tu gyur pa'i chos/_/rgyu ci zhig gis yang dag 'dod/_/bsod nams 'bras
[\[8b.7\]]bu phrug pa ste/_/de gzhan las ye [#]bsrung bya na/_/rtag tu gzhan las bsrung bya gang /_/de ni ji ltar bdag gir 'gyur/_/'jig rten tshul lugs gang dang gang /_/de dang de la chos rjes 'jug_/de yi phyir na chos pas kyang /_/'jig rten stobs ldan lta bur
[\[9a\]]
[\[9a.1\]]snang /_/yul ni dge bas [#]yid 'ong na/_/yul de'ang ngan par brtsi ba yin/_/gang zhig btang ba shis gyur pa[#]/_/de grub pa yis [#]ci zhig dgos/_/gang la bka' lung dgos med pa/_/de la chos don med par 'gyur/_/gang yang bka'
[\[9a.2\]]lung don gnyer nyid/_/de ni skye nang blun zhes bya/_/ma 'ongs pa yi 'bras mthong nas/_/chos 'dod chags pas khyod chags na/_/ma 'ongs mtha' nyid mthong gyur na[#]/_/'jigs pa med dam ci zhig byed/_/gla ba lta bu'i [#]bsod nams ni/_/rnam kun rngan
[\[9a.3\]]pa dang mtshungs 'gyur[#]/_/gang dag dge ba'ang mi [#]'dod pa/_/de dag mi dge ji ltar byed/_/gang gis 'gro ba 'khrul 'khor gyi[#]/_/tshogs 'dra sgyu ma'i skyes bu ltar/_/mthong bar gyur pa de dag ches/_/gsal bar go 'phang dam par 'gro/_/gang dag
[\[9a.4\]]la ni 'khor ba na/_/yul rnams kyis kyang dga' med pa/_/de dag la 'dir [#]rnam kun tu/_/dga' ba 'thad pa ma yin nyid/_/rnal 'byor spyod pa bzhi brgya pa las mi nyid kyis 'dod pa'i [#]longs spyod la zhen pa spang ba'i thabs bstan pa ste rab tu byed pa bdun
[\[9a.5\]]pa'o//_//ji ltar mi mthun mi rnams la/_/mdza' ba yun ring mi gnas pa/_/de bzhin kun la skyon shes la/_/'dod chags yun ring mi gnas so/_/la la de nyid la chags te/_/la la de nyid la sdang zhing /_/la la de nyid la rmongs pa/_/de phyir
[\[9a.6\]]'dod pa don med pa'o/_/rtog pa med par 'dod chags la/_/sogs la yod nyid yod min na/_/yang dag don dang [#]rtog pa zhes/_/blo dang ldan pa su zhig 'dzin/_/'ga' la'ang gang dang lhan cig tu/_/bcings pa zhes bya yod min te/_/gzhan dang lhan
[\[9a.7\]]cig bcings pa la/_/bral bar rigs pa ma yin no/_/bsod nams chung ngu chos 'di la/_/the tshom za bar yang mi 'gyur/_/the tshom za ba tsam zhig gis/_/srid pa hrul por byas par 'gyur/_/chos gang zhig la thub pa yis[#]/_/thar ba'i bar du 'phel ba
[\[9b\]]
[\[9b.1\]]nyid/_/gsungs der gang la gus med pa/_/de ni gsal bar blo ldan min/_/bdag ni mya ngan 'da' 'gyur zhes/_/stong min [#]stong ltar mthong min te/_/log ltas mya ngan mi 'da' bar/_/de bzhin gshegs pa rnams gsung ngo /_/gang las [#]'jig rten bstan
[\[9b.2\]]'byung [#]ba/_/de las 'jug pa gsungs pa ste/_/gang las don dam bsnyad 'byung ba/_/de las ldog pa gsungs pa'o/_/kun yod ma yin ci bya zhes/_/khyod la 'jigs pa skye 'gyur grang /_/gal te bya ba yod na ni/_/chos 'di zlog byed mi 'gyur ro/_/khyod
[\[9b.3\]]la rang phyogs chags yod cing /_/gzhan gyi phyogs la mi dga' na/_/mya ngan 'das par mi 'gro ste/_/gnyis spyod zhi bar yod [#]mi 'gyur/_/byed med mya ngan 'da' 'gyur zhing /_/byed pas yang srid 'gyur te des/_/bsam khral [#]med pas mya ngan las/_/'das
[\[9b.4\]]pa thob sla cig shos min/_/gang la 'di [#]skyo yod min pa/_/de la zhi gus ga la yod/_/rang khyim las bzhin srid pa ni/_/'di nas 'byung ba'ang bya bar dka'/_/la la sdug bsngal zil mnan cing /_/'chi bar 'dod pa dag snang ste/_/de tshe de dag gti mug
[\[9b.5\]]phyir/_/go 'phang dam par mi 'gror zad/_/sbyin pa dman pa la gsungs shing /_/'bring la tshul khrims gsungs pa ste/_/mchog la zhi ba gsungs gyur pa/_/des na rtag tu mchog tu byos/_/bsod nams min pa dang por bzlog[# ]/bar du bdag ni bzlog [#]pa
[\[9b.6\]]dang /_/phyi nas lta ba [#]kun bzlog pa/_/gang gis shes de mkhas pa yin/_/dngos po gcig gi lta po gang /_/de ni kun gyi lta por bshad/_/gcig gi stong nyid gang yin pa/_/de ni [#]kun gyi stong pa nyid/_/chos chags de bzhin gshegs rnams kyis[#]/_/mtho
[\[9b.7\]]ris 'dod pa rnams la gsungs/_/thar pa 'dod rnams la de nyid/_/smad 'gyur [#]gzhan du smos ci dgos/_/bsod nams 'dod pas stong pa nyid/_/kun tshe brjod par bya min te/_/gnas min gnas la [#]sbyar ba'i sman/_/dug tu 'gyur ba ma yin nam/_/ji ltar
[\[10a\]]
[\[10a.1\]]kla klo skad gzhan gyis/_/gzung bar mi nus de bzhin du/_/'jig rten pa yi ma gtogs pa[#]/_/'jig rten gzung bar nus ma yin/_/yod dang med dang yod med dang /_/gnyi ga min zhes kyang bstan te/_/nad kyi dbang gis thams cad
[\[10a.2\]]kyang /_/sman zhes bya bar 'gyur min nam/_/yang dag mthong na gnas mchog la/_/cung zad mthong na bzang 'gro ste/_/de phyir nang bdag bsam pa la/_/mkhas pas [#]rtag tu blo gros bskyed/_/de nyid shes pas gal te 'dir/_/mya ngan 'das pa ma thob kyang /_/
[\[10a.3\]]skye ba phyi mar 'bad med par/_/nges par thob 'gyur las bzhin no/_/bsams [#]bzhin pa ni bya ba ni[#]/_/kun la grub pa shin tu dkon/_/'di na 'ang myang [#]'das med min gyi[#]/_/sbyor dang grol rnams rnyed par dka'/_/lus la yon tan med thos [#]nas/_/'dod
[\[10a.4\]]chags yun ring mi gnas te/_/lam de nyid kyis thams cad kyang /_/zad par 'gyur ba ma yin nam/_/ji ltar sa bon mtha' mthong zhing /_/de la thog ma yod min ltar/_/de bzhin rgyu ni ma tshang phyir/_/skye ba'ang 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro/_/rnal 'byor
[\[10a.5\]]spyod pa bzhi brgya pa las slob ma yongs su sbyang [#]ba ste rab tu byed pa brgyad pa'o//_//thams cad 'bras bu'i don skye ba/_/des na rtag yod min de'i phyir/_/thub pa ma gtogs ji lta'i dngos/_/de bzhin gshegs pa yod ma yin/_/gang zhig gang
[\[10a.6\]]na nam du yang /_/ma brten par ni yod nyid med/_/des na nam yang gang zhig tu'ang [#]/_/rtag pa 'ga' yang yod ma yin/_/rgyu med par ni dngos po med/_/rgyu ldan rtag pa yod min pa/_/des na rgyu med las grub ni/_/de nyid mkhyen pas grub min gsungs/_/
[\[10a.7\]]mi rtag byas par mthong gyur nas/_/ma byas gal te rtag na ni/_/byas la [#]yod pa nyid mthong nas/_/rtag pa yod nyid min par 'gyur/_/mkha' la sogs rnams rtag go zhes/_/so so'i skye bo dag gis rtog[# ]/mkhas pa rnams kyis de dag la/_/'jig rten
[\[10b\]]
[\[10b.1\]]pas kyang don ma mthong [#]/_/phyogs zhes bya ba phyogs can ni/_/kun la gnas pa ma yin te/_/de [#]phyir phyogs can la phyogs ni/_/gzhan yang shin tu gsal bar yod/_/gang zhig yod na dngos po la/_/'jug dang ldog pa'ang dmigs par 'gyur/_/
[\[10b.2\]]de ni gzhan gyi dbang 'gyur [#]te/_/des na 'bras bur yang 'gyur ro/_/'bras bu med par rgyu la ni/_/rgyu nyid yod pa ma yin te/_/de yi phyir na rgyu rnams kun/_/'bras bu nyid du thal bar 'gyur/_/rgyu ni rnam par 'gyur ba na/_/gzhan gyi rgyu ru 'gyur ba ste/_/
[\[10b.3\]]gang la rnam par 'gyur yod pa/_/de ni rtag ces byar yod min/_/rtag pa gang gi rgyu yin pa'i/_/dngos de [#]ma byung ba las skye/_/rang nyid 'byung bar gyur de la/_/rgyu ni log [#]par 'gyur ba ste/_/dngos po rtag pa las skyes pa/_/ci lta bur na mi rtag 'gyur/_/
[\[10b.4\]]nam yang rgyu dang 'bras bu gnyis/_/mtshan nyid mi mthun mthong ma yin/_/gang gi phyogs 'ga' rgyu yin zhing /_/phyogs 'ga' rgyu ma yin des na/_/de ni sna tshogs 'gyur na ko/_/sna tshogs rtag par mi rigs so/_/rgyu yi [#]zlum po gang yin pa/_/de ni
[\[10b.5\]]'bras bu la yod min/_/des na bdag nyid kun sbyor ba/_/rdul phran rnams la mi 'thad do/_/rdul phran gcig gi gnas gang [#]yin/_/de ni gzhan gyi [#]yang mi 'dod/_/de phyir rgyu dang 'bras bu gnyis/_/bong tshod mnyam par 'dod ma yin/_/gang la shar
[\[10b.6\]]gyi phyogs yod pa/_/de la shar gyi cha yang yod/_/gang gi rdul la phyogs yod na[#]/_/des rdul rdul phran min par bsnyad/_/mdun gyis len cing rgyab kyis ni/_/gtong bar gyur na de dag gnyis/_/gang la yod pa ma yin pa/_/de ni 'gro por yang mi 'gyur/_/
[\[10b.7\]]gang la dang po yod min zhing /_/gang zhig la dkyil yod min la/_/gang la tha ma yod min pa/_/mngon med de ni gang gis mthong /_/'bras bu yis [#]ni rgyu bshig pa/_/des na rgyu ni rtag ma yin/_/yang na gang na rgyu yod pa/_/de na 'bras bu yod ma yin[#]/_/
[\[11a\]]
[\[11a.1\]]thogs ldan dngos po rtag pa ni/_/gang du 'ang snang ba ma yin te/_/des na nam yang sangs rgyas rnams/_/rdul phran rtag pa nyid mi gsung [#]/_/'ching dang bcings dang thabs las gzhan/_/thar pa gal te yod na ni/_/de las ci
[\[11a.2\]]yang mi skye ste/_/des na de thar zhes mi brjod/_/mya ngan 'das la phung po rnams/_/yod min gang zag srid ma yin/_/gang du mya ngan 'das gyur pa/_/ma mthong der myang 'das gang zhig_/srid dang bral la thar pa'i tshe/_/shes yod yon tan ci zhig yod/_/
[\[11a.3\]]shes med pa yi yod pa yang /_/gsal bar yod pa min dang [#]mtshungs/_/thar par bdag gcig [#]yod na ni/_/shes yod sa bon srid pa yod/_/de med na ni srid pa la/_/bsam pa'ang yod pa ma yin no[#]/_/sdug bsngal las thar mi rnams la/_/gzhan la [#]
[\[11a.4\]]yod pa min par nges/_/de phyir rnam pa kun du 'ang bdag_/zad pa legs zhes bya bar brjod/_/'jig rten pa 'di nyid bla yi/_/don dam rnam kun ma yin te/_/'jig rten pa la cung zad yod/_/dam pa'i don la yod ma yin/_/rnal 'byor spyod pa bzhi
[\[11a.5\]]brgya pa las dngos po rtag pa dgag pa bsgom pa bstan pa ste rab tu byed pa dgu pa'o//_//gang tshe nad [#]bdag bud med min/_/skyes min ma ning ma yin pa/_/de tshe mi shes 'ba' zhig las/_/khyod bdag pho'o snyam du sems/_/gang tshe 'byung ba
[\[11a.6\]]thams cad la/_/pho mo ma ning yod min pa/_/de tshe ci ste de dag nyid/_/brten [#]nas pho mo ma ning yin/_/khyod kyi bdag gang nga'i bdag min/_/des de bdag [#]min ma nges phyir/_/dngos po mi rtag pa rnams la/_/rtog pa skye bar 'gyur min nam/_/skye dang skye bar
[\[11a.7\]]skyes bu ni/_/lus bzhin rnam par 'gyur bar 'gyur/_/khyod kyi de la lus las gzhan/_/nyid dang rtag nyid mi rigs so/_/reg dang mi ldan dngos po las[#]/_/bskul ba zhes bya mi skye ste/_/de phyir lus kyi g.yo ba la/_/srog ni byed pa por mi 'gyur/_/
[\[11b\]]
[\[11b.1\]]mi 'tshe ba dang bdag rtag pa/_/'di la rgyu ni ci yod snyam/_/rnam pa kun tu 'ang [#]shing srin las/_/rdo rje bsrung byar mi 'gyur ro/_/skye ba dran pa yod pa'i phyir/_/gal te khyod kyi bdag rtag na/_/sngon byas pa yi rma mthong nas/_/khyod kyi lus ko [#]cis
[\[11b.2\]]mi rtag_/sems pa can dang ldan bdag kyang /_/gal te shes po nyid yin na/_/de yis [#]sems pa can sems pa/_/min zhing [#]skyes bu'ang rtag mi 'gyur/_/bde ba la sogs dang ldan srog_/bde sogs bzhin du sna tshogs mthong /_/de phyir bde ba [#]
[\[11b.3\]]la sogs bzhin[#]/_/rtag pa nyid du'ang mi rung ngo /_/gal te shes pa yod rtag na/_/byed pa log par 'gyur ba ste/_/gal te me ni rtag 'byung [#]na/_/bud shing gis don yod mi 'gyur/_/rdzas ni bya ba ji bzhin du/_/'jig pa'i bar du g.yo ba med/_/
[\[11b.4\]]des na skyes bu yod shes pa/_/yod pa med ces byar mi rigs/_/gzhan du shes pa yod pa'i khams/_/mthong zhing gzhan du shes yod de/_/lcags kyi zhu nyid bzhin de'i phyir/_/skyes bu rnam par 'gyur bar 'gyur/_/shes yod yid tsam zhig la
[\[11b.5\]]ste/_/skyes bu nam mkha' bzhin du che/_/de phyir de yi ngo bo ni/_/shes pa yod nyid min ltar mthong /_/gal te kun la bdag yod na/_/gzhan gyis de cis ngar mi rtog_/de nyid kyis ni [#]de nyid la/_/sgrib ces bya bar mi 'thad do/_/gang gi yon tan
[\[11b.6\]]byed po dang /_/rnam kun shes yod ma yin pa/_/de dag dang ni smyon pa la/_/khyad par ci yang yod ma yin/_/yon tan rnams kyis rnam kun tu/_/khyim la sogs dag byed shes kyi/_/za ba rnam par mi shes pa/_/'di las mi rigs gzhan ci yod/_/
[\[11b.7\]]bya ba dang ldan rtag pa med/_/kun tu song la bya ba med/_/bya ba med pa med dang mtshungs/_/bdag med la khyod cis mi dga'/_/la lar kun tu song bar mthong /_/la lar skyes bu lus tsam zhig_/la lar rdul tsam zhig mthong ste[#]/_/shes rab can
[\[12a\]]
[\[12a.1\]]gyis med par mthong /_/rtag la gnod pa ga la yod/_/gnod med thar pa [#]ga la yod/_/des na gang gi bdag rtag pa/_/de la [#]thar pa [#]mi rigs so/_/gal te bdag ces bya yod na/_/bdag med snyam pa mi rigs shing /_/de nyid
[\[12a.2\]]rig pa nges pa las/_/mya ngan 'das 'gyur [#]zhes bya'ang brdzun/_/gal te grol ba yod [#]nyid na/_/de ni sngar yang med pa med[#]/_/mi ldan pa la gang mthong ba/_/de ni rang bzhin zhes byar [#]bshad/_/gal te mi rtag chad na ni/_/da dung rtswa sogs ci ste yod/_/
[\[12a.3\]]'di ni gal te bden 'gyur na/_/su la'ang gti mug kyang mi 'byung /_/bdag ni yod par gyur na'ang gzugs/_/gzhan las 'byung bar snang gyur la/_/gzhan las gnas par snang gyur zhing /_/gzhan las rnam par 'jig par [#]snang /_/ji ltar sa bon byas pa las/_/myu gu byas pa skye 'gyur
[\[12a.4\]]ba/_/de bzhin mi rtag thams cad ni/_/mi rtag dag las 'byung bar 'gyur/_/gang phyir dngos po 'jug 'gyur ba/_/des na chad par mi 'gyur zhing /_/gang phyir dngos po ldog 'gyur ba/_/des na rtag par mi 'gyur ro/_/rnal 'byor spyod pa bzhi brgya
[\[12a.5\]]pa las bdag dgag pa bsgom pa bstan pa ste rab tu byed pa bcu pa'o//_//ma 'ongs bum la da ltar ba'i/_/bum yod ma yin 'das pa med/_/gang phyir de gnyis ma 'ongs pa/_/de phyir ma 'ongs yod ma yin/_/gal te zhig pa ma 'ongs pa'i/_/
[\[12a.6\]]ngo bor ma 'ongs la yod na/_/ma 'ongs bdag nyid du yod gang /_/de ni ci [#]ltar 'das par 'gyur/_/gang gi phyir na ma 'ongs dngos/_/ma 'ongs bdag tu gnas 'gyur ba/_/de yi phyir na da ltar bar/_/'gyur te ma 'ongs nyid mi srid/_/ma 'ongs pa
[\[12a.7\]]yod 'das pa yod/_/da ltar ba yod ci zhig med/_/gang gi dus kun yod nyid pa/_/de yi mi rtag nyid gang [#]las/_/'das pa las ni 'das gyur pa/_/ci yi phyir na 'das par 'gyur/_/'das pa las ni ma 'das pa/_/ci yi phyir na 'das par 'gyur/_/
[\[12b\]]
[\[12b.1\]]gal te ma 'ongs skyes yod na/_/ji ltar da ltar bar mi 'gyur/_/ci ste de la skye [#]med na/_/ma 'ongs rtag par 'gyur ram ci/_/skye ba med kyang 'jig pa las/_/gal te ma 'ongs mi rtag na/_/'das la [#]'jig pa yod min te/_/de ni rtag par cis mi rtog_/'das
[\[12b.2\]]pa dang ni da ltar ba[#]/_/'di ni mi rtag 'gyur min la/_/de dag las gzhan rnam pa ni/_/gsum pa'ang de la yod ma yin/_/dngos po gang zhig phyis skye ba/_/de ni gal te sngar yod na/_/de yi phyir na phywa [#]smra ba/_/rnams kyi [#]phyogs ni log mi 'gyur/_/gang
[\[12b.3\]]zhig 'byung bar byed pa ste/_/sngar yod ces byar mi rigs te/_/gal te yod pa skye 'gyur na/_/skyes zin pa yang 'byung bar 'gyur/_/ma 'ongs pa yi dngos mthong na/_/dngos po med pa cis mi mthong /_/gang la ma 'ongs yod 'gyur ba[#]/_/de la ring
[\[12b.4\]]ba yod ma yin/_/gal te byas pa med kyang chos/_/yod na nges sdom don med 'gyur/_/ci ste cung zad byed na yang /_/'bras bu yod pa mi srid do/_/mi rtag yin na ji [#]lta bur/_/'bras bu yod ces bya bar 'gyur/_/gang la thog ma mtha' yod pa/_/
[\[12b.5\]]de ni 'jig rten mi rtag brjod/_/bsgrim pa med par thal [#]'gyur te/_/grol la ma 'ongs yod ma yin/_/de lta [#]yin na chags med par/_/'dod chags kyang ni 'byung bar 'gyur/_/'bras bu yod nyid gang 'dod dang /_/'bras bu med nyid gang 'dod la/_/
[\[12b.6\]]khyim gyi don du ka ba la/_/sogs pa'i rgyan ni don med 'gyur/_/dngos rnams yongs su 'gyur ba yang /_/yid kyis kyang ni 'dzin mi 'gyur/_/de lta na yang da ltar ba/_/yod par mi mkhas rnams kyis rtog_/gnas med dngos po ga la zhig_/mi
[\[12b.7\]]rtag pas gnas ga la yod/_/gal te dang por [#]gnas gyur na/_/tha mar rnyings par [#]mi 'gyur ro/_/ji ltar rnam shes gcig gis ni/_/don gnyis rnam par mi shes pa/_/de bzhin rnam shes gnyis kyis ni/_/don gcig rnam par mi shes so/_/gal te
[\[13a\]]
[\[13a.1\]]dus la gnas yod na/_/gnas pa dus su mi 'gyur ro/_/ci ste gnas med na gnas pa/_/med par mtha' yang yod ma yin/_/gal te mi rtag dngos gzhan na/_/dngos po mi rtag par mi 'gyur/_/gcig na mi rtag nyid gang yin/_/de
[\[13a.2\]]nyid dngos te ga la gnas/_/mi rtag nyid gar stobs chung der[#]/_/gnas pa stobs chung ma yin na/_/phyi nas de dag nges par go_/bzlog par ci yis mthong bar 'gyur/_/gal te mi rtag stobs chung min/_/dngos po kun la yod na ni/_/kun la gnas
[\[13a.3\]]pa med pa'am[#]/_/yang na thams cad mi rtag min/_/gal te rtag tu mi rtag nyid/_/yod na rtag tu gnas yod min/_/yang na rtag par gyur zin nas/_/phyi nas [#]mi rtag par 'gyur ro/_/gal te gnas pa mi rtag dang /_/lhan cig dngos po la yod na/_/mi
[\[13a.4\]]rtag log par 'gyur ba'am/_/yang na gnas pa brdzun par 'gyur/_/mthong zin dngos po mi snang zhing /_/slar yang sems skye [#]min des na/_/dran pa zhes bya log pa yi[#]/_/don la log pa kho na 'byung /_/rnal 'byor spyod pa bzhi brgya pa las dus dgag pa
[\[13a.5\]]bsgom pa bstan pa ste rab tu byed pa bcu gcig pa'o//_//gzur gnas blo ldan don gnyer ba'i/_/nyan po snod ces bya bar bshad/_/smra po [#]yon tan rnam [#]gzhan du/_/mi 'gyur nyan po la yang min/_/srid dang srid thabs zhi ba yi/_/
[\[13a.6\]]thabs dang de bzhin zhi gsungs te/_/'jig rten yongs su mi shes gang /_/de ni thub pa'i lta bur mngon/_/thams cad btang bas mya ngan las/_/'da' bar ya mtshan can kun 'dod/_/kun sun 'byin la de dag ni/_/mi dgar 'gyur ba rgyu ci zhig_/
[\[13a.7\]]gang zhig gtong thabs mi shes de/_/ci zhig gtong bar byed par 'gyur/_/des na nges par thub pa yis/_/gzhan du zhi ba med ces gsungs/_/sangs rgyas kyis gsungs lkog gyur la/_/gang zhig the tshom skye 'gyur ba/_/de yis [#]stong pa nyid bsten te/_/
[\[13b\]]
[\[13b.1\]]'di nyid kho nar yid ches bya/_/gang gis 'jig rten 'di mthong dka'[#]/_/de ni gzhan la [#]blun pa nyid/_/gang dag de rjes 'gro de dag_/shin tu yun rings [#]bslus par 'gyur/_/mya ngan 'das par rang 'gro gang /_/de ni shin tu bya dka' [#]byed/_/'dren
[\[13b.2\]]pa'i slad bzhin dam pa ni/_/ma yin yid 'gro spro ma yin/_/ma mthong skrag pa mi rtsom ste/_/mthong na rnam kun de ldog 'gyur/_/des na nges par cung zad cig_/shes la skrag pa brjod [#]par bya/_/byis [#]rnams nges pa [#]kho nar ni/_/'jug byed chos la goms
[\[13b.3\]]pa ste/_/de dag goms pa med pa yis[#]/_/ldog byed chos la 'jigs [#]par 'gyur/_/gang zhig gti mug 'ba' [#]zhig gis/_/bsgribs shing de nyid gegs byed pa/_/de la dge legs 'gro ba yang /_/med na thar pa ga la [#]yod/_/tshul khrims las ni
[\[13b.4\]]nyams bla yi/_/lta las cis kyang ma yin te/_/tshul khrims kyis ni mtho ris 'gro/_/lta bas go 'phang mchog tu 'gyur/_/dam pa min la bdag 'dzin mchog_/bdag med ston [#]pa ma yin te/_/gcig ni ngan 'gro nyid 'gro la[#]/_/tha mal ma yin zhi
[\[13b.5\]]nyid du'o/_/zhi sgo gnyis pa med pa dang /_/lta ba ngan rnams 'jig byed cing /_/sangs rgyas kun gyi yul 'gyur la/_/bdag med ces ni bya bar brjod/_/chos 'di yi ni ming las kyang /_/dam pa min pa 'jigs [#]pa skye/_/zhan la 'jigs pa mi skyed [#]pa'i/_/
[\[13b.6\]]stobs ldan zhes bya gang zhig mthong /_/chos 'di de bzhin gshegs rnams kyis[#]/_/rtsod pa'i ched du ma gsungs te/_/de lta'ang 'dis [#]ni gzhan smra rnams/_/sreg ste me [#]yis bud shing bzhin/_/chos 'di gang gis shes gyur pa/_/de ni gzhan la mi dga'
[\[13b.7\]]ste/_/des na bdag la chos 'di ni/_/'jigs [#]pa'i sgo dang 'dra bar snang /_/de nyid du bdag med snyam du/_/de ltar gang la dgongs gnas pa/_/de ni yod pas ga [#]la dga'/_/med pas 'jigs par ga la 'gyur/_/don min sa bon gyur pa yi/_/mu
[\[14a\]]
[\[14a.1\]]stegs can mang mthong nas ni/_/chos 'dod pa yi skye bo la/_/su zhig snying brtse skye mi 'gyur/_/shAkya gos med bram ze ste/_/gsum po rnams kyis [#]chos yid dang /_/mig dang rna ba yis 'dzin pa/_/de phyir thub pa'i gzhung lugs smra/_/
[\[14a.2\]]ji ltar bram ze rnams la chos/_/phal cher phyi 'chos brjod pa ltar/_/de bzhin gcer bu rnams la chos/_/phal cher blun pa brjod pa yin/_/ji ltar rigs [#]pa blangs pa las/_/bram zer [#]gus pa skye ba ltar/_/de bzhin nyon mongs blangs pa las/_/gcer bu
[\[14a.3\]]pa la brtse bar 'gyur/_/sdug bsngal las kyi rnam smin phyir/_/ji ltar chos su mi 'gyur ba/_/de bzhin skye ba las kyi ni/_/rnam smin yin phyir chos ma yin/_/chos ni mdor na mi 'tshe bar/_/de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyis gsungs/_/stong nyid mya ngan
[\[14a.4\]]'das pa [#]ste/_/'dir ni de gnyis 'ba' zhig go/_/rang phyogs 'jig rten thams cad la/_/skyes sa bzhin du sdug 'gyur na/_/de yi ldog par byed pa'i rgyu/_/khyod la gang gis sdug par [#]'gyur/_/rigs pa'i don ni gzhan las kyang /_/blo ldan legs
[\[14a.5\]]pa 'dod pas blang /_/nyi ma sa stengs [#]mig ldan la/_/kun gyi spyi thun ma yin nam/_/rnal 'byor spyod pa bzhi brgya pa las lta ba dgag pa bsgom pa bstan pa ste rab tu byed pa bcu gnyis pa'o//_//gzugs mthong tshe na bum pa ni/_/thams cad kho
[\[14a.6\]]na mthong mi 'gyur/_/bum pa mngon sum zhes bya ba'ang /_/de nyid rig pa su zhig smra/_/rnam par dpyad pa 'di nyid kyis/_/blo mchog ldan pas dri zhim dang /_/mngar dang 'jam pa thams cad dag_/so sor dgag par bya ba yin/_/gal te gzugs mthong
[\[14a.7\]]ba yis de/_/thams cad mthong bar 'gyur na ni/_/ma mthong ba yis [#]gzugs mthong ba/_/mthong ba min par [#]cis mi 'gyur/_/gzugs ni 'ba' zhig kho na la/_/mngon sum nyid ni yod ma yin/_/gang phyir de la pha rol gyi/_/cha dang tshu rol dbus yod phyir/_/
[\[14b\]]
[\[14b.1\]]rdul la cha shas yod med ces/_/dpyad pa der yang 'jug par 'gyur/_/de phyir bsgrub par bya ba yis/_/bsgrub bya 'grub par [#]mi 'thad do/_/kun kyang yan lag tu gyur nas/_/slar yang yan lag can du 'gyur/_/de phyir yi ge brjod pa yang /_/'di la [#]
[\[14b.2\]]yod pa ma yin no/_/gal te mdog las dbyibs gzhan na/_/ji lta bur na dbyibs 'dzin 'gyur/_/'on te gzhan min na lus kyis/_/mdog kyang ci ste 'dzin mi 'gyur/_/gzugs ni lta [#]zhig ma gtogs par/_/gzugs kyi rgyu ni mi snang ngo /_/gal te de
[\[14b.3\]]ltar 'gyur na ni/_/gnyi ga yang ni mig nyid kyis/_/'dzin par ci yi phyir mi 'gyur/_/sa ni brtan [#]zhes bya bar mthong /_/de yang lus kyis 'dzin par 'gyur/_/des na rag pa 'ba' zhig ni/_/sa 'o zhes ni bya bar brjod/_/blta byar [#]skyes pas bum pa
[\[14b.4\]]ni/_/'di la yon tan 'gar [#]mi 'gyur/_/des na blta bya nyid skye ltar/_/yod pa'i ngo bo'ang yod ma yin/_/mig ni 'byung gyur [#]sna de bzhin/_/mig gis mthong gi [#]gzhan gyis min/_/des na nges par las rnam smin/_/thub pas bsam mi khyab par gsungs/_/
[\[14b.5\]]rkyen ma tshang phyir shes pa ni/_/lta [#]ba'i snga rol yod ma yin/_/'on te phyis na shes don med/_/gsum pa byed pa don med 'gyur/_/mig de 'gros dang ldan gyur [#]na/_/thag ring yun ring gis mthong 'gyur/_/ha cang nye dang ches ring du/_/gzugs de gsal
[\[14b.6\]]bar ci ste min/_/gal te gzugs mthong [#]mig 'gro na/_/song bas yon tan 'ga' yang med/_/yang na blta byar 'dod pa ni/_/nges zhes bya ba brdzun [#]par 'gyur/_/mig ma song bar 'dzin na ni/_/'gro ba 'di kun mthong 'gyur te/_/gang la 'gro ba
[\[14b.7\]]yod min pa/_/de la ring med bsgribs [#]pa'ang med/_/dngos po kun gyi rang bzhin ni/_/dang por [#]bdag la snang 'gyur na/_/mig ni mig nyid kyis 'dzin par/_/ci yi phyir na 'gyur ma yin/_/mig la rnam shes yod min zhing /_/rnam shes la yang lta [#]med
[\[15a\]]
[\[15a.1\]]la/_/gnyi ga gzugs la yod min na/_/de dag gis gzugs ji [#]ltar mthong /_/gal te smra zhing sgra 'gro na/_/gang gis smra ba por mi 'gyur/_/'on te mi smra bar 'gro na'ang /_/gang gis de la shes pa skyed[#]/_/gal te phrad de sgra 'dzin na/_/
[\[15a.2\]]sgra yi dang po gang gis 'dzin/_/sgra ni rkyang par mi 'ong na/_/reng bu ji ltar 'dzin par 'gyur/_/ji srid sgra thos ma gyur pa/_/de yi bar du sgrar mi 'gyur/_/sgra med pa yang mthar sgra nyid/_/'gyur na de ni mi rigs so/_/dbang po rnams dang [#]bral sems kyis[#]/_/
[\[15a.3\]]song ste'ang ci zhig byed par 'gyur/_/de lta yin dang srog 'di ni/_/rtag tu yid med ci ste min/_/sngar mthong ba yi don gang zhig_/yid kyis smig rgyu ltar 'dzin pa/_/de ni chos kun rnam gzhag la/_/'du shes phung po zhes bya'o/_/mig dang gzugs la
[\[15a.4\]]brten nas yid/_/sgyu ma bzhin du skye bar 'gyur/_/gang la yod pa nyid yod de/_/sgyu ma zhes byar mi rigs so/_/gang tshe mkhas pa sa stengs [#]na/_/ngo mtshar min pa 'ga' [#]med pa/_/de tshe dbang rtogs de 'dra la/_/ya mtshan zhes bya ci zhig yod/_/mgal
[\[15a.5\]]me'i 'khor lo sprul pa dang /_/rmi lam sgyu ma chu zla dang /_/khug rna nang gi brag ca dang /_/smig rgyu sprin dang srid pa mtshungs/_/rnal 'byor spyod pa bzhi brgya pa las dbang po dang don dgag pa bsgom pa bstan pa ste rab tu byed pa bcu gsum pa'o//_//dngos
[\[15a.6\]]po gang zhig gzhan 'ga' la'ang /_/rag las par ni mi 'gyur na/_/de yi bdag nyid 'grub 'gyur na/_/de ni gang na'ang yod ma yin/_/gzugs nyid bum zhes gcig ma yin/_/gzugs ldan bum gzhan yod min la/_/bum pa la gzugs yod min zhing /_/
[\[15a.7\]]gzugs la bum pa yod ma yin/_/gnyis mtshan mi mthun mthong nas ni/_/gal te dngos las bum gzhan na/_/ma yin de ltar dngos po yang /_/bum pa las gzhan cis mi 'gyur/_/gal te gcig bum mi 'dod na/_/bum pa'ang gcig pu [#]mi 'gyur ro/_/
[\[15b\]]
[\[15b.1\]]ldan 'di mtshungs pa'ang ma yin pa/_/des kyang gcig tu mi 'gyur ro/_/gang tshe rdzas ci tsam gzugs na/_/de tshe gzugs chen ci ste min/_/gal te phyir rgol gzhan min na/_/gzhung lugs bsnyad par bya bar 'gyur/_/mtshan nyid kyis kyang mtshan gzhi ni/_/
[\[15b.2\]]gang du grub pa yod min pa/_/der [#]ni grangs sogs tha dad par/_/dngos po yod pa ma yin no/_/mtshan nyid rnams dang so so ni/_/min phyir bum pa gcig ma yin/_/re re'i bum pa med na ni/_/mang nyid 'thad par mi 'gyur ro/_/reg ldan reg dang mi ldan dang /_/
[\[15b.3\]]lhan cig sbyor ba zhes bya med/_/de phyir gzugs sogs rnams sbyor ba[#]/_/rnam pa kun tu rigs ma yin/_/gzugs ni bum pa'i yan lag ste/_/des na re zhig de bum min/_/gang phyir yan lag can med pa/_/des na yan lag kyang yod min/_/gzugs rnams
[\[15b.4\]]kun la gzugs nyid ni/_/mtshan nyid mi mthun ma yin na/_/gcig la bum pa yod 'gyur zhing /_/gzhan dag la min rgyu ci zhig_/ro sogs dag las gzugs gzhan zhing /_/bum las min zhes khyod 'dod na/_/de rnams med par [#]rang med gang /_/de
[\[15b.5\]]gzugs las gzhan ji ltar min/_/bum pa la ni rgyu yod min/_/rang nyid 'bras bur mi 'gyur te/_/de phyir gzugs sogs las gzhan du/_/bum pa 'ga' yang yod ma yin/_/bum pa rgyu las grub [#]'gyur zhing /_/rgyu ni gzhan las grub 'gyur [#]na/_/gang la
[\[15b.6\]]rang las grub med pa/_/de yis gzhan po ji ltar skyed[#]/_/'phrod pa 'dus par gyur kyang gzugs/_/dri nyid du ni mi 'thad de/_/des na bum pa bzhin tshogs pa/_/gcig nyid du ni mi rigs so/_/ji ltar gzugs sogs ma gtogs par/_/bum pa yod
[\[15b.7\]]pa ma yin pa/_/de bzhin rlung la sogs pa ni/_/ma gtogs gzugs kyang yod ma yin/_/tsha ba me nyid du 'gyur te/_/tsha ba min pa ji ltar bsreg_/des na bud shing zhes bya ba/_/yod min de med me yod min/_/gal te zil mnan tsha ba yang /_/de yang ci ste
[\[16a\]]
[\[16a.1\]]mer mi 'gyur/_/'on te mi tsha na dngos gzhan/_/de [#]la yod ces byar mi rung /_/gal te rdul la shing med na/_/des na shing med me yod do/_/gal te de la [#]shing yod na/_/gcig gi bdag can rdul yod min/_/dngos po gang gang yongs btags [#]
[\[16a.2\]]pa/_/de dang de la gcig nyid med/_/gang gis gcig kyang yod min pa/_/des na du ma dag kyang med/_/gal te gang na [#]dngos de rnams/_/med der [#]gcig yod [#]ces 'dod na/_/gang gis kun la gsum nyid yod/_/des na gcig nyid yod ma yin/_/yod dang
[\[16a.3\]]med dang yod med dang /_/yod med min zhes bya ba'i tshul/_/'di ni mkhas pas gcig nyid sogs/_/dag la rtag tu sbyar bar bya/_/ji ltar rgyun la blta [#]nyes na/_/rtag pa yod ces byar 'gyur ba[#]/_/de bzhin tshogs la blta nyes pa[#]/_/dngos po yod ces bya
[\[16a.4\]]bar 'gyur/_/gang la brten nas 'byung yod pa/_/de ni rang dbang mi 'gyur ro/_/'di kun rang dbang med pa ste/_/des na bdag ni yod ma yin/_/'bras bu med par dngos po ni/_/kun la 'du ba yod ma yin/_/'bras bu'i don du 'du ba gang /_/de ni 'phags lam
[\[16a.5\]]'dus pa'o/_/srid pa'i sa bon rnam shes te/_/yul rnams de yi spyod yul lo/_/yul la bdag med mthong nas [#]ni/_/srid pa'i sa bon 'gag par 'gyur/_/rnal 'byor spyod pa bzhi brgya pa las mthar 'dzin pa dgag pa bsgom pa bstan pa ste rab tu byed pa bcu
[\[16a.6\]]bzhi pa'o//_//tha mar med pa skye bar 'gyur/_/des na med pa ga la skye/_/yod pa gdod nas skye [#]'gyur ba/_/des na yod pa ga la skye/_/'bras bu yis ni rgyu bshig pa/_/des na med pa skye mi 'gyur/_/grub pa las sgrub [#]yod ma yin/_/de phyir
[\[16a.7\]]yod pa [#]mi skye'o/_/de tshe skye ba yod min zhing /_/gzhan tshe skye ba yod ma yin/_/de tshe gzhan tshe mi skye na/_/nam zhig skye ba yod par 'gyur/_/de la de yi dngos po ru/_/ji ltar skye ba yod min ltar/_/de bzhin gzhan gyi dngos por yang /_/de la skye ba yod ma yin/_/
[\[16b\]]
[\[16b.1\]]thog ma bar dang tha ma rnams/_/skye ba'i snga rol srid ma yin/_/gnyis gnyis dag ni med pa ru/_/ji ltar re re rtsom par 'gyur/_/gzhan gyi dngos po med par ni/_/bdag gi dngos po 'byung ba med/_/de yi phyir na bdag gzhan ni/_/gnyis [#]las 'byung ba [#]yod
[\[16b.2\]]ma yin/_/sngon dang phyis dang cig car ces/_/brjod pa nyid du mi nus pa/_/de phyir skye dang bum pa la/_/cig car 'byung ba yod ma yin/_/sngar skyes pa yi phyir na ni/_/sngar skyes rnyings [#]par mi 'gyur zhing /_/phyi nas kun tu skyes pa yang /_/phyi nas skyes par mi
[\[16b.3\]]'gyur ro/_/da ltar ba yi dngos po ni/_/de nyid las 'byung ma yin zhing /_/ma 'ongs las 'byung yod min la/_/'das pa las kyang yod ma yin/_/skyes pa la ni 'ong ba dang /_/de bzhin 'gags [#]la 'gro ba med/_/de lta yin na ji [#]lta bur/_/srid pa sgyu ma 'dra ma
[\[16b.4\]]yin/_/skye dang gnas dang 'jig pa rnams/_/cig car 'byung ba yod min zhing /_/rims kyis [#]'byung ba'ang yod min na/_/nam zhig 'byung ba yod par 'gyur/_/skye la [#]sogs pa [#]thams cad la/_/slar yang thams cad 'byung ba ste/_/de phyir 'jig pa skye 'dra
[\[16b.5\]]zhing /_/gnas pa 'jig dang 'dra bar snang /_/mtshan las mtshan gzhi [#]gzhan zhe na/_/mtshan gzhi mi rtag nyid gang [#]las/_/yang na bzhi ka'ang yod pa yi/_/ngo bor gsal bar yod ma yin/_/dngos po dngos las mi skye ste/_/dngos po dngos med las mi skye/_/
[\[16b.6\]]dngos med dngos med mi skye ste/_/dngos med dngos las mi skye'o/_/dngos po dngos por mi 'gyur te/_/dngos med dngos por mi 'gyur ro/_/dngos med dngos med mi 'gyur te/_/dngos po dngos med mi 'gyur ro/_/skye bzhin pa ni byed [#]skyes phyir/_/skye bzhin pa
[\[16b.7\]]ni skye mi 'gyur/_/yang na thams cad skye bzhin pa/_/nyid ni yin par thal bar 'gyur/_/skye bzhin pa yi bdag nyid du/_/bya ba skye bzhin par mi 'gyur/_/skye bzhin pa yi bdag nyid du/_/mi bya'ang skye bzhin par mi 'gyur/_/gang gi gnyis po bar med par/_/
[\[17a\]]
[\[17a.1\]]srid pa yod pa ma yin pa/_/de la skye bzhin po [#]med de/_/gang phyir de la'ang bar yod phyir/_/gang gi phyir na skye bzhin pa/_/'gags pas [#]skyes pa skye 'gyur ba/_/de yi phyir na skye bzhin pa/_/gzhan yang yod pa'i ngo bor snang /_/gang
[\[17a.2\]]tshe skyes pa de yi tshe/_/skye bzhin pa la srid pa med/_/gang tshe skyes pa skye bzhin na/_/de tshe ci phyir skye bar 'gyur/_/skye bzhin pa ni ma skyes pa/_/kho na skye zhes bya bar grag[# ]/khyad par med phyir de yi tshe/_/bum pa med par cis mi rtog_/skye bzhin pa ni ma
[\[17a.3\]]rdzogs kyang /_/ma skyes pa las phyi rol gyur[#]/_/de lta'ang gang phyir skyes pa las/_/phyi rol gyur phyir ma skyes te[#]/_/skye bzhin pa sngar ma byung yang /_/phyi nas yod pa yin [#]par grag_/des kyang ma skyes pa skye ste/_/ma byung zhes bya skye ma yin/_/rdzogs
[\[17a.4\]]pa yod ces byar 'gyur la/_/ma byas pa ni med ces brjod/_/gang gi tshe na skye bzhin pa/_/med pa de tshe gang der brjod/_/gang tshe rgyu ni ma gtogs par/_/'bras bu yod pa ma yin pa/_/de yi tshe na 'jug pa dang /_/ldog pa 'thad pa nyid mi 'gyur/_/
[\[17a.5\]]rnal 'byor spyod pa bzhi brgya pa las 'dus byas kyi don [#]dgag pa bsgom pa bstan pa ste rab tu byed pa bco lnga pa'o//_//rgyu 'ga' zhig gis stong pa yang /_/stong pa min pa lta bur snang /_/rab tu byed pa thams cad kyis/_/'di [#]ni so sor 'gog par
[\[17a.6\]]byed/_/gang tshe smra po brjod bya na'ang /_/stong pa zhes byar mi rung ngo /_/gang zhig rten [#]nas kun 'byung ba/_/de ni gsum la'ang yod ma yin/_/gal te stong pa'i nyes pa yis/_/stong pa ma yin 'grub 'gyur na/_/mi stong nyes pas stong pa nyid/_/ci ste
[\[17a.7\]]'grub par 'gyur ma yin/_/gzhan gyi phyogs ni bzlog pa dang /_/rang gi phyogs ni bsgrub pa ste/_/gal te sun 'byin byed phyogs gcig_/dga' [#]na sgrub byed la cis min/_/gal te yongs su brtags pa na/_/med gang de phyogs mi 'gyur na/_/des na
[\[17b\]]
[\[17b.1\]]gcig nyid la sogs gsum/_/kun kyang phyogs ma yin par 'gyur/_/gang du mngon sum gyis bum der/_/stong pa'i gtan tshigs don med 'gyur/_/'di na [#]gzhung lugs las byung ba'i/_/gtan tshigs yod min gzhan du yod/_/mi stong med
[\[17b.2\]]par stong pa ni/_/gang las 'byung [#]ba nyid du 'gyur/_/ji lta bur na cig shos ni/_/med par gnyen po 'byung bar 'gyur/_/gal te phyogs nyid du 'gyur na/_/phyogs med phyogs kyi ngo bor 'gyur/_/de ltar phyogs med nyid med na/_/gang zhig mi
[\[17b.3\]]mthun phyogs su 'gyur/_/gal te dngos po yod min na/_/me ni tsha bar ci [#]ltar 'gyur/_/tsha ba me yang yod min zhes/_/gong nyid du ni bzlog par byas/_/dngos po mthong nas dngos po ni/_/med pa zhes bya bzlog 'gyur na/_/de ltar phyogs ni bzhi char
[\[17b.4\]]la/_/nyes pa spangs pa gang zhig mthong /_/rdul phran la yang yod pa'i dngos/_/gang du med der ji ltar 'byung /_/sangs rgyas rnams la med nyid kyang /_/de nyid phyir na ma 'brel pa'o/_/gal te kun la gnyis min na/_/gzhan gang zhig la yod dngos
[\[17b.5\]]yod/_/gal te khyod la'ang de rigs na/_/brgal ba gzhan po ci ste byed/_/dngos po kun gyi dngos med la/_/rnam par dbye ba mi rigs te/_/rdzas rnams kun la gang mthong ba/_/de ni rnam dbyer mi 'gyur ro/_/med phyir gzhan gyi phyogs la lan/_/
[\[17b.6\]]brjod pa min par grags na ni/_/gtan tshigs kyis bzlog rang phyogs kyang /_/ci yi phyir na sgrub mi 'gyur/_/sun 'byin byed pa'i gtan tshigs rnyed/_/sla [#]zhes 'jig rten brjod na yang /_/gzhan gyi phyogs la skyon brjod pa/_/nyid du ci yi phyir mi nus/_/
[\[17b.7\]]yod ces bya ba tsam zhig gis/_/gal te de nyid dngos yod na/_/med ces bya ba tsam zhig gis/_/med par yang ni cis mi 'gyur/_/gang phyir yod bdog ces ming btags/_/de phyir med par mi 'gyur na/_/gang phyir yod ces ming [#]byas pa/_/de phyir yod
[\[18a\]]
[\[18a.1\]]par mi 'gyur ro/_/gal te thams cad 'jig rten pas/_/brjod pas 'jig rten pa yod na/_/dngos gang de nyid du yod pa/_/de ni 'jig rten par cis 'gyur/_/gal te dngos kun med pa'i phyir/_/med pa nyid du 'gyur [#]na ni/_/
[\[18a.2\]]de lta yin dang phyogs rnams kun/_/dngos po med par mi rigs so/_/dngos po med phyir dngos med la/_/srid pa yod par mi 'gyur ro/_/dngos po med par dngos po ni/_/med par gang las 'grub par 'gyur/_/stong pa gtan tshigs las 'gyur ba/_/
[\[18a.3\]]de phyir stong par mi 'gyur na/_/dam bca' gtan tshigs las gzhan ni/_/ma yin des na gtan tshigs med/_/gang phyir stong pa'i dpe yod pa/_/des na stong par mi 'gyur na/_/bya rog ji lta de bzhin du/_/bdag kyang nag ces brjod nus sam/_/gal
[\[18a.4\]]te rang bzhin gyis dngos yod/_/stong mthong yon tan ci zhig yod/_/rtog [#]pas mthong ba 'ching ba ste/_/de ni 'di ru dgag par bya/_/gcig yod gcig med ces bya ba/_/de [#]min 'jig rten pa yang min/_/des na 'di yod 'di med ces/_/brjod pa
[\[18a.5\]]nyid du nus ma yin/_/yod dang med dang yod med ces/_/gang la phyogs ni yod min pa/_/de la yun ni ring po na'ang /_/glan [#]ka brjod par nus ma [#]yin/_/rnal 'byor spyod pa bzhi brgya pa las slob dpon dang slob ma rnam par gtan la dbab pa bstan pa ste
[\[18a.6\]]rab tu byed pa bcu drug pa'o//_//slob dpon 'phags pa lha'i zhal snga nas mdzad pa/_byang chub sems dpa'i rnal 'byor spyod pa bzhi brgya pa'i tshig le'ur byas pa rdzogs so//_//kha che'i grong khyer dpe med kyi dbung rin chen sbas pa'i
[\[18a.7\]]kun dga' ra bar/_rgya gar gyi mkhan po su smra dzA na dang /_bod kyi lots+tsha [#]ba pa tshab nyi ma grags kyis bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa[#]//_//sarba mang+ga laM//_//

[\[19b\]]
[\[19b.1\]{D3847}#]@##/_/rgya gar skad du/_sa kha li ta pra marda [#]na yuk+tA he tu sid+d+hi nA ma/_bod skad du/_'khrul pa bzlog pa'i rigs pa gtan tshigs [#]grub pa zhes bya ba/_'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/ston pa 'jig rten sgron ma dang /_/nyon mongs nad sel bdud rtsi'i chos/_/slob dang mi
[\[19b.2\]]slob la sogs la/_/sgo gsum dang bas phyag 'tshal te/_/snyigs ma lnga yi 'jig rten 'dir/_/'gro la phan phyir lam bshad pa/_/bdud dang bdud la phyogs pa dag_/lam la log par lta ba'i phyir/_/rang gi lta bas bden lam [#]nyams/_/nor ba'i lam la lam du 'dod/_/yang dag pa la log
[\[19b.3\]]rtsod pa/_/de dag bsal phyir bshad par bya/_/sdom ni/_yod la med par 'khrul dang mi rtag nyid la nges par 'khrul/_/med la yod par 'khrul dang rtag pa nyid du nges par 'khrul/_/'khrul las 'khrul pa slu zhing bslus pas 'khrul pa'i 'khrul pa sgrub[#]/_/'khrul pa'i dbang gis yang dag don la 'khrul
[\[19b.4\]]te rgyu la 'khrul/_/de 'khrul rkyen gyis 'bras bu ngan song gsum du rtag tu 'khrul/_/'khrul dang ma 'khrul shes pas 'khrul pa bsal phyir ma 'khrul te/_/'khrul pa dag la bstan phyir 'khrul pa med par bshad par bya/_/'khrul pa'i skyon dang ma 'khrul yon tan shes phyir 'khrul 'di brtag_/de la yod pa
[\[19b.5\]]la med par 'khrul pa ni kha cig na re/_ma shi bar du bde bar 'tsho/_/shi nas de yi spyod yul med/_/lus kyang thal ba bzhin song nas/_/slar 'tsho bar lta ga la 'gyur/_/de phyir snga phyi yod ma yin/_/tshe 'di nyid la bde ba'i phyir/_/lha mchod 'dre srin mnan byas na/_/btsan phyug mthu stobs 'grub par
[\[19b.6\]]'gyur/_/de la chos 'di pa na re/_nyi ma nyi ma nyi ma'i grangs/_/sa bon myu gu rgyu 'bras de/_/goms pa'i dbang gis nu zho'o/_/gcig 'gal skye ba dpag tu med/_/dpal dang gzi byin longs spyod phyir/_/lha klu gnod sbyin srin po bgegs/_/de dag mchod mnan phan na lha[#]/_/rang nyid 'dod
[\[19b.7\]]bzhin grub par rigs[#]/_/yang gzhan kha cig na re/_phyi nang skye mched chos rnams thams cad ni/_/ngo bo nyid las grub pa gzhan las min/_/sran zlum skyer tsher gzang [#]rings rno ba dang /_/rma bya'i mjug ma mgrin pa'i tshogs bkra dang /_/nyi shar chu rnams thur du 'bab pa rnams/_/ngo bo nyid las grub ste
[\[20a\]]
[\[20a.1\]]rgyu yod min/_/de la chos 'di pa na re/_gal te nam mkha' rten med la/_/sran dang cher sogs yod na ni/_/rgyu med ngo bo nyid mthong na/_/de dag sa sogs brten nas skye/_/chu yang gyen du thur 'bab cing /_/nyi ma phyogs bzhir 'drar shar na/_/rgyu med ngo bo nyid bden na/_/chu ni sa yi
[\[20a.2\]]shugs kyis 'bab/_/ri rab ji bzhin nyi ma 'khor/_/yang gzhan kha cig na re/_skye ba po ni shes pa yod min te/_/bdag gi bde sdug len la rang dbang med/_/dbang phyug gis ni yang na g.yang sa 'am/_/yang na mtho ris dag tu skye bar byed/_/'di la chos 'di pa na re/_sa gzhi bzang ngan mtho
[\[20a.3\]]ris ngan song gi_/sa bon dge sdig nas dang gro 'dra ba/_/byed pa dbang phyug 'dra ba'i mis btab na/_/skye bar 'dra yang gro nas so sor smin/_/de 'drar dbang phyug mi dbang dge sdig dbang /_yang kha cig na re/_dper na rdza ma be'u bzhin du/_/mtho ris ngan song gar 'gro ba/_/rig pa'i rgyal po
[\[20a.4\]]rang dbang che/_/rgyu rkyen gzhan la brten mi dgos/_/de la chos 'di pa na re/_bye'u bzhin rang dbang yod pa yang /_/yul la thogs pa med na lta/_/mtho ris ngan song bye'u bzhin na/_/de ni yul la thogs pa yod/_/de bzhin dge sdig yul gyis kyang /_/rig pa'i rgyal po rang dbang med/_/de phyir
[\[20a.5\]]mtho ris ngan song gi_/gar 'gro dge sdig gnyis kyi dbang /_/de la mi rtag pa nyid la nges par 'khrul pa ni kha cig na re/_'di na rgyan thogs bza' btung ldan pa dang /_/'khor dang bzhon pa gnas dang smra tshig dang /_/ci bsam ci sgrub de dag pha rol na/_/de bzhin byed de 'di dag thams cad rtag_/
[\[20a.6\]]de la chos 'di pa na re/_'di la ci byed pha rol na yang de bzhin rtag na ni/_/dper na dbyar dro dgun grang ston smin dpyid skye gcig tu rtag rigs na/_/'di ltar 'di dag mi rtag ci phyir gling bzhi'i nyi ma'i dbang gis 'gyur/_/de bzhin sems can 'di dag pha rol mi rtag las kyis bsgyur/_/yang [#]kha cig na re/_
[\[20a.7\]]pha bu spun dang chung ma gnyen rnams ni/_/'di na ji bzhin pha rol de bzhin te/_/nye mdza' 'di dag rtag tu 'grogs par nges/_/bram ze smra la mkhas pas de skad zer/_/de la chos 'di pa na re/_dper na sA lu'i snye ma la/_/lhan cig 'bras bu mang smin yang /_/la la sa bon la la btsos[#]/_/sa
[\[20b\]]
[\[20b.1\]]bon rnams kyang phyogs mtshams 'thor[#]/_/lhan cig smin pa gang yang med/_/de bzhin nye mdza' 'di dag kyang /_/pha bu chung ma spun ma nges/_/gzhan yang mtho ris ngan song du/_/nas [#]dang rigs kyang ma nges so/_/de la med pa la yod par 'khrul pa ni/_kha cig na re/_skyes bu kun gyi
[\[20b.2\]]byed pa po/_/bde sdug myong ba'i shes mthong ba/_/de yod des ni thams cad byed/_/rtag pa gcig pu shes pa'o/_/de la chos 'di pa na re/_dper na thag pa la ni [#]sbrul du [#]'khrul pa bzhin/_/chos 'di thag pa 'dral ba dag [#]tu mthong /_/de la sbrul med de bzhin chos la bdag med de/_/mthong
[\[20b.3\]]ba ma dag shes bzhin mu stegs bdag tu rmongs/_/yang kha cig na re/_sa chu me rlung 'byung ba'i dngos po 'di/_/rtag tu yod de 'di dag med mi srid/_/rang bzhin mi 'gyur mi tsha chu grang bzhin/_/sa sra rlung g.yo 'di dag rtag par nges/_/'di la chos 'di pa na re/_sa sogs 'byung ba bzhi po 'di dag ni/_/
[\[20b.4\]]phra rab rdul las grub pas rags pa min/_/phyogs cha drug gis phra rab de yang med/_/'jig pa gsum gyis dngos po 'di mi rtag_/yang kha cig na re/_dbang phyug tshangs pa khyab 'jug dang /_/phya dang srid pa rnams kyis bskos/_/tshe zad lus gzugs 'dug gnas dag_/byed pa pos byas phyir
[\[20b.5\]]mi drang /_/de la chos 'di pa na re/_dbang phyug la sogs byed pa pos/_/thams cad byed pa'i mthu yod na/_/gzhan dag de ltar byas pa bas/_/bdag nyid legs par bya ba'i 'os/_/byed pa po nyid mi rtag la/_/skye shi sdug bsngal dpag med na/_/des byas bden par ga la 'gyur/_/rgya mtsho'i
[\[20b.6\]]rin chen 'od snang la/_/byed pa'i mthu lta ga la yod/_/de la rtag pa nyid du 'khrul pa ni/_kha cig na re/_'gro ba rigs lnga'i rgyud la yang /_/'khor ba rtag pa bzhin du 'dod/_/lha ni lhar skye mi ni mir skye ste/_/bzhi po gzhan yang de bzhin skye/_/de la chos 'di pa na re/_'gro ba rigs lnga de ltar
[\[20b.7\]]so sor nges nas [#]ni/_/mang yang mang zhing nyung yang nyung rtag rigs 'os na/_/mang yang nyung zhing nyung yang mang ste mi rtag pas/_/dge sdig las kyi rkyen gyis so sor skye bar rigs/_/yang kha cig na re/_kha dog dkar po la sogs la/_/kha dog dkar po la sogs skye/_/dran pa gsal dang mi
[\[21a\]]
[\[21a.1\]]gsal dang /_/grum [#]po dag la'ang de bzhin skye/_/de la chos 'di pa na re/_dper na gser dang dngul sogs la/_/seng ge rta dang glang la sogs/_/mi mthun pa dag blugs byas na/_/lugs dpe mthun dang 'dra ba bzhin/_/sems rgyud dri za mi gcig kyang /_/'dod
[\[21a.2\]]pa chags pa'i rkyen gyis ni/_/kha dog lus gzugs dran shes dag_/lugs dpe bzhin du de mthun no/_/de la 'khrul pas 'khrul pa bslu ba ni kha cig na re/_tshangs par gyur na gzi brjid che/_/dbang phyug thob na mthu stobs che/_/brgya byin khyab 'jug de bzhin te/_/klu dang de bzhin sman
[\[21a.3\]]rnams bde/_/de phyir de dag thob pa'i thabs/_/gang dag sna tshogs yod pa dag_/bya ba sla ba cis [#]smos te/_/dka' ba dag kyang bya bar 'os/_/de la chos 'di pa na re/_dper na sgyu ma'i sprul pa la[#]/_/sgyu ma mi shes bden mthong nas/_/sgyu ma'i sprul pas de bslu zhing /_/'khrul pa yod med rtag
[\[21a.4\]]sogs la/_/sgyu ma bzhin du de 'khrul bas/_/skye bo rnams la thams cad bslus/_/lta ba ngan pa'i dbang song bas/_/yod med rtag chad mtha' la gnas/_/de la 'khrul pas 'khrul pa'i 'khrul pa bsgrub pa ni/_kha cig na re/_me lnga bsten pas tshangs pa 'grub/_/dbyug [#]gu gsum pas
[\[21a.5\]]dbang phyug che/_/bya yi dka' thub rtogs 'dod rigs/_/khyi yi brtul zhugs smin drug 'khor/_/nang par bsrung ba dus nges pa'o/_/de la chos 'di pa na re/_me dang dbyug [#]gu'i dka' thub ni/_/lta ba 'khrul pa'i dka' thub ste/_/dper na ri dwags kha skom zer/_/chu 'dod smig rgyu
[\[21a.6\]]snyeg pa 'dra/_/de la 'khrul pa'i dbang gis yang dag pa'i don la 'khrul pa ni/_thams cad rtag par rtog pa bzhi/_/kha cig rtag par rtog pa bzhi/_/rgyu med smra ba rnam pa gnyis/_/mtha' la rtog pa bzhi dang ni/_/lha mi spong bar rtog pa bzhi/_/bco brgyad de dag sngon gyi mtha'/_/'du shes
[\[21a.7\]]can rtog bcu drug dang /_/'du shes med par rtog pa brgyad/_/'du shes yod min med min brgyad/_/chad par lta bdun mthar lta lnga/_/bzhi bcu rtsa bzhi phyi ma'i mtha'/_/drug cu rtsa gnyis bden par lta/_/de dag bden pa'i don la 'khrul/_/de la rgyu la 'khrul pa ni/_kha cig na re/_dus kyis
[\[21b\]]
[\[21b.1\]]'byung ba rnam smin byed/_/dus kyis skye dgu rnams 'byin byed/_/dus kyis gnyid log sad par byed/_/dus kyis skye zhing dus kyis 'chi/_/dus las 'da' bar dka' ba'o/_/de la chos 'di pa na re/_dus kyis thams cad byed na go_/nam mkha' lta bur rten med la/_/sa bon 'bras bu skye
[\[21b.2\]]bar rigs/_/'gro ba rigs lnga'i 'khor ba yang /_/pha med ma la bu skye zhing /_/ma med pha la'ang de bzhin te/_/rgyu rkyen med na dus dbang nyams/_/kha cig na re/_ba ni ba sbra rnams kyi gzhi/_/chu shel chu rnams ji bzhin du/_/blag sha yal ga rnams ji bzhin/_/skyes bu lus can kun gyi
[\[21b.3\]]rgyu/_/de la chos 'di pa na re/_thag pa sbrul du 'khrul pa ltar/_/skyes bu 'khrul pas ming btags pa/_/rang ma grub pa gzhan gyi rgyu/_/skyes bu de yis ji ltar byed/_/yang kha cig na re/_de tsam nyi shu lnga shes shing /_/ral pa'am spyi bo gtsug phud [#]kyis/_/cha lugs gang du gnas pa ni/_/
[\[21b.4\]]grol 'gyur 'di la the tshom med/_/de la chos 'di pa na re/_de ltar grangs shes mtho ris 'gyur na ni/_/rdo shing bgrangs [#]pas gser sogs snang 'gyur 'os/_/grangs shes rdo shing 'dra la mtho ris gser bzhin te/_/kun rdzob rigs par 'gal na don du smos ci dgos/_/de ni bkres pas nga
[\[21b.5\]]bgrangs [#]zer ba 'dra/_/yang kha cig na re/_lus can 'di dag skyes pa ni/_/rgyu las ma byung rang skyes te/_/dper na spang kha'i sha mo la/_/sa bon rgyu ni med bzhin no/_/de la chos 'di pa na re/_de nyid dpe las bdag gis bzung /_/sa la brten nas rlan [#]gyis bskyed/_/rgyu med ma yin yod pa [#]bzhin/_/
[\[21b.6\]]rgyu rkyen las kyis bskyed par rigs/_/de la 'khrul pa'i rkyen gyis 'bras bu ngan song gsum du 'khrul pa ni/_'khrul pa'i dbang gis dben [#]ma mthong /_/rgyu 'bras mi bslu las ma shes/_/nyon mongs lnga la mngon zhen nas/_/skye gnas bzhi po'i gnas su skye/_/byol song mngal dang sgo nga dang /_/
[\[21b.7\]]drod gsher las skyes yi dwags ni/_/mngal skyes dmyal ba rdzus [#]te skye/_/kha dog rigs gzugs grangs med kyang /_/gnyis dang bzhi pa mang ba dang /_/rkang med rigs dang rnam bzhir bsdu/_/gcig la gcig gis 'tshe gyur pas/_/bsrung phyir gab dang snyog pa'i phyir/_/'bros dang bkol
[\[22a\]]
[\[22a.1\]]spyad brdeg btsog dang /_/bsad [#]dang gsod dang gsod 'gyur phyir/_/sdug bsngal dpag med myong ba yin/_/khab mig kha dang rta rnga'i mgrin/_/lto ba ri yi gtos tsam nyid/_/rkang lag thur ma bzhin du phra/_/shing rta 'khol [#]'dra dud pa 'thul/_/yid du 'ong ba'i zas
[\[22a.2\]]dang skom/_/bkod pa bltas nas lag bsnyabs [#]pas/_/rab 'jigs skyes bu go cha can/_/mtshon rnon dbyig pa thogs pa yis/_/rgyab nas rdul bzhin 'gyur mthong nas/_/len pa'i dbang med bkres gdungs 'gyur/_/la las bza' btung khar bcug na/_/me lcer 'bar zhing 'tshig
[\[22a.3\]]'gyur te/_/la lar rnag khrag dri nga yang /_/mi rnyed lus las btsags las [#]'don/_/la las bza' btung mi mthong zhing /_/mi thos phyogs bcur rgyug par 'gyur/_/mnar med rab tsha tsha ba dang /_/ngu 'bod che dang ngu 'bod nyid/_/bsdus 'joms thig nag yang sos brgyad/_/chu bur
[\[22a.4\]]can dang chu bur rdol/_/so thams a chu kyi hud zer/_/ut+pal lta bu pad+ma gnyis/_/lus dang sgra 'gyur ming btags brgyad/_/nyi tshe nye 'khor gcig bcu drug_/nyes spyad rnam smin ma zad par/_/de dag 'chi bar mi 'gyur te/_/bris mthong bshad thos klags [#]dran yang /_/'jigs skye nyams myong ci
[\[22a.5\]]zhig smos/_/'jig rten khams rnams sdug bsngal gang /_/mthong ba'i chos la yod do cog_/gcig tu bsdus pas dmyal ba yi/_/sdug bsngal gang chung 'bum gyi char[#]/_/mi phod cung zad de mi mtshungs/_/de kun ma rig lta las byung /_/de phyir ngan song gsum du 'khrul/_/de la 'khrul
[\[22a.6\]]pa med par bshad par bya ba ni/_rgyu rkyen yan lag bcu gnyis po/_/tshe gsum rigs gsum yan lag lnga/_/nyi ma ji bzhin 'gro bzhin te/_/shing rta'i 'phang lo bzhin du 'khor/_/nyes pa bcu gnyis srid rtsa rnams/_/dang po bkag pas kun bkag cing /_/rgyu 'bras yang dag bden shes
[\[22a.7\]]bya/_/yang dag gyur pa bcu gnyis rnyed/_/thar pa'i lam la de gnas phyir/_/yon tan dpag med thob pa yin/_/'di la dge ba gang yod des/_/lam lngar 'khor ba'i sems can rnams[#]/_/chos nyid shes nas nyes spangs te/_/bde ba'i lam lngar bgrod par shog_/'khrul pa bzlog
[\[22b\]]
[\[22b.1\]]pa'i rigs pa gtan tshigs grub pa zhes bya ba/_slob dpon 'phags pa lhas mdzad pa rdzogs so//_//rgya gar gyi mkhan po sarba dz+nyA de ba dang /_zhu chen gyi lo tsA ba ban+de dpal brtsegs kyis bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa'o//_//[#{D3848}]@##/_/rgya gar skad du/_
[\[22b.2\]]hastA b+ha ba pra ka ra Na kA ri kA/_bod skad du/_rab tu byed pa lag pa'i tshad kyi tshig le'ur byas pa/_bcom ldan 'das ngag gi dbang po la phyag 'tshal lo/_/thag pa la ni sbrul snyam 'dzin/_/thag par mthong na don med do/_/de'i cha mthong na de la yang /_/sbrul bzhin shes pa 'khrul pa yin/_/
[\[22b.3\]]brtags pa'i dngos po thams cad la/_/rang gi ngo bo brtags pa na/_/kun rdzob shes pa'i spyod yul ni/_/ji snyed yod pa gzhan las brtags/_/cha med brtag par bya min phyir/_/tha ma yang ni med par mtshungs/_/de phyir mkhas pas 'khrul pa tsam/_/yang dag don du min par
[\[22b.4\]]brtag_/'khrul na de yang ma dag phyir/_/ji ltar snang na de ltar med/_/don yod ma yin snang ba ni/_/ji ltar de yi bdag nyid 'gyur/_/gang zhig zhib mo'i blo yis ni/_/thams cad btags pa kho nar shes/_/blo ldan de ni chags la sogs/_/bde bar sbrul gyis skrag bzhin spong /_/
[\[22b.5\]]'jig rten pa yi don rtogs pas/_/'jig rten bzhin du bsgrub par bya/_/kun nas nyon mongs spong 'dod pas/_/dam pa'i don gyis btsal bar bya/_/rab tu byed pa lag pa'i tshad kyi tshig le'ur byas pa/_slob dpon 'phags pa lhas mdzad pa rdzogs so//_//
[\[22b.6\]{D3849}#]@##/_/rgya gar skad du/_hastA b+ha ba brat+ti[#]/_bod skad du/_lag pa'i tshad kyi 'grel pa/_'phags pa 'jam dpal ye shes sems dpa' la phyag 'tshal lo/_/khams gsum pa tha snyad tsam la yang dag pa'i don du kun tu rtog pa'i phyir de kho na nyid kyi don khong du ma chud pa'i sems
[\[22b.7\]]can rnams la/_dngos po'i rang bzhin rab tu rnam par dbye ba'i sgo nas phyin ci ma log pa'i sems yang dag par bsgrub pa'i phyir 'di brtsam mo/_/thag pa la ni sbrul snyam 'dzin/_/thag par mthong na don med do/_/'di na yul ha cang bskal pa ma yin pa'ang 'od tsam snang ba zhig na thag pa'i
[\[23a\]]
[\[23a.1\]]gzugs spyi'i chos tsam zhig dmigs pas 'khrul pas thag pa la 'di ni sbrul kho na'o zhes nges par 'dzin pa'i ngo bo'i shes pa skye ste/_khyad par gyi rang gi ngo bo khong du ma [#]chud pa'i phyir ro/_/de'i khyad par nges par 'dzin pa na ji lta ba bzhin du ma yin par kun tu rtog
[\[23a.2\]]pas rab tu spro ba nyid kyi phyir shes pa de yang 'khrul pa'i shes pa don med pa kho nar [#]'gyur ro/_/de yi cha mthong de la yang /_/sbrul bzhin shes pa 'khrul pa yin/_/thag pa de la yang cha shas su phye nas brtags pa na thag pa'i rang gi ngo bo mi dmigs te/_de ma dmigs na thag par
[\[23a.3\]]dmigs pa yang sbrul lo snyam pa'i blo bzhin du 'khrul pa tsam 'ba' zhig tu zad do/_/yang ji ltar thag pa'i shes pa 'khrul pa yin pa de bzhin du cha shas de yang dum bu dang nyag ma la sogs pa de dag la brtags na de'i rang gi ngo bo nges par mi zin to/_/de nges par ma zin pas de la
[\[23a.4\]]dmigs pa'i rnam pa can gyi blo yang thag pa'i blo bzhin du 'khrul pa tsam kho na'o/_/brtags [#]pa'i dngos po thams cad la/_/rang gi ngo bo brtags pa na/_/kun rdzob shes pa'i spyod yul ni/_/ji snyed yod pa gzhan las brtags[#]/_/ji ltar cha shas la sogs pa'i dbye bas tha dad pa'i
[\[23a.5\]]thag pa la sogs pa la brtags na rang gi ngo bo mi dmigs pas thag pa la sogs pa'i blo yang sbrul lo snyam pa'i blo bzhin du 'khrul pa tsam du zad pa de bzhin du rdza ma dang phor bu la sogs pa brtags [#]pa'i yod pa thams cad kyang ngos cha la sogs pa la ltos [#]pa yin pas tha snyad pa'i shes
[\[23a.6\]]pa'i yul bum pa la sogs pa rab tu dbye ba'i mthar thug pa dang bcas pa ji snyed pa 'di dag ni gzhan las tha snyad btags pa kho na yin gyi don dam par ni ma yin no/_/cha med brtag par bya med [#]phyir/_/tha ma yang ni med par mtshungs/_/gang yang brtags [#]pa'i dngos po thams cad kyi tha
[\[23a.7\]]ma rdul phra rab kyi rdzas cha med pa gcig pu de yang dmigs par bya bar mi nus pa'i phyir nam mkha'i me tog gi phreng ba dang /_ri bong gi rwa la sogs pa brtag par bya ba ma yin pa'i rang gi ngo bo dag dang mtshungs pas de yang dngos po med pa nyid du 'grub bo/_/ji ste yang ji ltar na brtag
[\[23b\]]
[\[23b.1\]]par bya ba ma yin pa'i mtshan nyid kyi gtan tshigs de [#]rdul phra rab kyi rdzas yod pa de nyid gcig tu med do zhes shes par nus she na/_gang gi phyir yod pa ni phyogs cha tha dad pa'i phyir/_dper na yod pa bum pa dang snam bu dang /_shing rta la sogs pa'i rdzas rnams ni shar dang nub dang byang
[\[23b.2\]]dang steng la sogs pa phyogs cha tha dad pa'i phyir cha shas [#]tha dad pa dag snang ba ltar rdul phra rab kyi rdzas kyang yod par 'gyur ba gdon mi za bar phyogs cha tha dad pa'i phyir/_shar dang nub dang steng la sogs pa'i cha shas tha dad par khas blang bar bya'o/_/cha shas tha dad pa yin na ni rdul
[\[23b.3\]]phra rab kyi rdzas gcig tu mi 'grub bo/_/rdzas kyi dbye ba mang po snang ba'i phyir gcig nyid yod pa ma yin na ni rdul phra rab mi dmigs pas rdul phra rab rdzas su smra ba 'di thong shig_/de phyir mkhas pas 'khrul pa tsam/_/yang dag don du min par brtag_/gang gi phyir de ltar khams
[\[23b.4\]]gsum pa 'khrul pa tsam yin pa de'i phyir mkhas pa legs pa thob par 'dod pas 'di la yang dag pa'i don du brtag par mi bya'o/_/gal te 'di snyam du bum pa la sogs pa phyi rol gyi dngos po de dag ni/_ngo bo nyid mi rtogs [#]pa'i phyir med pa las kun tu brtags [#]pa yin pa bden
[\[23b.5\]]no/_/de dag la dmigs pa'i rnam pa can 'khrul pa'i shes pa 'di ni yod de[#]/_dper na sgyu ma'i skyes bu dang dri za'i grong khyer la sogs pa med kyang de dag la dmigs pa'i rnam pa can gyi shes pa lta bu'o zhes bya ba 'dod do zhe na/_'khrul na de yang ma dag phyir/_/ji ltar snang ba de ltar
[\[23b.6\]]med/_/don yod ma yin snang ba ni/_/ji ltar de yi bdag nyid 'gyur/_/'khrul pa de yang rdzas kyi rang gi ngo bo gang yin pa de shes pa yin na rdzas de ni rang gi ngo bo nyid de lta bur yod pa ma yin te[#]/_'di ni bshad zin to/_/don [#]med na yang rang gi ngo bos ni nus pa med pas ma dag par
[\[23b.7\]]'gyur ro/_/ma dag pa'i phyir 'khrul pa'i ngo bo nyid de lta bur yod do zhes bya bar ji ltar shes/_'di ltar 'jig rten na yang sa bon la sogs pa skyed par byed pa med na/_bskyed par bya ba myu gu la sogs pa yod do zhes bya ba'i chos de lta bu yang ma mthong ngo /_/de nyid kyi phyir bdag ni sgyu
[\[24a\]]
[\[24a.1\]]ma'i skyes bu'i dpe yang ma grub par 'chad do/_/gang zhig zhib mo'i blo yis ni/_/thams cad [#]brtags pa kho nar shes/_/blo ldan des ni chags [#]la sogs/_/bde bar sbrul gyis skrag bzhin spong /_/'di skad bshad pa'i rnam pas brtags [#]pa tsam du yod
[\[24a.2\]]pa'i khams gsum pa 'di la gang zhig bum pa la sogs pa rags pa'i blo bsal te/_zhib mo'i blos rdzas su med pa tha snyad tsam yin par nges par 'dzin pa de ni ji ltar thag pa la sbrul lo snyam pa'i shes pas kun nas bslang ba'i 'jigs pas de'i khyad par rnam par dpyad nas
[\[24a.3\]]thag par nges pa ni[#]/_sbrul gyis skrag pa med pa bzhin du des kyang 'dod chags la sogs pa skyed par byed pa'i dngos po nyid dag la yongs su brtags pas/_'dod chags la sogs pa nyon mongs pa'i dra ba rnams bde bar dka' ba med par ring por mi thogs pa kho nar spong bar 'gyur
[\[24a.4\]]ro/_/'jig rten pa yi don rtogs pas/_/'jig rten bzhin du bsgrub [#]par bya/_/kun nas nyon mongs spong 'dod pas/_/dam pa'i don gyis btsal bar bya/_/ji ltar 'jig rten pa'i bum pa la sogs pa'i don la yod pa'i ngo bor rtog pas 'di ni bum pa'o/_/snam bu'o/_/shing
[\[24a.5\]]rta'o zhes tha snyad 'dogs pa de bzhin du sngon gyi sgrub pas tha snyad du bya'o[#]/_/de'i 'og tu 'dod chags la sogs pa nyon mongs pa spong bar 'dod pa rnams kyis/_ji skad bshad pa'i don dam pa'i mtshan nyid kyi [#]dngos po rnams la yongs su btsal bar bya ste/_de ltar dngos po rnams
[\[24a.6\]]la yongs su tshol ba na 'di'i 'dod chags la sogs pa'i nyon mongs pa'i dri ma phyis mi skye bar 'gyur ro/_/rab tu byed pa lag pa'i tshad kyi 'grel pa slob dpon 'phags pa'i lhas mdzad pa rdzogs so//_//rgya gar gyi mkhan po dA na shI la dang /_lo tsA ba [#]dge slong dpal
[\[24a.7\]]'byor snying pos bsgyur cing /_zhu chen gyi lo tsA ba dge slong dpal brtsegs rak+Shi tas zhus nas gtan la phab pa'o//[ {D3850}#]@##/_/rgya gar skad du/_b+h+ra ma g+ha tA ma d+h+yA [#]nA ma/_bod skad du/_dbu ma 'khrul pa 'joms pa zhes bya ba/_slob dpon 'phags
[\[24b\]]
