[\[267b.3\]]'byung las kyang mi 'da'o/_/'gog pa shes pas yongs su mya ngan las mi 'da' zhing 'gog pa las kyang mi 'da'o/_/lam shes pas kyang yongs su mya ngan las mi 'da' zhing /_lam gyis kyang mi 'da' ste/_'di ltar 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi po 'di dag gi mnyam pa nyid gang
[\[267b.4\]]yin pa de ni ngas rnam par byang bar bstan te/_gang mnyam pa nyid de ni mya ngan las 'das pa'o zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs so/_/'phags pa sangs rgyas thams cad kyi yul la 'jug pa las kyang /_'jam dpal chos gang yang kun shes pa 'am/_spang ba'am/_bsgom pa 'am/_mngon sum du
[\[267b.5\]]bya bar [#]'gyur ba de [#]gang na yang med do zhes gsungs so/_/gzhan yang khyed kyis [#]mya ngan las 'das pa de yang phan tshun mi mthun te/_'di ltar bye brag tu smra ba dag ni [#]'di skad du/_mya ngan las 'das pa ni dngos por yod pa dang /_rtag pa dang rdzas su yod do zhes zer ro/_/mdo sde pa dang /_gos
[\[267b.6\]]dmar can gyi sde pa dag ni 'di skad du/mya ngan las 'das pa [#]ni dngos po yod pa yang ma [#]yin te/_mar me shi bar gyur pa bzhin/_/de yi sems ni rnam par thar/_/zhes zer te/_mya ngan las 'das pa me shi ba ltar 'dod do/_/gnas ma bu'i sde pa dag [#]ni 'di skad du/_mya ngan las
[\[267b.7\]]'das pa'i dngos po yod pa yang ma yin te/_lus dang dbang po med pa'i phyir ro/_/med pa'ang ma yin te/_gtan du ba'i bde ba dang ldan pa'i phyir ro zhes zer ro[#]/_/de ltar bcom ldan 'das kyis drang ba'i don gyi lung la brten nas rnam pa sna tshogs rtog par byed de/_byis pa dag
[\[268a\]]
[\[268a.1\]]brid pa'i thabs yin no/_/don 'di la dgongs nas 'phags pa klu sgrub kyi zhal snga [#]nas/_bdag sogs bral ba'i 'jig rten 'di/_/phung po skye mched khams rnams te/_/nyan thos dag la phan bzhed pas/_/de bzhin gshegs pas gsungs pa yin/_/yang /_bdag
[\[268a.2\]]tu 'dzin pa bzlog pa'i phyir/_/phung po skye mched khams rnams bstan/_/sems tsam nyid du rnam [#]gnas nas/_/bskal [#]chen rnams kyis de [#]yang gzhom/_/zhes pa'i rigs pa dang /_gzugs la sogs dang dngos po sogs/_/cung zad yod ces bstan pa ni/_/dngos 'dzin gdon gyis zin pa
[\[268a.3\]]yi/_/zab mo'i tshul gyis skrag pa la'o/_/zhes bya ba'i rigs pas drang ba'i don yin par shes par bya'o/_/'dir sgra dang /_gtan tshigs dang /_gso ba dang /_bzo rig pa ste bzhi dang /_bdag dang gzhan gyi grub pa'i mtha' rgya mtsho lta bu'i thos pa'i pha rol tu son pa 'phags pa klu sgrub
[\[268a.4\]]kyi zhal snga'i dbu ma chen po'i nye bar bstan pa yod pas sngar ji skad bkod pa'i gzhung de dang de dag dang /_gzhan yang thams cad du dpyad cing gtan la dbab par bya'o/_/drang ba'i don gyi yang dag pa'i kun rdzob kyi shes rab kyi skabs rdzogs so//_//theg chen rigs can yin mod kyi/_/
[\[268a.5\]]'on kyang mi shes sgrib pa can/_/blo gros 'bring dang ldan pa yi/_/byis pa de dag brid pa'i phyir/_/sems tsam nyid du gsungs pa de/_/byed po za po dgag phyir yin/_/shes rab med pa'i thabs rgyas pa/_/thams cad mkhyen pas drang don gsungs/_/'phags pa lang kar gshegs pa
[\[268a.6\]]las/_rang gi sems nyid snang ba'i dbyings[#]/_/mi rnams la ni phyi rol snang /_/phyi rol snang ba de med de/_/de yi phyir yang don med do/_/zhes bya ba la sogs pa mang du gsungs so/_/'jig rten las 'das pa'i le'u las kyang /_kye rgyal ba'i sras dag khams gsum pa ni sems
[\[268a.7\]]tsam mo zhes gsungs so/_/de bzhin du 'phags pa rgyan stug po'i mdo dang /'phags pa dgongs pa nges par 'grel pa'i mdo dang /_chos chen po'i me long gi mdo la sogs pa las chos thams cad sems nyid du gsungs pa ni phyi rol gyi yul rnam pa thams cad du dgag par
[\[268b\]]
[\[268b.1\]]ni mi mdzad kyi/_'di ltar byed pa de [#]dang /_za ba po dag dgag pa de lta bu'i thabs bkod par mdzad de/_ji skad du/_'phags pa sa bcu pa'i mdo las/_byang chub sems dpa'i sa drug pa la/_byang chub sems dpa'i rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba lugs su 'byung ba dang /_lugs
[\[268b.2\]]su 'byung ba ma yin pa la rnam par lta ba 'di snyam du sems te/_ma rig pa la sogs pa yan lag bcu gnyis las sdug bsngal gyi phung po 'ba' zhig pa byed pa po dang /_tshor ba po dang /_bral ba 'di byung zhing sdug bsngal gyi ljon shing mngon par 'grub par 'gyur ro snyam du de ltar nges pas/_
[\[268b.3\]]kye/_rgyal ba'i sras dag khams gsum pa 'di dag ni sems tsam ste/_sems kyis mngon par 'dus byas [#]pa dang /_sems kyis bris pa yin gyi/_sems las gzhan pa'i byed pa po dang /_za ba po ni 'ga' yang med do zhes gsungs so/_/de bas na gzhan mu stegs can dag gis
[\[268b.4\]]rnam par shes pa las gzhan gyi byed pa po dang /_za ba po yod par brtags pa sel bar mdzad pa'i sangs rgyas dang /byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis sems tsam zhes bstan pa mdzad pa yin gyi/_phyi rol gyi yul bsal ba'i phyir ni ma yin no/_/de bas na mdo sde 'di dag ni drang ba'i don
[\[268b.5\]]yin par shes par bya'o/_/shes rab med pa'i zhes sngar smras pa de ni legs par smras pa ste/_'di ltar sems tsam gyi rnal 'byor pa'i shes rab ni kun rdzob pa'i shes rab yin te/_ji lta [#]zhe na/_'di ltar rnam pa dang bcas par smra ba dang /_rnam pa med par smra ba nyid [#]las ma gtogs pa'i
[\[268b.6\]]gzhung 'dzin pa ni 'di na med do/_/de la rnam pa dang bcas par smra ba dag ni 'di skad du/_khams gsum pa thams cad dang /_mya ngan las 'das pa thams cad sems tsam yin te/_gzugs la sogs pa'i don gyis stong pa'i phyir/_dper na rmi lam gyi gnas skabs lta bu'o zhes pa dang /_
[\[268b.7\]]gzhan yang 'di skad du/_rnam par shes pa nyid gnyis su snang ba kho na ste/_tshad ma dang 'bras bu yin pa'i phyir ro/_/de la tshad ma ni 'dis rjes su dpag pa'i phyir tshad ma ste/_rab tu snang ba'i phyir rnam par shes pa'o/_/'bras bu de'i yul so sor rtog pa ste/_yul du snang ba'i rnam par
[\[269a\]]
[\[269a.1\]]shes pa'o/_/[#]yul du snang ba'i shes pa 'ba' zhig ni tshad ma dang 'bras bu'o/_/gzhan yang phyi dang nang gi chos thams cad [#]sems yin te/_sems nyid yul yin pa'i phyir dper na de ma thag pa'i rkyen bzhin no/_/de bas na nam zhig gzung [#]ba dang 'dzin pa'i dri ma dang bral
[\[269a.2\]]nas rang gi sems kyi chos nyid la rang nyid gnas pa na de bzhin gshegs pa'i so so rang rig pa'i ye shes kyis rig par bya ba chos nyid kyi gzugs zhes bya ba de rtogs pa ni bsgrub par bya ba yin no zhes zer ro/_/da ni rigs pa de dag rim pa bzhin du brjod par bya ste/_de la dang por dam bcas pa
[\[269a.3\]]dang /_gtan tshigs de gnyis kyang de la ma grub pa yin la/_rmi lam bzhin no zhes pa'i dpe de yang 'di ltar brtags pa'i don gyis [#]stong pa yin nam/_'on te brtags pa ma yin pa'i don gyis [#]stong pa'i dpe yin/_'di yin na shes pa dang /[#]shes bya mi 'grub cing brdzun par
[\[269a.4\]]'gyur bas khyed kyi grub pa'i mtha' nyid nyams so/_/brtags pa'i don gyis stong pa'i dpe yin na ni/_brtags pa ma yin pa'i don gyi cha de sel bar mi byed pas sems tsam nyid du yang mi rung ngo /_/dpe 'di yang ma grub ste/_rmi lam gyi shes pa ni chos nyid [#]kyi gzugs la dmigs pa'i
[\[269a.5\]]phyir [#]yang dag pa ma yin pa'i phyir [#]dpe nyid du mi rung ngo /_/'di la yul du snang ba'i rnam par shes pa zhes bya'o/_/rnam par shes pa skye bzhin pa nyid kyi yul rtogs par mi byed pa'i phyir shes pa skye bzhin pa nyid gang yin pa de ni tshad mar 'dod do/_/rnam par shes pa skyes pa na yul mthong ba'i
[\[269a.6\]]phyir shes pa de mngon par grub pa'i phyir/_de ni 'bras bu'i yul du snang ba'i shes pa nyid la tshad ma dang /_'bras bu nyid [#]yod par 'dod de/_dper na shing la sta res gzas pa dang /_btab pa'i rkyen gyis gnyis su gcod par byed [#]pa dang /_des [#]dum bu gnyis su gyur pa bzhin no zhes zer
[\[269a.7\]]ro/_de la brjod pa/_mngon sum gyi shes pa dngos po rang gi mtshan nyid la dmigs pa dang /_rtog pa dang /_rjes su dran pa'i rnam par rtog pa dang bral bas gzugs la sogs pa sngon po la sogs pa gtan du med pa'i ngo bo nyid la/_de bzhin du gtan du med pa'i ngo bo nyid kho na bzhin du
[\[269b\]]
[\[269b.1\]]rang rig pa'i rnam par rtog par byed pa/_de dag gi phyir de'i phyi'i yul nyid du bsnang [#]ba'i shes pa gcig pu kho na la tshad ma dang /_'bras bu gnyis yod pa'i phyir gtan tshigs ma grub pas sems gcig pu gnyis su snang bar rtogs [#]pa ni 'khrul pa yin no/_/rigs pa gsum pa yang
[\[269b.2\]]mi bden par smras te/_'di ltar chos can dang /_de sgrub pa'i chos dam bca' ba dang /_gtan tshigs dang /_dpe rnams te/_khyed kyis [#]dam bca' ba yang nged la ma grub la/_sems nyid kyi yul yin pa'i phyir zhes pa de yang sems phyi rol [#]na yod na [#]yul yin nam/_'on te tshor
[\[269b.3\]]ba la sogs pa nang na gnas pa la [#]yul yin/_phyi rol gyi sems yul yin na dam bca' ba'i skabs su phyi nang thams cad sems nyid du 'dod pas yul dang yul can nyid [#]du mi rigs so/_/nang gi sems kyang nang gi sems kyi yul du mi rigs te/_gtan tshigs ltar snang ba yin no/_/
[\[269b.4\]]gzhan yang 'di lta bu'i skyon yang yod de/_thams cad sems nyid yin par gyur na/_dper na bum pa mthong ba'i dus su sems can thams cad kyi sems kyi rgyud kyang mthong bar 'gyur te/_da mthong bas 'gro ba lnga po la gzhan gyi sems shes pa'i mngon par shes pa yang rang chas su
[\[269b.5\]]yod par 'gyur ro/_/gzhan yang thams cad sems yin na rnam pa yang sems bzhin du gzugs can ma yin par 'gyur la/_sems kyang rnam pa bzhin du gzugs can du 'gyur ro/_/de bzhin du sems kyang rnam pa bzhin du bems por 'gyur ba'am/_rnam pa yang rig pa dang shes
[\[269b.6\]]par 'gyur ro/_/nam zhig gzung ba dang 'dzin pa'i dri ma dang bral nas zhes bya ba'i thar pa yang khyed la mi 'thad de/_'di ltar phyi rol gyi yul yod par 'dod pa la ni/_rnal 'byor pas yul ngo bo nyid med par rtogs pas/_gzung ba dang 'dzin pa rtogs [#]pa'i phyir 'jig rten las
[\[269b.7\]]'das pa'i rnam par mi rtog pa'i ye shes skye bar 'gyur ba ni rigs pa kho nar 'gyur gyi/_khyed yul med par 'dod pa la ni dang po nyid nas phyi rol gyi don med la phyis kyang de bzhin du gzung ba dang /_'dzin pa'i ngo bo nyid du 'jug par 'gyur ba de phyis rgyu gang gis bzlog_/'jig rten las 'das
[\[270a\]]
[\[270a.1\]]pa'i rnam par mi rtog pa'i ye shes skye bar 'gyur ba'i thabs ci yang med do/_/de bas na khyed 'di skad du/_gang gi tshe gzugs la sogs pa'i dmigs pa rnams sems las phyi rol na mi snang ba de'i tshe rang gi sems kyi chos nyid la nges par gnas pa'i sems ni
[\[270a.2\]]gnyis su med pa'i ye shes zhes bya ste/_de kho na nyid dang /_yang dag pa dang /_'chi ba med pa dang /_sangs rgyas thams cad kyi go 'phang mthar thug pa sku gsum gyi bdag nyid yin no zhes bya ba de ni log par rtogs [#]pa yin no zhes shes par bya'o/_/'di ltar rnam pa med par smra ba
[\[270a.3\]]dag la yang don dam pa'i shes pa med de/_'di skad du smra ste[#]/_'di dag rnam par rig tsam nyid/_/yod pa ma yin don snang phyir/_/dper na rab rib can dag gis/_/skra zla la sogs med mthong bzhin/_/zhes gzhung 'dzugs par byed do/_/rigs pa'i tshogs kyis yul gyi rnam pa
[\[270a.4\]]brdzun par bsgrub cing /_shes pa dang /_ye shes dag don dam par yod par 'dod do/_/de ni rigs pa [#]ma yin te/_'di ltar rigs pa dang /_lung dag gis phyi rol gyi rnam pa brdzun par grub pa nang gi shes pa yang brdzun par grub la/_ji ltar shes pa bden pa ltar rnam pa yang bden pa [#]
[\[270a.5\]]nyid du 'gyur ro/_/gzhan yang khyed rang rig pa zhes bya ba zhig yod par 'dod ces grag na/_de brtag par bya ste/_rig par bya ba dang /_rig pa po dang /_rig pa zhes bya ba gsum las khyed kyis rig par bya ba ni ji lta bu zhig yin/_rig pa po ni ji lta bu zhig yin/_de gnyis ma gtogs
[\[270a.6\]]pa'i [#]rig pa zhes bya ba des ji lta bu zhig rig nas rang rig pa yin/_de bas na rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes zhes bya ba'i tshig gi don dang mi ldan pas sangs rgyas kyi ye shes su yang ji ltar 'gyur/_khyed nyid kyi rigs pas gtan la phab pa'i don de dag la ser sna mi byed par yang
[\[270a.7\]]ston cig_/gal te 'dir rang rig pa yin pas gzhan la bstan par mi nus so zer na/_ji ltar phyi rol pas 'dod pa'i bdag dang khyad par med de/_'di skad du/_bdag ni rtag pa/_gcig pu/_khyab pa/_lus med pa'i [#]zhes pa dang /_'di dang tshul mi 'dra ba ci yang med pas mkhas
[\[270b\]]
[\[270b.1\]]pa su zhig 'di la yid ches par byed/_rang rig pa zhes bya ba dang /_bdag ces bya ba ming [#]so sor btags [#]pa tsam mo/_/chos bdag med pa yang ma rtogs te/_'di nyid bdag tu 'dzin pa chen po yin pas so/_/gzhan yang skyon mang du yod de/re zhig gzhag go/_/'dir rnam pa med
[\[270b.2\]]par smra ba phyir zlog [#]par byed de/_bdag la don dam pa'i shes rab yod do/_/'di ltar nges pa'i don ston pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las/_'di skad du/_byams pa byang chub sems dpa' gzugs kyi bye brag gdags [#]pa rnam pa gsum gyis khong du chud par bya ste/_'di ni
[\[270b.3\]]kun brtags pa'i gzugs so/_/'di ni rnam par brtags pa'i gzugs so/_/'di ni chos nyid kyi gzugs so zhes bya ba la sogs pa rgyas par gsungs pas chos kyi gzugs yul du byed pa'i ye shes don dam pa ni don dam pa'i shes rab yin no zhes so/_/'di ni bcom ldan 'das kyis drang
[\[270b.4\]]ba'i don du gsungs pas don dam pa'i shes rab tu mi 'gyur ro/_/blo gros 'bring po dag gis yang smra ba bsgrub bya sangs rgyas kyang nged kyi lugs la yod de/_bcom ldan 'das kyi zhal snga [#]nas/_'du shes tsam yang spang ba'i phyir/_/rang gi ngo bo brjod du med/_/shes rab rang rig tsam la
[\[270b.5\]]ni/_/de la de bzhin gshegs zhes bya/_/zhes gsungs pas so/_/de bas na/_gnas 'di [#]yongs su gyur pa yis/_/'jig rten 'das pa'i ye shes te/_/de ni zag pa med dang dbyings/_/thub pa chen po'i chos kyi sku/_/nam zhig shes pas dmigs pa kun/_/mi dmigs de yi
[\[270b.6\]]tshe na ni/_/rnam par rig pa tsam la gnas/_/gzung ba med pas de 'dzin med/_/gnas ni yongs su gyur pa yi/_/ye shes lnga dang sku gsum ldan/_/ji srid 'gro nas 'gro don du/_/mig nas mya ngan 'das par [#]bzhugs/_/'dir lung ni bcom ldan 'das kyi zhal nas/_kun brtags
[\[270b.7\]]ngo bo nyid la ni/_/mngon zhen bag chags kun nyon mongs/_/mngon zhen bag chags yod min pa/_/de ni rnam par byang ba yin/_/de la de ni zag bcas pa'i/_/khams yin gnas gyur de nyid ni/_/zag pa med pa'i dbyings yin te/_/de nyid dag pa bla med yin/_/zhes gsungs pas
[\[271a\]]
[\[271a.1\]]so/_/'dir brjod par bya ste/_gnas ni yongs su gyur pa yi/_/zhes bya ba de bden pa [#]ma yin te/_'di'i rigs [#]pa 'phags pa klu sgrub kyi zhal snga [#]nas gsungs te/_gang phyir 'das pa med pas na/_/de phyir ma 'ongs pa yang med/_/gnas ni yongs su gyur pa yi/_/da ltar
[\[271a.2\]]byung ba gang na gnas/_/zhes gsungs pa'i rigs pas gnas yongs su gyur pa mi 'grub pas ye shes lnga yang 'grub par mi 'gyur la/_sku gsum yang ma grub pas khyed la bsgrub bya sangs rgyas de yod pa ma yin no/_/de bas na 'phags pa lang kar gshegs pa las/_ji ltar nad pa so so
[\[271a.3\]]la/_/sman pa sman dag gtong ba ltar/_/de bzhin sangs rgyas sems can la/_/sems tsam du yang rab tu gsungs/_/zhes gsungs so/_/'phags pa klu sgrub kyi zhal snga [#]nas kyang /_'di dag thams cad sems tsam zhes/_/thub pa yis ni gang gsungs pa/_/byis rnams skrag pa spang phyir
[\[271a.4\]]te/_/yang dag tu na de nyid min/_/zhes pa'i rigs pa dang /_'di dag rnam par rig tsam du/_/'gro ba sna tshogs yang dag par/_/gzung dang 'dzin pa'i sbyor ba dang /_/bral ba dbu ma'i blo can la'o/_/zhes kyang gsungs so/_/drang ba'i don gyi yang dag pa'i kun rdzob kyi shes rab gnyis pa rdzogs
[\[271a.5\]]s+ho//_//'phags pa klu sgrub 'phags pa'i lha/_/zla ba grags par phyag byas nas/_/rje btsun dag gi gsung bzhin du/_/bden pa gnyis la 'jug par bya/_/skye ba grangs med de dang der/_/legs par sbyangs pa'i bdag nyid can/_/blo gros bzang po de dag la/_/thams cad mkhyen
[\[271a.6\]]pas nges don gsungs/_/chos rnams chos nyid ston pas ni/_/bstan pa'i snying por gyur pa nyid/_/klu sgrub las ni 'byung [#]ba 'di/_/slob ma dag la bshad par bya/_/ding sang skye bo phal cher ni/_/dbu ma che la sdang bar byed/_/sangs rgyas kun gyi yul 'di ni/_/klu sgrub zhal nas
[\[271a.7\]]byung bas na/_/'di la sdang [#]bar bya mi rigs/_/de ni bde gshegs lung bstan pas/_/sangs rgyas kun la sdang bar 'gyur/_/rnam par smin pa bsam mi khyab/_/'phags pa 'jam dpal gyi man ngag gi mdo las/'jam dpal chos kyi dbyings tshad mar byas nas kun rdzob kyang
[\[271b\]]
[\[271b.1\]]med don dam pa yang med do zhes gsungs pa dang /_rgyal ba bskrun ma chen mo las kyang /chos thams cad ni gdod ma nas skye ba med de/_a'i sgo can no zhes gsungs pas chos kyi dbyings la bden pa gnyis dbyer med par shes par bya'o/_/yang na thog ma med pa
[\[271b.2\]]nas ma rig pa'i ling tog ma thug pos blo gros kyi mig bkab pas dmus long lta bur gyur pa/_dngos por 'dzin pa'i gdon chen po snying la zhugs pas smyon pa lta bur gyur pa/_mi dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyi dbang du song bas nges pa'i don la yid mi ches pa/_dge ba'i bshes
[\[271b.3\]]gnyen dang bral bas lcags kyu med pa'i glang po che ltar rang dbang med par gyur pas bag chags bzhi'i 'ching ba dam pos [#]bcings pa/_dar gyi srin bu ltar gyur pa/_ma rig pa'i gnyid mthug pos [#]log pas rmi lam gyi gnas skabs lta bu'i tshu rol mthong ba'i ngor byas nas sngar
[\[271b.4\]]yang smras mod kyi/_'dir yang bden pa gnyis rnam par dbye bar bya ste/_slob dpon gyi zhal [#]snga nas/_sangs rgyas rnams kyis chos bstan pa/_/bden pa gnyis la yang dag brten/_/'jig rten kun rdzob bden pa dang /_/de bzhin don dam bden pa'o/_/zhes gsungs pas
[\[271b.5\]]de la dang por kun rdzob kyi bden pa slob dpon nyid kyis gsungs pa bzhin du shes par bya'o/_/ji ltar zhe na 'di skad du/_/sgyu ma dang ni rmi lam dang /_/dri za'i grong khyer ji bzhin du/_/de bzhin skye dang de bzhin gnas/_/de bzhin du ni 'jig [#]pa gsungs/_/nyon mongs las dang las can
[\[271b.6\]]lus[#]/_/byed pa po dang 'bras bdag [#]nyid/_/smig rgyu rmi lam ji bzhin te/_/dri za'i grong khyer nyid dang mtshungs/_/yang gsungs pa/_lus dang longs spyod gnas dag dang /_/sa dang pha rol phyin pa dang /_/sangs rgyas rdzu 'phrul cho 'phrul sogs/_/'khor dang mya ngan 'das pa
[\[271b.7\]]dag_/de kun sgyu ma sprul pa dang /_/skra shad 'dzings pa lta bur snang /_/yang gsungs pa/_dang po brgyad dang dgu nyon mongs/_/gnyis dang bcu pa las yin te/_/lhag ma bdun yang sdug bsngal yin/_/bcu gnyis chos ni gsum du 'dus/_/gsum las gnyis 'byung gnyis
[\[272a\]]
[\[272a.1\]]las kyang /_/bdun 'byung srid pa'i 'khor lo ni/_/yang dang yang du 'jug par 'gyur/_/'gro kun rgyu dang 'bras bu ste/_/'di na sems can gzhan ci'ang med/_/stong pa kho na'i chos rnams las/_/stong pa kho na 'byung bar 'gyur/_/kha ton me long mar me rgya/_/me shel
[\[272a.2\]]skyur dang sa bon sgras/_/phung po nying mtshams sbyor ba ni/_/mi 'pho bar yang mkhas rtogs bya/_/shin tu phra ba'i dngos la yang /_/gang gis chad par rnam brtags pa/_/rnam par mi mkhas de yis ni/_/rkyen las byung ba'i don ma mthong /_/zhes gsungs te/_phyi rten cing 'brel
[\[272a.3\]]par 'byung ba'i tshul yang slob dpon nyid kyis mdzad pa'i 'phags pa sA [#]lu ljang pa'i mdo'i 'grel par blta bar bya'o/_/de la don dam pa'i bden [#]pa ni yang slob dpon gyi zhal snga [#]nas/_gang gis rten cing 'brel bar 'byung /_/'gag pa med pa skye med pa/_/chad pa med pa rtag
[\[272a.4\]]med pa/_/tha dad don min don gcig min/_/'ong ba med pa 'gro med pa/_/spros pa nyer zhi zhi ston pa/_/rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas smra rnams kyi/_/dam pa de la phyag 'tshal lo/_/yang slob dpon gyi zhal snga [#]nas/_rnam shes kyang ni 'od gsal dang /_/mya ngan 'das dang kun stong [#]
[\[272a.5\]]dang /_/chos kyi skur yang bshad pa yin/_/zhes gsungs pa dang /_yang /_'di ni don dam bden pa ste/_/snang ba med cing mtshan ma med/_/don dam bden pa zhes bya ba/_/de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyi gnas/_/zhes gsungs so/_/yang gzhan las/_sha yi mig gis
[\[272a.6\]]de lta min/_/lha yi mig gis blta bya min/_/rtog bcas rtog pa med pa yi/_/shes pa yis kyang mthong mi 'gyur/_/zhes gsungs so/_/rje btsun Ar+ya [#]de bas kyang /_/yod min med min yod med min/_/gnyi ga med pa ma yin la/_/mu bzhi las ni rnam grol ba/_/de nyid
[\[272a.7\]]dbu ma pa yis rig_/rtag pa ma yin chad pa min/_/rtag dang chad pa gnyi ga min/_/mtha' bzhi las ni rnam grol ba/_/de don dbu ma pa yis rig_/ces gsungs so/_/slob dpon zla ba grags pa'i zhal snga [#]nas kyang /_zad dang chags bral mya ngan 'das/_/'gog dang stong pa nyid
[\[272b\]]
[\[272b.1\]]zhi ba/_/de bzhin nyid kyi chos rnams kyi/_/rang gi ngo bo yin zhes bshad/_/ces gsungs so/_/rtog bcas rtog pa med pa yi/_/shes pa gnyis kyis 'di mi rtogs[#]/_/sgra dang tshad ma'i tha snyad dag_/de don bsgom la dgos pa med/_/pha rol rgol ba bzlog pa dang /_/bstan bcos
[\[272b.2\]]chen po'i dus dag tu/_/sngon gyi mkhas pas bkod pa bzhin/_/sgra dang tshad ma'ang smra bar bya/_/long ba rang dgar ri [#]bo la/_/'dzegs [#]pas bde ba thob mi 'gyur/_/rjes su dpag pa gtsor 'dzin rnams/_/rnam par ltung bar dka' [#]ma yin/_/ji ltar mun pa'i nang gi rdzas/_/'ol tshogs [#]dag tu
[\[272b.3\]]tshol ba bzhin/_/de bzhin rjes su dpag pas kyang /_/de bzhin don ni shes mi 'gyur/_/long bas rkang pa'i tshod dpag gis/_/nyam nga'i lam du rgyug pa [#]ltar/_/rjes su dpag pa gtsor 'dzin rnams/_/rnam par ltung bar [#]dka' ma yin/_/mgon po bde ba chen pos kyang /_/rang gi [#]rig pa de
[\[272b.4\]]nyid ni/_/gzhan gyis [#]bstan pas mi rtogs te/_/gus par bsgoms [#]pas rtogs 'gyur [#]gyi/_/don de gzhan du rtogs mi 'gyur/_/zhes gsungs so/_/dpal kam pa las kyang /_'di ni rang rig phra ba ste/_/phra ba rnams kyi spyod yul yin/_/bdag cag lta bur gyur pa yi/_/blo gros rtsing bas mi shes
[\[272b.5\]]so/_/zhes gsungs so/_/slob dpon phyogs kyi glang pos kyang /_'di na mya ngan 'das lam grong khyer du/_/de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsung gi nyi ma'i 'od can gyis[#]/_/bdag med shes pa'i 'phags pa stong phrag 'jug_/blo gros rtsing ba dag gi yul ma yin//zhes gsungs so/_/rigs pa
[\[272b.6\]]shes pa rnams kyi mchog rtog ge pa rnams kyi gtsug gi nor bur gyur pa d+harma kIrtis kyang /_de nyid don ni tshol 'dod pas/_rjes dpag gtan tshigs bsten [#]mi bya/_/legs par bsgoms pas myong 'gyur gyi/_/de yis [#]rang rig rtogs pa min/_/de nyid don gyi snying po ni/_/rjes dpag shes pas
[\[272b.7\]]nyams myong min/_/bla ma bzang po bsten byas nas/_/bsgoms [#]pas nyams su myong bar 'gyur/_/bdag gzhan sde pa ma lus pa/_/log pa'i lam du zhugs mthong dang /_/de dag bdag la'ang sdang bas na/_/rjes su dpag pa'ang smra bar bya/_/thog ma med nas rmongs gyur pas/_/
[\[273a\]]
[\[273a.1\]]dang po rig pas blo sbyang bya/_/de rjes bsgom par 'dod pa yis[#]/_/rjes su dpag pa [#]yid rton min/_/zhes de kho na nyid gsal ba las gsungs so/_/'di lta bu'i bden pa gnyis khong du chud pa ni gzhan gyi sde pa dang /_rang gi sde pa'i rgol ba dag la 'jigs [#]pa dang /_bag
[\[273a.2\]]tsha ba ni ci yang med de/_tshul gnyis shing rta zhon byas te/_/rigs pa'i srab kyis bsrabs byas nas/_/lung gi lam du legs par zhugs/_/bla ma'i man ngag lcag gis gzhu[#]/_/skye ba med pa ji lta ba bzhin du khong du chud pa'i mkhas pa rnams kyi kun rdzob pa'i dngos po gang la yang chags pa
[\[273a.3\]]dang sdang ba dang rmongs pa med de/_chos rnams kyi chos nyid dngos po'i [#]de kho na nyid shes pa'i phyir ro/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_'jig rten pa'i rnal 'byor [#]nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched dang /_rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched dang /_ci yang med pa'i skye mched dang /_yod min med min skye mched
[\[273a.4\]]bsgoms pa [#]dag kyang re zhig gzugs kyi 'du shes dang /_thogs pa'i 'du shes rnams thams cad du nub cing /_de bzhin du rnam par thar pa brgyad dang /_zil gyis gnon [#]pa'i skye mched dang /_zad par gyi skye mched bsgom pa goms pa'i mjug [#]tu gzugs kyi 'du shes spong bar 'gyur na theg
[\[273a.5\]]pa chen po bla na med pa'i rnal 'byor pa bskal pa dpag tu med pa'i dngos po'i ngo bo nyid med par shin tu goms pa bsgoms pa stong pa nyid bco brgyad dang /_rnam par thar pa'i sgo gsum mthar phyin pa la gnas pa rnams gzugs su 'dzin par 'gyur ba lta smos kyang ci dgos te/_nam mkha'i
[\[273a.6\]]dbus su bdag med cing /_/chos kyi dbyings la thim pa ni/_/shes rab pha rol phyin pa ste/_/mthong bya mthong byed mthong ba med/_/'dir rang gi sde pa dngos por 'dzin pa shas che ba dag ma bzod nas shin tu rngams nas rgol bar byed de/_khyed dbu ma pa dag ni rang gi 'dod pa khas mi len
[\[273a.7\]]cing gzhan sun 'byin pas/_co 'dri bar byed pas g.yo sgyu can yin pa dang /_skye ba med pa ni med pa nyid [#]yin no snyam nas/_med pa nyid kho nar lta ba dang /_rgyu dang /_'bras bu dang /_bden pa dang /_dkon mchog la sogs pa'i chos thams cad la skur pa btab pas chad
[\[273b\]]
[\[273b.1\]]par [#]smra ba yin pa dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa'i lung la skur pa 'debs shing lung gis khyed la gnod pa dang /_mngon sum la skur pa btab cing mngon sum gyis khyed la gnod pa dang /_rjes su dpag pas gnod cing de la skur pa btab par 'gyur ba dang /_grags pas gnod cing de la
[\[273b.2\]]skur pa gdab [#]pa dang /_khas blangs pas gnod pa de/_bdag nyid kyang phung la gzhan mkhas pa dag kyang lam 'di la btsud pas phung bar byed pas/_gzhung lugs 'di gtang bar [#]bya'o zhes so/_/de la 'dir brjod par bya ste/_kye ma 'khor ba thog ma med pa nas/_ma rig pa'i mig
[\[273b.3\]]nad chen pos blo gros kyi mig bkab pas rang de las ma thar pa/_zab mo'i tshul ston pa dag la [#]dgrar 'du shes shing rna ba 'gebs par byed pa/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i nges pa'i don gyi lung ji lta ba bzhin du ma rtogs pa tshogs rnam pa gnyis ma bsags pas tshul 'di lta bu la mos pa
[\[273b.4\]]dang /_thos pa dang /_'jug pa'i skabs med pa dag nyon cig_/skye bo yi ni chos lugs dang /_/shing rta chen po'i lam yin te/_/phyogs su lhung ba'i dug spangs nas/_/gzu bo'i blo yis bshad par bya/_/khyed kyi rgol ba dang po'i skyon gyi dri ma med de/_mthong ba med pa nyid de [#]mchog
[\[273b.5\]]mthong ba'o zhes gsungs pas mthong ba med pa'i don de la ji lta bu zhig yod nas [#]ji ltar khas blang bar [#]bya ba/_slob dpon nyid kyi zhal nas/_gal te dngos shig yod na ni/_/khas ni blang bar bya dgos na/_/dngos po skye ba med nyid la/_/khas blang ba ni ji ltar bya/_/zhes gsungs so/_/bdag
[\[273b.6\]]cag dbu ma pa la ni khas blang bar bya ba'i dngos po ni rdul phra rab 'bum du gshags [#]pa'i tshad kyang bstan du med do/_/khas blangs pa yi dngos po ni/_/phra rab tsam yang yod min te/_/gdod nas skye ba med pa'i phyir/_/mo gsham gyi ni bu bzhin no/_/dper na bud med mo gsham la/_/khyod kyi
[\[273b.7\]]bu ni gang yin dris/_/de la de ni yod min pas/_/smra bar nus pa ma yin no/_/de bas na bdag cag dbu ma pa'i shes rab kyi mdun na yod pa dang med pa la sogs pa'i dngos po khyed kyi 'dod pa lta bu ci yang med de/_chos thams cad skye ba med cing brjod du med pa'i phyir ro/_/rgol ba gnyis pa'i
[\[274a\]]
[\[274a.1\]]skyon gyi dri ma yod pa ma yin te/_'di ltar yod pa ma yin pa de la dngos por 'dzin par byed pa de dag ni smad par 'gyur te/_mdo sde las/_bdag tu 'dzin pa ri rab tsam yang bla'i/_stong pa nyid du lta ba ni de lta ma yin te/_gsor mi rung ba'i lta ba'o zhes gsungs pa dang /_
[\[274a.2\]]'phags pa rgyan stug po las kyang /_ri rab ri bo tsam gyur pa'i/_/bdag tu lta bas mi gnod kyi/_/stong nyid lta bas gnod pa ni/_/nga rgyal mi bden brtags pas so/_/rnal 'byor spyod pas stong pa nyid/_/gnas min pa la sbyar mi bya/_/gang la [#]gnas min sbyar gyur na/_/bdud rtsi dug
[\[274a.3\]]tu 'gyur ba yin/_/lta ba ji snyed gang yang rung /_/lus can rnams la yod pa yi/_/lta ba rnam par spang ba'i phyir/_/stong pa nyid kyi tshul bstan to/_/stong pa nyid kyi lta thos kyang /_/la la'i lta ba ma zhig na/_/gsor mi rung pa'i lta ba can/_/sman pas btang pa'i nad pa bzhin/_/zhes
[\[274a.4\]]gsungs so/_/bdag cag dbu ma pa ni de ltar 'dod pa ma yin te[#]/_don 'di la dgongs nas/_slob dpon gyi zhal snga [#]nas kyang /_skye med ces dang stong zhes dang /_/bdag med ces pas stong pa nyid/_/dman pa bdag nyid gang smra ba/_/de ni 'di na bdag bsgom mo/_/zhes gsungs pa yin no/_/
[\[274a.5\]]des na dngos po yod pa nyid bkag nas med pa'i ngo bo nyid du 'dod na ni de ltar yang 'gyur ba zhig na/_gang gi phyir kho bo mtha' gnyis spangs pas/_dbu ma'i lam ston pa'i phyir med pa nyid kyang 'gog par byed de/_dngos rnams med ces bya ba'i blo/_/don bzhin yin par mi 'dod de/_/rtog
[\[274a.6\]]pa'i sgo nas grub pa'i phyir/_/mtho yor la ni mi blo bzhin/_/gang dag 'di skad ces dngos po rnams ni gcig tu yod pa nyid kyang ma yin te/_rgyu'i skad cig ma 'gags pa'i phyir ro/_/gcig tu med pa yang ma yin te/_'bras bu'i skad cig ma skyes pa'i phyir ro/_/de'i blo ni yod med kyi ngo bo nyid
[\[274a.7\]]kho na'o zhes zer ba la bshad pa/_yod med blo ni rtogs bya ba/_/bkag phyir de bzhin mkhas rnams kyis[#]/_/rnam par mi rtog [#]blo gros ni/_/skye ba med pa'i tshul gyis te/_/gang phyir stong nyid stong sogs kyi/_/ngo bo stong nyid de yi phyir/_/mkhas pa stong pa nyid la yang /_/stong pa nyid du lta mi 'gyur/_/
[\[274b\]]
[\[274b.1\]]chos rnams kun du ma grub phyir/_/gang la rnam par mi rtog pa'i/_/blo yang skye bar mi 'gyur ba/_/klu sgrub de ltar bzhed pa yin/_/de bas na slob dpon nyid kyi zhal [#]nas/_gang blo yod dang med pa las/_/rnam par 'das shing mi gnas pa/_/de dag zab mo dmigs med pa'i/_/rkyen gyi
[\[274b.2\]]don la rnam par bsgom/_/yang /_blo chung gang gis yod nyid dang /_/med nyid du ni mthong ba dag_/de yi spros pa nyer zhi ba'i/_/sgom pa mthong ba ma yin no/_/gang zhig bdag dngos gzhan dngos dang /_/dngos dang dngos med mthong lta ba/_/[#]de yi sangs rgyas bstan pa la/_/de nyid mthong
[\[274b.3\]]ba ma yin no/_/yang /_yod ces bya ba rtag par [#]lta/_/med ces pa ni chad par lta/_/zhes bya ba la [#]sogs pa rgyas par gsungs so/_/slob dpon Ar+ya de bas kyang /_/yod min med min yod med min/_/gnyi ga min pa ma yin te/_/mtha' bzhi las ni rnam grol ba/_/de nyid dbu ma pa
[\[274b.4\]]yis rig/_/ces gsungs pa'i rigs pa dang /lung gi khungs kyang 'phags pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las/_gang zhig yod pa ma yin de ni med ces bya/_/yod dang med pa 'di gnyis med pa'i chos yin te/_/byis pa rnams kyis de brtags yod dang med par byed/_/ces gsungs so/_/
[\[274b.5\]]yang bcom ldan 'das kyis/_yod dang med pa 'di gnyis mtha' yin te/_/dag dang ma dag 'di yang mtha' nyid yin/_/de bas mtha' gnyis rnam par spangs nas su/_/mkhas pas dbus la'ang gnas par mi byed do/_/zhes gsungs so/_/rgol ba gsum pa'i skyon gyi dri ma yang med
[\[274b.6\]]de phyi rol bdag ni 'di skad du/_bzang mo legs par g.yos la zo/_/shi nas spyang ki'i rjes dang 'dra/_/ma shi bar du bde bar 'tsho/_/shi nas de yi spyod yul med/_/lus kyang thal ba bzhin song nas/_/slar skye ba [#]yang ga la 'gyur/_/de phyir snga phyi yod pa min/_/tshe 'di nyid la bde ba'i
[\[274b.7\]]phyir/_/lha mchod 'dre srin mnan byas nas/_/btsan phyug mthu stobs 'grub par 'gyur/_/zhes zer te/_de lta bu'i chad par smra ba dang /_bdag cag dbu ma pa lta ba ga la gcig_/de dag ni rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba dang /_rgyu dang 'bras bu dang /_bden pa dang /_dkon mchog la sogs
[\[275a\]]
[\[275a.1\]]pa la skur pa 'debs pas chad par smra ba yin no/_/bdag cag dbu ma pa ni bden pa gnyis kyi tshul la gnas pas chad par smra bar mi 'gyur te/_ji lta [#]zhe na/_'di ltar kun rdzob kyi tshul gyis kyang chad par smra ba ma yin te/_slob dpon gyi zhal snga nas/_ma rig dang po rga shi mtha'/_/
[\[275a.2\]]rten 'brel bcu gnyis ga la yod/_/sgyu ma rmi lam 'dra ba ru/_/rten 'brel bcu gnyis nged 'dir 'dod/_/ces nang [#]rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba gsungs so/_/phyi rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba yang rigs pa shes pa'i mchog d+harma kIrtis ji skad du/_myu gu sogs dang sngon po sogs/_/nus mthong
[\[275a.3\]]kun rdzob 'dod ce na/_/de skad zer na de ltar zad/_/ces gsungs so/_/lung gi khungs kyang ji skad du/_dge dang mi dge gang phyir dngos med kyang /_/de lta 'ang dge ba nyid kyang mi dge min/_/'jig rten kun rdzob chu yi zla 'dra bas/_/dge ba yid 'ong sdug bsngal rtag mi dben/_/zhes gsungs
[\[275a.4\]]so/_/de bzhin du dkon mchog gsum la'ang skur pa btab pa ma yin te/_'di ltar dkon mchog gsum ni bdag cag dbu ma pa'i rnal 'byor bsgom [#]pa las 'byung ba yin la/_de yang kun rdzob tu yin te/_bcom ldan 'das kyis ji skad du/_dngos grub rnams kyang kun rdzob pa/_/sangs rgyas
[\[275a.5\]]rdo rje sems dpa' nyid/_/kun rdzob nyid du rab grub 'gyur/_/zhes gsungs pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang /_nga ni thob pa med pa kho nar byang chub kyi snying por langs so zhes gsungs so/_/de bzhin du tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu/_thob pa yang yod[#]/_/mngon par rtogs pa yang yod de/_
[\[275a.6\]]de ni 'jig rten gyi tha snyad kyis gnyis su brjod par zad kyi/_don dam par ni yod pa ma yin no zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs pa lta bu'o/_/de bas na thob pa dang /_mngon par rtogs pa dang 'bras bu ni kun rdzob tu yin no/_/gzhan yang snying rje chen po las byung ba'i byang chub kyi sems dang
[\[275a.7\]]ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa' gang 'di snyam du don dam par ni chos thams cad gdod ma [#]nas skye ba med kyang /_kun rdzob tu 'gro ba lnga po'i sems can 'di dag sdug bsngal gyi chu bo las ji ltar bsgral bar bya/_bsdu ba'i dngos po bzhi la sogs pa'i thabs dam pa rnams kyis 'di dag
[\[275b\]]
[\[275b.1\]]thams cad gcig kyang ma lus par rdzogs pa'i byang chub chen po la 'god par bya'o/_/nam zhig na bdag mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing der nyan thos dang /_rang sangs rgyas dang /_sems can dang /_sdug bsngal ba zhes bya ba'i ming yang grag par ma gyur [#]
[\[275b.2\]]gyur cig snyam du sems pa'i sems can chen po la chad par smra ba ga la yod/_slob dpon gyi zhal snga nas kyang /_rab lus sbyin par btang ba ni/_/ngo mtshar che ba ma yin gyi/_/chos 'di stong par shes nas su/_/las kyi 'bras bu sten byed pa/_/ngo mtshar las kyang de ngo mtshar/_/rmad
[\[275b.3\]]byung las kyang de rmad byung /_/yang /_stong nyid lta bas lta byed cing /_/rtag tu lus ngag yid dag gis/_/'di ltar sems can don byed la/_/chad par smra ba ga la yod/_/ces gsungs so/_/lung gi khungs kyang 'phags pa 'od srungs kyis zhus pa las/_chos thams cad skye ba med pa nyid du
[\[275b.4\]]shes kyang /_las kyi rnam par smin pa la yid ches pa dang /_chos thams cad bdag med pa nyid du [#]khong du chud kyang sems can thams cad la snying rje chen po skyed pa dang /_sbyin pa rgya chen po btang [#]yang rnam par smin pa la mi re ba dang /_sbyor ba khams gsum na byed kyang bsam pa mya ngan las
[\[275b.5\]]'das pa'o zhes gsungs so/_/don dam pa'i tshul gyis kyang chad par smra ba ma yin te/_'di ltar mi ngas kyis [#]skye bo bsad pa dang /_tho bas bum pa bcom pa 'am/_mes shing bsregs pa ltar dngos po don dam par grub pa yod pa ma yin no zhes zer na chad par smra ba yin pa las/_chos
[\[275b.6\]]rnams kyi chos nyid sangs rgyas 'jig rten du byung yang rung ma byung yang rung gdod ma nas skye ba dang bral ba yin pas/_slob dpon zla ba grags pa'i zhal nas/_zad dang chags bral mya ngan 'das/_/'gog dang stong pa zhi ba nyid/_/de bzhin nyid kyang chos rnams kyi/_/rang gi ngo bo yin zhes bshad/_/
[\[275b.7\]]ces gsungs so/_/skye ba med ces bstan pa ni/_/dngos por 'dzin pa rnams phyir yin/_/chos rnams ye nas skye med la/_/skye med tha snyad sgro btags tsam/_/dngos med nyid kyang ma grub na/_/der ni dngos po ga la zhig_/dngos po gdod nas med nyid la/_/chad ces pa de rigs pa min/_/bdag
[\[276a\]]
[\[276a.1\]]cag la chad par smra ba'i dri ma med de/_slob dpon gyi zhal snga nas/_dngos por khas len yod na ni/_/de la chad sogs 'jigs pa 'byung /_/dngos por khas len med rnams la/_/chad sogs 'jigs pa ga la 'byung /_/gal te dngos shig yod na ni/_/de la 'jig
[\[276a.2\]]rten mtha' yod dang /_/mtha' med la sogs par yang 'gyur/_/zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i bar du gsungs so/_/dper na skyes bu zhig 'di skad du/_nam mkha' ni med do/_/nam mkha'i ut+pal dang /_pad+ma ni med do zhes zer na/_chad par smra ba yin nam/_'dir lung gi khungs kyang
[\[276a.3\]]'phags pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa chen mo las kyang /[#]rab 'byor gzugs dngos po grub pa yod pa zhig na ni stong pa dang /_mi stong pa dang /_dben pa dang /_mi dben pa dang /_bde ba dang /_mi bde ba dang /_zhi ba dang /_ma zhi ba la sogs par 'gyur ba zhig na/_gzugs dngos
[\[276a.4\]]por grub pa med ces bya ba la sogs pa gsungs nas rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa'i bar du rgyas par gsungs so/_/rgol ba bzhi pa'i skyon gyis kyang gos par mi 'gyur te/_ji lta [#]zhe na/_ji [#]ltar khyed nyan thos dang /_rnal 'byor spyod pa'i khungs kyi lung thams cad ni drang ba'i don no zhes sngar
[\[276a.5\]]rgyas par bshad zin pas de dag la yang nged dbu ma pa skur pa 'debs par mi byed de/_de dag rim gyis 'dren par byed pa'i thabs yin te/_dgongs pa bzhi dang /_ldem por dgongs pa bzhi bzhin no/_/lung gis gnod pa yang de ni 'di ltar/_chos chen po'i me long gi mdo las
[\[276a.6\]]gsungs pa'i lta ba ngan pa bco brgyad po de dag gis gnod do zhe na/_dbu ma pa la ni de dag gis [#]gnod pa med de/_de dag ni bden pa gnyis kyi tshul spangs nas/_'di skad du/_gang med pa'i don de ni de [#]kho na nyid yin te/_ci yang med de/_thams cad rang bzhin gyis rnam par dag pa'o/_/
[\[276a.7\]]yang kun rdzob kyi dngos po ni kun rdzob tu med do zhes zer ba de lta bu'i log par lta ba 'dzin pa ni tshar bcad pa'i 'os yin pas/_rgyang bsrings te bshad par bya'o/_/rgol ba lnga pa dang drug pa dang /_bdun pa dang /_brgyad pa'i skyon gyi dri mas kyang gos par mi 'gyur te/_kun rdzob kyi bden par
[\[276b\]]
[\[276b.1\]]snang ba'i phreng ba 'di dag [#]thams cad khas blangs pas de dag la skur ba btab pa yang ma yin no/_/yang don dam par zhes dam bcas pa/_de dag gis gnod par yang [#]mi 'gyur te/_'di ltar mngon sum gyis kyang mi gnod do/_/yul rnams log pa yin pa'i phyir dang /_dbang po rnams
[\[276b.2\]]blun pa'i phyir dang /_mthong ba la sogs pa'i nus pa med bzhin du rab rib can la skra dang /_sbrang bu dang /_khab 'dzag pa la sogs pa snang ba lta bu dang /_brag ca la sogs pa grag pa ltar mngon sum yang mngon pa'i nga rgyal yin pas de'i phyir gang la ci zhig mngon sum du gyur nas des
[\[276b.3\]]gnod par 'gyur/_de bas na mngon sum gyi gnod pa med do[#]/_/rjes su dpag pas kyang gnod pa med do[#]/_/don dam par 'ga' yang grub pa med pas so[#]/_/grags pas kyang gnod pa med de/_gang gi phyir 'jig rten ni mi shes pa'i ling thog gis mdongs [#]pa yin pas don dam pa
[\[276b.4\]]dpyad pa'i skabs su de ni nor bu rin po che brtag pa'i skabs su dmus long ma gtogs pa bzhin du 'jig rten pa skabs 'dir mi gtogs pas grags pa'i gnod pa med do/_/bden pa gnyis kyi tshul la gnas pas khas blangs pa'i gnod pa yang med do/_/tshul gnyis shing rtar
[\[276b.5\]]zhugs byas nas/_/rigs pa'i kha lo legs bsgyur te/_/lung gi lam du zhugs byas nas/_/lam log par ni 'gro mi 'gyur/_/ji ltar 'dab shog [#]ma nyams bya/_/bar snang gcod pa thogs pa med/_/de bzhin tshul gnyis ldan pa yang /_/chos rnams kun la thogs pa med/_/ji
[\[276b.6\]]ltar seng ge'i nga ro yis/_/gcan gzan thams cad skrag cing 'jigs/_/de bzhin stong nyid seng ge'i sgras/_/rgol ba thams cad 'jigs shing skrag_/dngos po med la dbang thob pas/_/de phyir dngos po kun bdag nyid/_/rang gzhan sde pa thams cad la/_/seng ge'i nga ro smra ba yin/_/
[\[276b.7\]]nges pa'i don gyi yang dag pa'i kun rdzob kyi skabs rdzogs so//_//de la don dam pa'i shes rab ji lta bu zhe na/_rtog pa'i dri ba [#]ma lus pa_/bsal bar gyur pa gang yin dang /_/zhi dang so so [#]rang rig dang /_/rnam rtog med cing yi ge med/_/gcig dang tha dad nyid bral ba/_/mkha'
[\[277a\]]
[\[277a.1\]]ltar dri med de nyid la/_/'jug pa med par 'jug pa ni/_/shes rab don dam shes par bya/_/rtog bcas rtog pa med pa yi/_/shes pa gnyis las log gyur na/_/de tshe blo la yul med pas/_/spros pa nye bar zhi bar 'gyur/_/gang tshe shes dang shes bya dag_/chos kyi
[\[277a.2\]]dbyings su gyur pas na/_/de tshe nam mkha' ltar gyur pas/_/spros pa nye bar zhi bar gyur[#]/_/ji srid yid kyis [#]log g.yo ba/_/de srid bdud kyi spyod yul yin/_/yid kyi g.yo bzhi gyur na/_/shes rab gnyis kyang shes mi 'gyur/_/don dam pa'i shes rab kyi skabs rdzogs so//_//
[\[277a.3\]]de lta bu'i zab cing rgya che ba'i lam du su zhig 'jug ce na/_dpag med skye ba de dang der/_/sbyang ba byas pa'i bdag nyid can/_/pha rol phyin drug goms byas pa'i/_/sems can chen po'i spyod yul yin/_/mdo nas ji ltar bstan pa ni/_/ma bstan sbyin sogs ldan pa yin[#]/_/rang
[\[277a.4\]]bzhin dang ni goms pa yi/_/rigs can de yi spyod yul yin/_/ji skad du/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mngon par rtogs pa'i rgyan las/_sangs rgyas rnams la bsnyen bkur byas/_/de la dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed/_/dge ba'i bshes kyis mgon byas pa/_/'di mnyan pa yi
[\[277a.5\]]snod yin no/_/zhes gsungs so/_/gzhan nas kyang /_dri za'i grong khyer lta bu [#]ni/_/bden pa gnyis kyis mtshon pa dag_/dpag med bskal pa mang po ru/_/bsgoms pas dag pa'i blo can la'o/_/zhes gsungs so/_/rje btsun 'phags pa lha'i zhal snga [#]nas kyang /_shes rab che dang
[\[277a.6\]]thabs che dang /_/brtse ba che dang mos pa nyid/_/theg pa chen por yang dag bstan/_/sems can chen po'i spyod yul yin/_/zhes gsungs so/_/de bas na kun rdzob kyi bden pa'i tshul gyis rgya che ba'i pha rol tu phyin pa lnga dang /_bsdu ba'i dngos po bzhi dang /_'phags pa'i nor la sogs pa snga
[\[277a.7\]]ma dag tu goms par byas pa dang /_don dam pa'i tshul gyis zab pa'i gnas dag la bsgom par gyur pa dag 'jug go/_/de bas na mgon po byams pas yang 'di skad du/_sangs rgyas bsnyen bkur yang dag zhugs/_/sbyin dang tshul khrims sogs spyad pas/_/snod du de ni dam pa [#]
[\[277b\]]
[\[277b.1\]]bzhed/_/ces rgyal ba skyed [#]ma las gsungs so/_/'phags pa ye shes kyi [#]phyag rgya'i ting nge 'dzin gyi mdo las/_phyi ma'i tshe phyi ma'i dus su sangs rgyas brgya dang /_stong dang khri dang /_'bum la dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pas na [#]ting nge 'dzin 'di thob [#]pa dang /_mos pa dang /_don go ba dang /_stong
[\[277b.2\]]pa nyid la bzod pa dang /_ting nge 'dzin thob pa dang /_spobs pa skye bar mi 'gyur ro/_/sangs rgyas bye ba phrag la bsnyen bkur byas pas ni de dag las bzod pa thob pa dang /_ting nge 'dzin 'di thob pa dang /_spobs pa skye bar mi 'gyur ro/_/sangs rgyas sa ya la bsnyen bkur byas pas ni
[\[277b.3\]]phyi ma'i tshe 'di thos pa dang /_mos pa dang /_spong bar mi 'gyur ba dang /_yid ches pa dang /_don rtogs pa dang /_gzhan la ston pa dang /_chos la bzod pa thob par 'gyur yang /_ting nge 'dzin thob par mi 'gyur/_spobs pa skye bar mi 'gyur ro/_/sangs rgyas bye ba phrag brgyad cu la bsnyen
[\[277b.4\]]bkur byas pa dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa dang /_byang chub tu sems bskyed pas ni thams cad thob par 'gyur ro zhes gsungs so/_/de bas na slob dpon 'phags pa klu sgrub kyi zhal snga nas kyi [#]gzhung lugs dbu ma chen po'i don 'di ni u dum bA [#]ra ltar rnyed par dka' ba yin par shes par bya'o/_/bde ba
[\[277b.5\]]chen po'i zhal snga nas kyang /_dri za'i grong khyer lta bu [#]ni/_/bden pa gnyis kyis mtshon pa dag_/dpag med bskal pa mang po ru/_/bsgoms pas dag pa'i blo can la'o/_/zhes gsungs so/_/slob dpon rje btsun zla ba grags pa'i zhal snga nas kyang /_so so skye bo'i dus na stong nyid thos[#]/_/
[\[277b.6\]]nang gi dga' ba yang dang yang ni 'byung /_/dga' ba las byung mig ni mchi mas gang /_/lus kyi ba spu ldang ba'ang skye bar 'gyur/_/gang yin de la byang chub sa bon yod/_/don dam bden pa de la bstan par bya/_/de rtogs [#]pa yi yon tan de las byung /_/chos kyi dbyings la mnga' brnyes pas/_/
[\[277b.7\]]chos kyi dbyings kyi bdag nyid gyur/_/skye med seng ge'i nga ro can/_/'phags pa klu sgrub la phyag 'tshal/_/so so skye bo'i shes pa tshu rol mthong ba dag_/de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsung rab la zhugs nas de kho na nyid len par 'dod pas/_'phags pa klu sgrub kyi zhal snga nas kyi gcig nas gcig
[\[278a\]]
[\[278a.1\]]tu brgyud pa'i slob dpon dag btsal ba la 'bad par rigs so/_/'dir rgyu'i stobs can dag ji ltar 'jug par bya zhe na thog mar skyabs [#]su 'gro ba sngon du song bas/_bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed cing /_byang chub sems dpa'i lhag pa'i
[\[278a.2\]]tshul khrims kyi bslab pa blang bar bya'o/_/de yang bslab pa bzhi brgya pa [#]dang /_rtsa ba'i ltung ba brgyad dang /_pham pa bcu dang /_ltung ba bzhi bcu rtsa brgyad dang /_slob dpon klu sgrub kyi zhal snga nas/_ji ltar bkod pa rnams dang /_'phags pa thogs med kyis [#]/_mdo sde las
[\[278a.3\]]btus pa'i bslab pa'i grangs nges par byas pa de dag ni las dang po pa blo gros dman pa dag gi phyir 'di [#]yin te/_'di ltar bslab pa la grangs nges par 'dod cing /_gzhung 'di'i bslab pa'i tshul [#]ni bslab par mi bya'o zhes zer na ni byang chub sems dpa'i 'khrul pa yin te/_'di
[\[278a.4\]]ltar sems can yongs su smin par bya ba dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos yongs su rdzogs par bya ba dang /_myur du mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'dod pas/_bcom ldan 'das kyis mdo sde du mar gsungs pa'i bslab pa ma lus par bsrung bar bya'o/_/ltung ba las ldang ba yang blo gros
[\[278a.5\]]dman pa kha cig gis ni gzhung las ji ltar 'byung ba bzhin du gang zag gi mdun du bshags par bya'o/_/gzhan 'phags pa chos bzhi'i mdo dang /_'phags pa phung po gsum pa dang /_'phags pa las kyi sgrib pa rgyun gcod pa'i mdo dang /_'phags pa nye ba [#]'khor gyis zhus pa'i ltung
[\[278a.6\]]ba bshags pa'i cho gas ltung ba las ldang bar bya'o/_/byang chub sems dpa' blo gros bzang ba kha cig gis ni nam mkha'i snying po'i mdo dang /_'phags pa sman gyi bla bai DUr+ya 'od kyi rgyal po'i mdo dang /_gzungs kyi mdo sde las gsungs pa'i cho gas nga ba las ldang bar bya'o/_/byang
[\[278a.7\]]chub sems dpa' blo gros mchog tu gyur pa ni 'di ltar chos thams cad skye ba med par bsgoms pas so/_/de'i don yang 'phags pa theg pa chen po'i man ngag gi mdo las de ltung ba 'dul ba gang zhe na/_ltung ba ni [#]yul na mi gnas pa/_phyogs na mi gnas pa/_phung por ma
[\[278b\]]
[\[278b.1\]]gyur pa/_gzung ba med pa/_snang ba med pa'o/_/sems gang gis ltung bar gyur pa de yang zad pa/_bral ba rnam par gyur pa/yul na mi gnas pa/_phyogs na mi gnas pa/_phung por ma gyur pa/_gzung ba med pa/_snang ba med pa'o/_/sems ji lta ba de bzhin du
[\[278b.2\]]ltung ba yang de bzhin no/_/ltung ba ji lta bar chos thams cad de bzhin no/_/rtsa ba med pa'o/_/mi gnas pa'o/_/sems gang la som nyi med pa dang /_rnyog pa med pa dang /_dang ba dang /_zhi ba dang /_yongs su gdung ba med pa dang /_gsal ba dang /_shin tu byang ba dang /_
[\[278b.3\]]bla ma'i tshig la mos pa dang /_gcig tu nges par the tshom med cing yid ches pa 'di ni ltung ba 'dul ba'o zhes gsungs so/_/ji skad du/_gang gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di las tha na tshig bzhi pa'i tshigs su bcad pa gcig blangs te/_'chang ngam/_klog gam/_tshul bzhin
[\[278b.4\]]du yid la byed na de'i tshe rabs snga ma'i mi dge ba de [#]dag tshe 'di nyid la ma lus par zad par 'gyur ro zhes yum chen mo las gsungs te/_'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i don sgom [#]par byed na lta smos kyang ci dgos/_'phags pa chos thams cad 'byung ba med par bstan pa las kyang /_'jam
[\[278b.5\]]dpal byang chub sems dpa' gang gis las med cing rnam par smin pa med par shes pa des las kyi sgrib pa rnam par dag pa thob po zhes gsungs so/_/klu'i rgyal po rgya mtshos zhus pa las kyang /_klu'i rgyal po chos bzhis las kyi sgrib pa rgyun chad par 'gyur te/_bzhi gang zhe na/_'di
[\[278b.6\]]lta ste/_stong pa nyid la nges par sems pa dang /_mtshan ma med pa la nges par sems pa dang /_smon pa dang bral ba dang /_mngon par 'du byed pa med par shes pa ste/_bzhi po de dag go zhes gsungs so/_/gzhan yang de bzhin gshegs pas gsang ba'i mdo dang /_las kyi sgrib
[\[278b.7\]]pa rnam par dag pa'i mdo la sogs pa du ma nas don 'di dag gnas so/_/'di ltar mos pa spyod pa'i sa gsum sbyangs nas/_'jig rten las 'das pa'i lam skye bar 'gyur te/_ji lta [#]zhe na/_zhi gnas dang lhag mthong gi rnal 'byor gyis so/_/'di ltar rtsod pa'i rtsa bar gyur
[\[279a\]]
[\[279a.1\]]cing /_'khrug long du byed pa ni rnam par rtog pa yin la/_de nyid ni rlung yin te/_bgrang ba dang /_'gag pa la goms par bya'o/_/bgrang dang rjes 'gro rtog [#]pa dang /_/rtog pa dang ni bsgyur [#]ba dang /_/yang [#]dag rnam pa 'di drug ni/_/dbugs rngubs [#]'byung ba dran par 'dod/_/gcig nas bcu nas
[\[279a.2\]]brgya yi bar[#]/_/nang du 'jug pa bgrang bar bya/_/rlung de dbang du gyur pa na/_/lus la bde ba 'byung bar 'gyur/_/de [#]rjes khri phrag bcur bgrangs na/_/lo lngar tshe ni bsring bar byed/_/khri phrag nyi shu la sogs par/_/bgrangs pas bcu sogs bgrang [#]bar bya/_/pu ra ka dang tse ra ka_/kum+ba ka ste 'gag [#]pa'o/_/chung dang
[\[279a.3\]]'bring dang chen po yi/_/tshad ni rnam pa gsum yin no/_/bsgom pa [#]gang zhig lung dang ni/_/rigs pa dang yang mi 'gal la/_/bla ma'i man ngag rab ldan pa'i/_/bsgom pa de ni bsgom [#]par 'os/_/slob dpon chen po 'phags pa klu sgrub kyi zhal snga nas/_dbu ma chen po'i man ngag ni 'di yin te/_stan bde ba la
[\[279a.4\]]skyil mo krung gis 'dug ste/_'gro ba lnga po sems can gyi khams la bltas la/_'di dag ni rang rang gi rnam par rtog pa'i bag chags kyis rmongs par gyur cing sdug bsngal brgya rtsa bcus gdungs par gyur pas 'di dag ma bsgral [#]ba bsgral bar bya'o/_/[#]dbugs ma phyin pa dbugs dbyung bar bya'o/_/
[\[279a.5\]]yongs su mya ngan las ma 'das pa yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar bya'o zhes snying rje las byung ba'i byang chub kyi sems mngon du byas nas sngar gyi zhi gnas la brtan pa thob pa dang /_slob dpon zla ba grags pa'i zhal [#]nas/_dngos po ni gnyis te/_gzugs can dang /_gzugs can ma yin
[\[279a.6\]]no/_/[#]gzugs can ni gnyis te/_'byung ba dang /_'byung ba las gyur pa'o/_/gzugs can ma yin pa'i chos ni gnyis te/_'dus byas dang /_'dus ma byas so/_/'dus byas kyi chos ni gsum ste/_sems dang /_sems las byung ba dang ldan pa ma yin pa'o/_/'dus ma byas kyi chos ni bzhi
[\[279a.7\]]ste/_so sor brtags pa'i 'gog pa dang /_so sor brtags pa ma yin pa dang /_nam mkha' dang /_chos rnams kyi de bzhin nyid do zhes gsungs med kyi/_'on kyang 'di dngos po'i chos bsdus par gyur na ni 'di ltar gnyis te/_gzugs can dang /_gzugs can ma yin pa'o/_/
[\[279b\]]
[\[279b.1\]]'di ltar gzugs can yang rdul phra rab kyi [#]cha shas su snang ba med par 'gyur la/_rdul phra rab kyang phyogs cha'i bye brag gis mthar snang ba med par 'gyur ro/_/gzugs med pa'i sems yin te/_de 'ang re zhig sems dang sems las byung ba dag ni skad cig mar 'jug pa yin la/_
[\[279b.2\]]de yang sngon [#]da ltar dang tha ma'i bye brag gis [#]shin tu cha phra ba'i phyir snang ba med pa nyid du 'gyur bas sems dang sems las byung ba dag ma grub cing /_chos kyi dbyings kyi rang bzhin du gyur pa de lta bu la gnas par bya'o/_/yum chen mo las/_sems de ni sems ma yin te/_sems kyi rang
[\[279b.3\]]bzhin 'od gsal ba'i phyir ro zhes pa dang /_gang sems med pa de ni bsam gyis mi khyab pa'o zhes gsungs so/_/yang na chos thams cad sems su 'dus la/_sems lus la 'dus shing /_lus chos kyi dbyings su 'dus nas thim par gyur par bya'o/_/'di'i don yang slob dpon
[\[279b.4\]]gyi zhal snga nas/_dbu ma srid pa 'pho ba las ji srid du/_'jig rten rnam par rtog las byung /_/rnam par rtog pa sems las byung /_/sems kyang lus las byung bas na/_/de phyir lus la rnam par brtag_/ces gsungs pa yin no/_/de lta bu'i don la gnas par bya'o/_/skabs der
[\[279b.5\]]shes pa ci la yang mi gnas/_cir yang mi rtog_/ci la yang sems pa med pa/_mtha' thams cad la mi gnas pa/_shes pa ci'i ngo bor yang ma skyes pa/_ci yang ma yin par bsgom [#]par bya'o/_/so sor rtog pa'i shes rab de nyid kyang snang ba med pa yin te[#]/_dper na shing gnyis drag
[\[279b.6\]]tu drud pa las me byung bas shing tshig par gyur pa na me [#]de nyid kyang rang shi ba bzhin du shes pa rang nyid kyang med par gyur pa'o/_/'di'i don 'phags pa 'od srungs kyis zhus pa'i mdo las 'byung ba dang /_gzhan yang 'phags pa rgyan stug po'i mdo las kyang /_ji ltar sreg par byed pa'i
[\[279b.7\]]me/_/bsreg [#]bya med pas mi gnas so/_/de bzhin bsreg bya lta tshig na/_/stong nyid me yang 'gag par 'gyur/_/lta ba 'gog pa'i dus su yang /_/ye shes me yang mi 'byung ste/_/nyon mongs thams cad sreg [#]par byed/_/nyon mongs bsregs [#]na rnam par mdzes/_/zhes gsungs
[\[280a\]]
[\[280a.1\]]so/_/bde ba chen po'i zhal snga nas kyang /_lta ba'i bud shing phung po dag_/stong nyid me yis bsreg [#]byas nas/_/'di [#]ni zhi ba la gnas nas[#]/_/de bzhin nyid kyi me yang 'gag_/ces gsungs so/_/de ltar rags [#]pa'i rnal 'byor bstan nas/_da ni phra
[\[280a.2\]]ba'i rnal 'byor bstan par bya ste/_'di ni phra ba yin te/_ji [#]ltar chos thams cad rang gi sems nyid sgyu ma tsam snang bar 'byung ste/_'di ltar sems sgyu ma tsam ni dus gsum las 'das pa/_kha dog [#]dag dang dbyibs med pa rang bzhin gyis [#]'od gsal ba/_snang ba med pas na chos thams cad
[\[280a.3\]]ni sems nyid sgyu ma yin par shes par bya'o/_/lung yang yod de/_'phags pa lang kar gshegs pa las/_/sems tsam la ni brten nas su/_/phyi rol don la mi brtag go/_/de bzhin nyid la brten nas ni/_/sems tsam las kyang 'das par [#]bya/_/sems tsam las ni 'das gyur na/_/
[\[280a.4\]]snang ba med la gnas par 'gyur/_/snang med gnas pa'i rnal 'byor pa/_/de yis [#]theg pa chen po mthong /_/zhes gsungs so/_/'phags pa klu sgrub dang /_slob dpon 'phags pa'i lha dang /_slob dpon rje btsun zla ba grags pa ni 'di skad du gsungs pa [#]yin te/_'di ltar kun rdzob kyi
[\[280a.5\]]bden pa nyan thos kyi tshul du smras pa ni phyi rol gyi dbu ma rags pa yin la/_de nyid rang gi sems tsam du gnas pa nang gi dbu ma zhes bya ba phra ba yin no zhes gsungs pa'i don rgyas par ni ji skad du/_slob dpon gyi zhal snga nas/_'dir ni gang yang skye ba med/_/gang yang 'gag pa yod ma yin/_/
[\[280a.6\]]sems kyi rang bzhin rnam [#]gnas pa/_/chos rnams nyid ni shes par bya/_/mig la sogs dang yul rnams nyid/_/ye shes lnga po nyid dag ste/_/phyi dang nang du rnam phye ba/_/thams cad sems las gzhan ma yin/_/zhes bya ba la sogs pa mang du gsungs so/_/slob dpon 'phags pa lha'i
[\[280a.7\]]zhal snga [#]nas/_phyi rol don ni yod ma yin/_/rang gi sems ni mthong bar 'gyur/_/de yang sgyu mar bsgom [#]bya zhing /_/de bzhin nyid kyang rjes dran bya/_/yang gsungs pa/_gzugs sogs lnga dang de bzhin skye mched bcu gnyis dang /_/bco brgyad ces bshad khams ni de rnams dang /
[\[280b\]]
[\[280b.1\]]shes pa lnga dang [#]'gro ba ma lus pa/_/thams cad rang gi sems nyid yin gyi gzhan ma yin/_/gang yang ri brgyad dang ni rgya mtsho brgyad rnams dang /_gling la sogs dang dmyal ba la sogs dbye/_/gang yang brtan dang g.yo ba nyid du mthong ba de/_/thams cad sems nyid yin gyi gzhan ma yin/_/
[\[280b.2\]]zhes mang du gsungs so/_/slob dpon zla ba grags pa'i zhal snga [#]nas kyang /_ji skad du/_de bas na phyi rol gyi dngos po lta bu dmigs su med cing yod pa ma yin te/_sems kyi rang bzhin yin pa'i phyir ro zhes pa dang /_yang chos thams cad sems las phyi rol na mi gnas te/_mig
[\[280b.3\]]yor tsam du snang ba gang yin pa de thams cad ni rang gi sems te/_rang gi sems nyid las gzhan ni ci yang med do zhes pa dang /_yang gsungs pa/_sems las dngos po tha dad pa yod do zhe na/_chos med ces bya'o zhes rgyas par gsungs so/_/'dir tshigs su bcad pa ni/_ut+pal
[\[280b.4\]]rtsa ba mU la [#]las/_/lo ma la sogs rgyun 'byung ltar/_/de bzhin sems rdzas med pa yang /_/chos rnams kun gyi ngo bor gnas/_/de yi don ni 'di yin te/_/ut+pala'i tsa ba gzhan dang ma 'brel zhing chu nyid la gnas shing rtsa ba der gar yang zug pa med kyang /_mtsho shin tu rgya che ba
[\[280b.5\]]dag lo ma dang me tog la sogs pas khyab par nus pa bzhin du sems rdzas su med pa nyid yin yang kun rdzob tu phyi nang gi chos thams cad kyi ngo bor gnas so/_/yang smras pa/_ji ltar lu ma'i [#]sA lu ka/_/rtsa ba med kyang thams cad khyab/_/rtsa ba med pa'i sems nyid kyang /_/
[\[280b.6\]]nam mkha'i mthas gtugs khyab par gnas/_/'di'i don ni 'di yin te/_/mtshe'u dang /_lu ma dag la sA [#]lu ka zhes bya ba'i sngo zhig phan tshun 'brel pas/_me tog ser po zhig gis lu ma'i kha chod par skye la de la rtsa ba ni zug pa med do/_/de bzhin du sems rtsa ba
[\[280b.7\]]med pa bzhin du nam mkhas ji tsam khyab pa de tsam du chos thams cad kyi ngo bor gnas so/_/slob dpon 'phags pa lha'i zhal snga nas kyang /_de ltar rang gi sems kyi rang bzhin 'gro ba ma lus pa/_/rnam shes thar pa srid pa'i brtags [#]las 'gro ba gang /_/srid pa'i
[\[281a\]]
[\[281a.1\]]sdug bsngal mtsho chen nang du mi 'khor ba'i/_/'dus byas kun gyi pha rol song ba de la phyag 'tshal 'dud/_/ces gsungs so/_/bla ma'i bla mas kyang don dam par rigs pa'i glu las/_/rang gi sems nyid kun gyi sa bon te/_/gang la srid dang mya ngan 'das 'phro ba/_/
[\[281a.2\]]'dod pa'i 'bras bu ster bar byed pa yi/_/yid bzhin 'dra ba'i sems la phyag 'tshal lo/_/zhes gsungs pas 'khor ba dang mya ngan las 'das pa thams cad sems nyid sgyu mar shes par bya'o/_/de bas de dag bdag gi [#]gzhung chen po mang po dag bkod pa ni/_phyi rol gyi dbu ma yin no zhes
[\[281a.3\]]shes par bya'o/_/pha rol rgol ba zlog [#]pa dang /_/bstan bcos chen po'i gzhung dang ni/_/rtsod pa chen po byung dus su/_/rigs pa'i dbu ma'i gzhung smra bya/_/de nyid don la gtsor byed cing /_/rnal 'byor nyams su len dus su/_/phra ba'i rnal 'byor bsgom par bya/_/'di ni zhal gyi gdams pa
[\[281a.4\]]yin/_/rje btsun de dag gi zhal gyi gdams ngag ni 'di yin te/_kun rdzob kyi bden par nam mkha' dang /_bag chags bzhi'i mthus sems sgyu ma rdzas [#]su med pa brdzun pa nyid phyi dang [#]nang du snang [#]ste/_bdag la sogs pa dang /_phung po la sogs pa'i chos ni 'ga' yang med do/_/don dam par na
[\[281a.5\]]sems sgyu ma de gdod ma nas ma skyes pa/_bsal ba med pa/gzhag [#]pa med par yang 'di lta bu'o zhes shes par bya'o/_/rigs pa'i tshogs rgya chen po rnams kyis de ma grub par bya ste/_bsal [#]bar bya'o/_/slob dpon gyi zhal snga nas/_'di la bsal ba ci yang med/_/gzhag par bya ba gang yang
[\[281a.6\]]med/_/[#]yang dag nyid la yang dag lta/_/yang dag mthong bas rnam par grol/_/yang /_/bdag dang phung po la sogs dang /_/rnam shes rtogs pas ma bsgribs pa/_/sangs rgyas rnams kyi byang chub sems/_/stong pa'i mtshan nyid dag tu bzhed/[ #]/phyi nang thams cad sems nyid ni/_/sgyu ma lta
[\[281a.7\]]bur gnas pa'o/_/sems de yang ni 'od gsal ba'o/_/mya ngan 'das bcas kun stong dang /_/chos skur yang dag bshad pa yin/_/zhes gsungs so/_/phyi yi yul du snang ba'i sems/_/nang gi sems la bsdu ba dang /_/de yang gdod ma nas rang bzhin gyis 'od gsal ba/_
[\[281b\]]
[\[281b.1\]]gzugs spangs pa/_ci'i ngo bor yang ma skyes pa yul dang /_yul can dang /_shes pa dang /_shes byar ma grub pa/_ci yang ma yin pa/_mtha' gang na'ang mi gnas pa/_brjod pa dang spros pa thams cad kyi skabs med pa/_bsam gyis mi khyab pa/_bsam du med pa/_
[\[281b.2\]]bsam pa las 'das pa yin pas/_ci la'ang [#]mi gnas pa/_yid la mi byed pa dran pa dang yid la byed pa spangs par bsgom par bya'o zhes gsungs pa yin te/skal pa chung ba blo gros dman pa dag la sba bar ma byas na/_byang chub sems dpa' las dang po pa'i rtsa ba'i ltung ba 'byung
[\[281b.3\]]bar 'gyur bas na bag med pa brjod par mi bya'o/_/byang chub sems dpa' snying rje phul du byung ba gzhan gyi don kho na gtsor byed 'dod pas/_zhi gnas kyi yan lag rnams phun sum tshogs par byas la mngon par shes pa bskyed par bya'o/_/gal te mngon par shes pa
[\[281b.4\]]med na spyod lam dang /_pra se na'i thabs kyis brtags la man ngag sbyin par bya'o zhes kyang gsungs pa yin pas theg pa chen po 'di la bag yod par spyad par bya'o/_/tshul 'di lta bu bsgom pa rnams ni skad cig ma gcig la mngon par byang chub pa zhes bya ste/_slob dpon
[\[281b.5\]]gyi zhal snga nas/_mthong ba'i chos la mya ngan 'das/_/byas pa byas pa'ang de nyid yin/_/zhes gsungs so/_/de nas mig dag dal bus phye la 'di snyam du/_e ma ho [#]ngo mtshar ro/_/e ma ho [#]ngo mtshar ro/_/phyi nang gi dngos po 'di rnams don dam par skye ba med bzhin du/_
[\[281b.6\]]'di ltar snang ba 'di sems skye ba med pa'i cho 'phrul yin pa [#]dang /_nam mkha'i cho 'phrul yin pas rmi lam gyi gnas skabs lta bu kho na yin no snyam du bsam zhing /_gzugs la sogs pa'i 'dod pa'i yul thams cad la chags pa dang /_sdang ba dang /_rmongs pa bsal
[\[281b.7\]]te/_'jig rten gyi [#]chos brgyad las rgyal bar bya'o/_/byang chub sems dpa'i tshul khrims kyi sdom pas bsdams shing snying rje'i yid kyis byang chub kyi [#]sems mi brjed pa la brtson par bya ba dang /_dran pa dang shes bzhin dang /_bag yod pa dag ma nyams par bya ba dang /
[\[282a\]]
[\[282a.1\]]thabs dang shes rab dang ldan par bya ste/_thabs dang shes rab kyi tshul rgyas pa ni thabs dang shes rab kyis [#]nges par byed pa grub pa zhes bya ba'i bstan bcos su blta bar bya'o/_/de nas dal bus stan las langs te/_nyin lan gsum mtshan lan gsum
[\[282a.2\]]du phung po gsum pa'i cho ga bya ba dang /_'phags pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i mdo gdon par bya ba dang /_'phags pa bzang po spyod pa'i smon lam dang /_slob dpon gyi zhal snga nas mdzad pa'i smon lam nyi shu pa dang /_slob dpon ma ti tsi tras mdzad pa'i smon lam
[\[282a.3\]]bdun cu pa dus rtag tu gdon par byas pas sangs rgyas kyi chos yongs su rdzogs par bya ba dang /_sems can yongs su smin par bya ba la shin tu g.yel ba med par 'bad par bya'o/_/'di ltar mos pa spyod pa'i sa rnam pa gsum ni [#]dgur 'gyur te/_dang po la gsum du
[\[282a.4\]]gnas te/_mos pa pa dang /_gnas skabs pa dang /_lhag par 'dod pa'o/_/lhag ma brgyad po re re zhing gsum gsum du 'gyur te/_rjes su mthun [#]pa pa dang /_khyad par pa dang /_rab tu rtogs [#]pa'o/_/de sgra'i rjes su 'gro ba'i bzod pa ni dang po gsum gyi gnas skabs
[\[282a.5\]]su skye bar 'gyur ro/_/lhag ma brgyad po re re zhing gsum gsum du gnas pas nyi shu rtsa bzhir 'gyur la/_rjes su mthun pa'i bzod pa yang nyi shu rtsa bzhir skye bar 'gyur ro/_/bzod pa de dag ji ltar skye bar 'gyur ba dang /_skyes pa'i tshul gyis gnas pa phra mo dag ni/_slob
[\[282a.6\]]dpon gyi zhal snga nas kyi [#]bka' drin gyis 'tsho ba'i slob dpon dag la zhu bar bya'o/_/mi skye ba'i bzod pa ni lhag pa'i bsam pa rnam par dag pa'i sas bsdus pa 'jig rten las 'das pa'i lam skye bar 'gyur te/_rab tu dga' ba dang /_sa mi g.yo ba dang /_bcu pa'i
[\[282a.7\]]dus dang /_yang na sa bcu char du skye bar 'gyur ro/_/sa dang po nas bdun pa'i bar du ni smon lam gyi lus can yin pas chos thams cad mi dmigs bzhin du sems can yongs su smin par byed pa dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos yongs su rdzogs par byed do/_/gang gi tshe
[\[282b\]]
[\[282b.1\]]sa mi g.yo ba la gnas pa'i tshe/_mtshan ma med pa [#]lhun gyis grub pas gzugs kyi lus med de/_lus grub pa'i rgyu spangs pa'o[#]/_/gal te de ltar na sems can yongs su smin par byed pa dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos yongs su rdzogs par yang ji ltar 'gyur zhe na/_'di ltar
[\[282b.2\]]sa mi g.yo ba de ni gzhon nu'i sa [#]yin pas rnam pa thams cad du mngal gyi dri mas mi g.yo mi gos te/_rgyu bzhi dang rkyen gcig gis yid kyi lus rdzus te [#]skye ba des gzhan gyi don byed pa dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos yongs su rdzogs par byed pa ni rjes las thob pa dag pa 'jig rten pa'i
[\[282b.3\]]ye shes kyis so/_/gang gi tshe sangs rgyas kyi sa rdo rje lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin brnyes par gyur nas ni/_rjes las thob par mi mnga' ste/rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug chen po dus rtag tu mnyam par gzhag [#]cing rang byung gi [#]ye shes chos nyid byang chub kyi sems chen po la 'gyur ba mi
[\[282b.4\]]mnga' zhing 'byung ba dang 'jug pa med pas so/_/'phags pa sangs rgyas thams cad kyi yul la 'jug pa las/_ji ltar chos kyi dbyings la gnas pa de bzhin du ye shes ni mi 'jug mi ldog go/_/ji ltar ye shes mi 'jug mi [#]ldog pa de lta bur chos nyid kyi tshul gyis 'jug pas
[\[282b.5\]]zag pa rnams mi skye mi 'gog go zhes gsungs so/_/de bas na yun ring por pha rol tu phyin pa lnga dang /_bsdu ba'i dngos po bzhi la sogs pa'i chos 'khor gsum yongs su dag pas sbyangs pa dang /_ma rig pa'i gnyid mthug po [#]las legs par sad pa dang /_chos thams
[\[282b.6\]]cad kyi rang dang spyi'i mtshan nyid skad cig ma gcig la skye ba med par bzod pa dang /_phung po lhag ma med pa'i dbyings su yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa na dag pa 'jig rten pa'i ye shes ga la 'grub[#]/gzhan yang sems zhes bya ba'i rdzas kyi ngo bor yod cing grub par gyur na
[\[282b.7\]]lta/_de yongs su dag pa'i gnas su gyur pa'i ye shes kyang yod par 'gyur ba zhig na/_sems gdod nas rdzas kyi ngo bor med par grub pas rnam par mi rtog pa'i ye shes zhes bya ba ji lta bu zhig yod par 'gyur/_de med pas de'i gzugs bstan du [#]yod par gyur pa'i
[\[283a\]]
[\[283a.1\]]dag pa 'jig rten pa'i ye shes zhes bya ba yang yod par mi 'gyur ro/_/gal te sangs rgyas la de mnga' ba yin na 'khrul pa dang bcas par 'gyur ba dang /_mnyam pa nyid la mnyam par gzhag pa [#]ma yin par 'gyur ba dang /_chos kyi sku'i bdag nyid ma
[\[283a.2\]]yin par 'gyur ba dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa la skye ba dang 'gag pa yod par 'gyur ro/_/lung gi khungs ni 'phags pa lang kar gshegs pa las/_'khrul pa thams cad spangs nas kyang /_/gal te 'khrul pa skyer zin na/_/de ni 'khrul pa yang dag ste/_/rab rib
[\[283a.3\]]yongs su ma dag bzhin/_/zhes gsungs pa dang /_mdo gzhan las kyang /_glang chen bzhugs kyang mnyam par gzhag[#]/glang chen bzhud kyang mnyam par gzhag[#]/glang chen mnal yang mnyam par bzhag_/glang chen gzims kyang mnyam par bzhag_/ces gsungs
[\[283a.4\]]so/_/yang 'phags pa sangs rgyas thams cad kyi yul la 'jug pa las/_kha dog dbyibs dang mtshan ma med/_/'gag pa med cing 'byung ba med/_/rtsa ba med cing rten [#]med pa/_/dmigs med khyod la phyag 'tshal lo/_/zhes bya ba la sogs pa mang du rgyas par gsungs
[\[283a.5\]]so/_/rgyal ba bskyed [#]ma sum brgya pa las kyang /gang gis nga la gzugs su mthong /_/gang gis nga la sgrar shes pa/_/log pa'i lam du zhugs pa ste/_/skye bo de yis nga mi mthong /_/sangs rgyas rnams ni chos kyi sku/_/chos nyid du ni 'dren pa ltar[#]/_/chos nyid
[\[283a.6\]]mthong bar bya min pas/_/de ni rnam par shes mi nus/_/zhes gsungs so/_/'phags pa sangs rgyas thams cad kyi yul la 'jug pa las kyang /_de bzhin gshegs pa rtag tu skye med chos/_/chos rnams thams cad de bzhin gshegs dang 'dra/_/byis pa'i blo can
[\[283a.7\]]mtshan mar [#]'dzin pa dag_/'jig rten dag na med pa'i chos la spyod/_/de bzhin gshegs pa dge chos dpag med ni/_/zag pa med pa'i chos rnams thams cad de/_/de bzhin nyid med de bzhin gshegs pa'ang med/_/'jig rten dag na gzugs brnyan kun du snang /_/zhes
[\[283b\]]
[\[283b.1\]]gsungs so/_/don 'di nyid gsal bar bya ba'i phyir slob dpon nyid kyi zhal snga nas/_kun rdzob dang ni don dam dag_/so so'i cha ni shes gyur na/_/gang du mi byed blo gnas pa/_/de yis zung du 'jug pa shes/_/mnyam par bzhag dang ma bzhag pa/_/gang la 'di dag thams cad med/_/
[\[283b.2\]]ces gsungs pa dang /_don dam par bstod pa las kyang /_chos rnams kun la mi gnas pas/_/chos kyi dbyings kyi dngos gyur cing /_/mchog tu zab pa nyid brnyes pa/_/zab mo khyod la phyag 'tshal bstod/_/ces mang du gsungs so/_/de bas na mnyam par gzhag [#]ces pa dang /_
[\[283b.3\]]rjes las thob pa zhes bya ba de dag ni gdul bya dngos po la zhen pa'i tshig ste/_chos thams cad zad pa'i mthar gyur pa mya ngan las 'das pa'i dus na ji lta bu zhig yod/_'phags pa lha'i zhal nas kyang /_/re zhig dngos 'di nam mkha'i nags tshal las/_/skyes pa'i pad+ma bzhin
[\[283b.4\]]du dngos med cing /_/gnyi ga dag las gzhan pa'ang [#]ri bong [#]rwa bzhin no/_/rnam par thar pa ci 'dra ba zhig yod ces bdag mtshar khyed cag spyod/_/ces gsungs pa yin no/_/sangs rgyas rnams kyis dus kun du/_/de bzhin nyid la mnyam par gzhag_/[#]brjod du med pa'i gnas
[\[283b.5\]]skabs der/_/'jug pa'ang [#]ldog pa yod pa min/_/ye shes nyid kyang ji lta bu/_/mnyam gzhag [#]rjes thob ga la zhig_/gal te de la de mnga' na/_/sar zhugs rnams kyang khyad ci yod/_/da ni bsgom pa'i rim pa nyid la 'jug par bya'o/_/de la byang chub sems dpa'
[\[283b.6\]]bskal pa grangs med pa gsum dang /_bdun dang /_sum cu rtsa gsum du rnal 'byor pa thabs dang shes rab gnyis dang /_bsdu ba'i dngos po bzhi dang /_tshad med pa bzhi dang /_byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun dang /_gzungs dang /_ting nge 'dzin dang /_rnam par
[\[283b.7\]]thar pa dang /_byang chub sems dpa'i stobs bcu dang /_byang chub sems dpa'i ma 'dres pa bco brgyad dang /_dbang bcu dang /_so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang /_sa bcu dang /_pha rol tu phyin pa [#]bcu rnams gus pa dang /_yun ring ba dang /_rgyun mi 'chad par mthar
[\[284a\]]
[\[284a.1\]]phyin par byas/_rdzogs par byas pa sems can yongs su smin par bya ba dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos yongs su rdzogs par bya ba dang /_snying rje chen po la legs par goms pa smon lam thams cad la dbang thob pa sa bcu pa'i dbang phyug srid pa tha ma pa des/_
[\[284a.2\]]sems can gyi khams la bltas na de dag bri ba med par mthong ste/_'di snyam du/_mdo las/_nam mkha'i mthar thug gyur pa ji tsam par/_/sems can ma lus mtha' yang de tsam mo/_/zhes gsungs pa dang /_yang mdo sde las 'di lta ste/_'jig rten gyi khams thams cad chu'i
[\[284a.3\]]dkyil 'khor du gyur la/_de skyes bu zhig gis lo brgya [#]lon na thigs pa re re dor ba las/_/chu de ni tha mar zad par 'gyur ba yin gyi/_sems can gyi khams ni zad par mi 'gyur ro zhes gsungs pas bdag gis chos kyi sku mngon sum du ma byas par sems can rnams gdon
[\[284a.4\]]par mi nus pas/_bdag gis chos kyi sku mngon sum du bya'o snyam pa'i rjes la/_phyogs bcu'i de bzhin gshegs pas dbang bskur bas stobs bcu la sogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi yon tan ma lus pa rdzogs pa thob par 'gyur ro/_/[#]slob dpon gyi zhal snga [#]nas ji skad du/_rim gyis
[\[284a.5\]]'jug pa'i sbyor ba yis/_/sangs rgyas sras po grags chen rnams/_/chos kyi sprin gyi ye shes kyis[#]/_/chos nyid stong pa mthong gyur [#]nas/_/gang tshe sems ni rab bkrus [#]pa/_/'khor ba'i gzeb las 'das gyur te/_/pad+ma chen po'i rang bzhin gyi/_stan de la ni rab gnas 'gyur/_/
[\[284a.6\]]'dab ma rin chen du ma'i 'od/_/'dod par bya ba'i ze 'bru can/_/pad 'dab bye ba du ma yis/_/rnam pa kun du yongs su bskor/_/stobs bcu pa yis [#]yongs su gang /_/mi 'jigs [#]pa yis yongs su ngoms/_/bsam gyis mi khyab sangs rgyas chos/_/spros med rnams las
[\[284a.7\]]nyam mi nga /[#]/legs par spyad pa'i las kun [#]gyis/_/bsod nams ye shes rab bsags pa'i/_/zla ba nya la skar ma yis/_/'khor du rnam pa du mas bskor/_/sangs rgyas phyag gis nyi ma der/_/dri med rin chen 'bar gyur te/_/sras kyi thu bor dbang bskur bas/_/dbang bskur ba ni
[\[284b\]]
[\[284b.1\]]kun du gsol/_/zhes gsungs pa de'i rjes thogs la/_ston ka'i nyi ma'i gung gi nam mkha' rdul dang bral ba lta bu mtshan ma'i rdul thams cad med pa/_sems dang /_yid dang /[ #]rnam par shes pa dang bral ba/_de bzhin nyid kyi dbyings su ma lus pa thams cad tha dad pa med cing ro gcig
[\[284b.2\]]pa de ni sangs rgyas zhes bya ste/_de rtogs phyir na gang zhig la/_/blo skye [#]med pa sangs rgyas dngos/_/rnam rtog nyid ni spangs [#]phyir dang /_/rtog [#]pa med pa rgyas phyir ro/_/chos rnams mtshan nyid tha dad pa/_/skye [#]dang bkag pa ma mdzad pa[#]/_/mnyam pa nyid kyi mnyam nyid pas/_/dmigs
[\[284b.3\]]med nyid rdzogs sangs rgyas shing /_/rdzogs sangs rgyas med sangs rgyas pas/_/lha mir bcas pa'i 'jig rten na/_/de ni sangs rgyas zhes brjod do/_/ma rig pa'i gnyid las sangs shing chos nyid byang chub kyi sems rang byung [#]gi ye shes chen pos shes bya'i dkyil 'khor thams cad skad
[\[284b.4\]]cig ma gcig la mkhyen zhing mngon par rdzogs par byang chub pa ni sangs rgyas yin te/_ji skad du/_dngos po kun gyi rang bzhin can/_/dngos po kun gyi rang bzhin 'dzin/_/skye med chos de sna tshogs don/_/chos kun ngo bo nyid 'chang ba/_/chos kun mngon par rtogs pa ste/_/shes rab
[\[284b.5\]]chen pos [#]skad cig la/_/chos kun khong du chud pa po/_/zhes gsungs so/_/gzhan las kyang /_rdo rje lta bu'i ting [#]'dzin gyis/_/skad cig gcig la mngon sangs rgyas/_/ngo bo med pa snyoms 'jug pa/_/dmigs med khyod la phyag 'tshal lo/_/zhes gsungs so/_/slob dpon
[\[284b.6\]]zla ba grags pa'i zhal snga [#]nas kyang /_ma rig gnyid las sangs phyir dang /_/blo rgyas phyir na sangs rgyas yin/_/zhes gsungs so/_/chos rnams bsal dang gzhag med [#]par/_/chos nyid ji ltar de bzhin du/_/gang phyir de ni gshegs gyur pa/_/de phyir de bzhin gshegs zhes bya/_/rtogs
[\[284b.7\]]bya brtan [#]du ma lus pa[#]/_/mthar lhung rnam par spangs pa dang /_/rtogs med tshul gyis rtogs pa yis/_/bde bar gshegs pas bder gshegs yin/_/grangs med bsod nams tshogs ldan zhing /_/shes bya mtha' yas mkhyen gyur pa'i/_/sangs rgyas rnams kyi chos sku
[\[285a\]]
[\[285a.1\]]'di/_/spros pa nye bar zhi ba yin/_/'di la tshig kyang ldog 'gyur zhing /_/'di ni sems kyi spyod lam min[#]/_/'di la kun rtog ldog 'gyur zhing /_/shes pa 'jug par mi 'gyur ro/_/'dir lung ni 'phags pa ye shes kyi phyag rgya'i mdo las/_sku de sku ma yin
[\[285a.2\]]zhing sku las yongs su grol/_/sku yang ma zhig [#]rnyed par gyur pa med/_/chos rnams gang na kun du ldan med mi ldan med/_/bde bar gshegs pa rnams [#]kyi sku ni de ltar gdags/_/'du med 'bral med gnas med rdzas kyang med/_/ma bzung ma grol nyams pa med cing nye ring med/_/rtsol ba med cing
[\[285a.3\]]thogs med ci la 'ang gnas pa med/_/bde bar gshegs pa rnams kyi sku ni de ltar bstan/_/zhes pa la sogs pa dang /_yang de nyid las de ni lus med pa/_ma byas pa/_ma skyes pa/_ma 'gags pa/_ma byung ba/_las med pa/_rnam par smin pa ma mthong ba/_ma thos pa/_rnam par
[\[285a.4\]]mi [#]shes pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa tshig nyis brgya brgyad cu thams [#]pas gsungs so/_/yum chen mo las kyang /_sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa ni dran pa [#]med pa dang yid la byed pa med pa'o zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs so/_/'phags pa sgo mtha' yas par [#]grub pa las kyang /_de la sangs rgyas
[\[285a.5\]]rjes su dran pa 'ba' zhig bsgom zhing /_gzugs las ma yin/_mtshan [#]las ma yin/_dpe byed [#]las ma yin/_yon tan las ma yin/_chos las ma yin/_chos ma yin par ma yin zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs pa dang /_gzhan yang de bzhin gshegs pa'i le'u las kyang /_de
[\[285a.6\]]bzhin gshegs pa la lta ba ni/_stong pa nyid dang /_mtshan ma med pa dang /_smon pa med pa dang /_skye ba med pa dang /_'gag pa med pa dang /_'byung ba med pa dang /_dngos po med pa dang /_mngon par 'du byed pa med par lta ba yin no zhes gsungs pa dang /_'phags pa blo gros mi zad pas
[\[285a.7\]]zhus pa'i mdo las kyang /_de la sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa gang zhe na/_gzugs dang mtshan gyis rab tu phye ba ma yin pa dang /_skye ba dang /_rigs dang /[#]dus kyis rab tu phye ba ma yin pa dang /_sngon gyi spyod pa dkar pos rab tu phye ba ma yin pa dang /_phyi ma'i shes rab yongs su rlon [#]pas rab tu phye ba
[\[285b\]]
[\[285b.1\]]ma yin pa dang /_da ltar byung ba'i gnas pas rab tu phye ba ma yin pa gang yin pa ste/_sgrib pa thams cad kyi gzhi ma yin pa dang /_mtshan ma thams cad kun nas slong ba ma yin pa dang /_rtog pa dang /_rnam par rtog pa dang /_yongs su rtog pa thams cad nye bar zhi ba gang yin pa'o zhes gsungs
[\[285b.2\]]pa dang /_de bzhin du 'phags pa da ltar gyi sangs rgyas mngon sum du bzhugs pa'i mdo dang /_'phags pa sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa'i mdo chen po la sogs pa rnams su yang blta bar bya'o/_/smras pa/_de ltar na snying rje spangs pa nyid kyis zhi ba phyogs gcig par ji ltar mi 'gyur zhe na/_rgyu gsum
[\[285b.3\]]dang /_rkyen gcig gis gzugs kyi sku phun sum tshogs pa dang /[#]kun rdzob tu 'byung bar mi 'gyur te/_mi gnas pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i rang bzhin yin pas so/_/ji lta [#]zhe na/_sku gsum gyi tshul gyis so/_/sku gsum rnam par gzhag [#]pa yang /_slob dpon nyid kyi zhal snga nas/_
[\[285b.4\]]ji skad du/_'og min gyi pho brang du mngon par rdzogs par byang chub pa'i sems kyi mdo las kyang /[#]de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku ye shes kyi bdag nyid yid bzhin gyi [#]nor bu dang /_dpag bsam gyi shing ltar mthu sna tshogs dang ldan pa ltar rang byung gi ye shes skad cig ma gcig gis chos thams cad
[\[285b.5\]]mnyam pa nyid du mkhyen pa/_bskal pa bye ba khrag [#]khrig 'bum phrag grangs med par bsod nams dang ye shes kyi tshogs dpag tu med pa nye bar bsags pa las nges par 'khrungs pa/_yid bzhin gyi nor bu gzugs sna tshogs can ltar rtog pa mi mnga' ba/_spros pa thams cad dang bral ba/_sgrib pa
[\[285b.6\]]rnam pa gnyis spangs pa thams cad la phan gdags pa'i phyir/gnas gyur pa'i mtshan nyid kyi sku dang /_lhan cig tu mngon par grub po/_/de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku rnam par mi rtog pa de las gzhan yang phan pa bsgrub [#]pa'i tshul khrims kyis [#]yongs su bsgoms pa'i [#]smon lam gyi shugs kyi dbang
[\[285b.7\]]gis sprul pa'i skus thams cad la phan 'dogs par mdzad pa/_'dzam bu'i gling bye ba phrag brgya dag tu/_dga' ldan gyi pho brang na bzhugs pa thog mar mdzad de/_'pho ba dang /_lhums su zhugs pa dang /_bltams pa dang /_gzhon nu'i rol pa dang /_btsun mo'i 'khor gyi nang na bzhugs
[\[286a\]]
[\[286a.1\]]pa dang /_mngon par 'byung ba dang /_dka' ba spyod pa dang /_byang chub kyi snying por gshegs pa dang /_bdud 'dul ba dang /_mngon par byang chub pa dang /_chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba dang /_yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa chen po la sogs
[\[286a.2\]]pa sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa kun [#]ston pa nyid 'byung ngo /_/de la brten nas yi ge dang /_rtsa ba dang /_tshig gi don go rims kyi [#]mtshan nyid gsung dbyangs yan lag drug cu dang ldan pas sems can gyi bsam pa rangs par mdzad pa [#]gang la theg pa mchog gis 'gro ba rnams kyi theg
[\[286a.3\]]pa chen po zhes bya bar brjod pa [#]'byung ste/_ye shes dang /_gzugs dang /_gsung gi sku gsum po de dag ni sdom pa gsum las nges par 'khrungs pa/_lus dang /_sems dang /_ngag gnas gyur pa'i ngo bo nyid yin no zhes gsungs so/_/'phags pa rdo rje
[\[286a.4\]]sdes ni gzugs kyi sku 'og min gyi spyod yul can chos kyi sku'i gzhi la brten pa ni rnam par smin pa'i sku zhes bshad do/_/'phags pa thogs med kyis ni de nyid longs spyod rdzogs pa'i skur bshad pa/_stobs la sogs pa sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad kyi gzhir gyur pa ni chos
[\[286a.5\]]kyi skur bshad/_'dzam bu'i gling du mngon par rdzogs par byang chub pa ni sprul pa'i skur bshad do/_/mdor na stobs dang /_mi 'jigs pa dang /_ma 'dres pa la sogs pa sangs rgyas kyi yon tan 'dus pa/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang gnyis su med
[\[286a.6\]]cing tha mi dad par gyur pa ni chos kyi sku'o/_/de'i byin gyi rlabs [#]las byung ba de'i gzhi la brten pa ni [#]longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku'o/_/de'i byin gyi rlabs [#]las nges par byung ba gdul bya la ji ltar mos [#]par 'byung ba ni sprul pa'i sku yin no[#]/_/sbyor med gyur kyang ye shes med[#]/_/
[\[286a.7\]]smon lam dbang gis sems can don/_/gdul bya'i rgyud ni ji bzhin du/_/thub pa'i mdzad pa rgyun mi 'chad/_/de bas na slob dpon nyid kyi zhal snga nas/_mgon po sems [#]pa mi mnga' zhing /_/rnam rtog g.yo ba mi mnga' yang /_/rang nyid ngang gis [#]sems can
[\[286b\]]
[\[286b.1\]]la/_/sangs rgyas mdzad pa 'jug par 'gyur/_/rnam rtog [#]rlung dmar thams cad kyis/_/dpag bsam shing ltar mi bskyod kyang /_/de ltas [#]sems can thams cad kyi/_/bsam pa ma lus rdzogs par mdzad/_/yang slob dpon gyi zhal snga nas/_dri ma med pa [#]chos
[\[286b.2\]]kyi sku/_/dri ma med pa'i chos sku la/_/ye shes rgya mtsho gnas gyur nas/_/de yis sems can don mdzad do/_/zhes gsungs so/_/bsgom pa'i rim pa'i skabs rdzogs s+ho//_//'dir sangs rgyas yongs su [#]mya ngan las 'das shing /_byang chub sems
[\[286b.3\]]dpa' rnams kyang 'jig rten gyi khams gzhan du dengs pa dang /_lha dang klu la sogs pa rnams kyang /_mthong ba'i spyod yul du ma gyur pa na/_theg pa chen po'i rigs can dag la zab cing rgya che ba'i don su zhig 'chad par 'gyur/_su zhig gi tshig la yid ches par bya zhe na/_
[\[286b.4\]]'di ltar slob dpon [#]'phags pa klu sgrub kyi zhal snga nas/_don de 'chad par byed cing /_de'i gsung la yid ches par bya ste/_bcom ldan 'das kyis gzhung du ma nas lung bstan pa'i phyir ro/_/'phags pa gser 'od dam pa'i mdo las/_lung bstan pa'i tshig
[\[286b.5\]]ni med kyi/_'di 'on kyang li ts+tsha bI [#]sems can thams cad kyis mthong na dga' bas de bzhin gshegs pa'i ring bsrel las brtsams nas zab mo 'ba' zhig smra bar byed do/_/gzhan yang 'phags pa lang kar gshegs pa dang /_mdo gzhan dag nas lung bstan cing /_
[\[286b.6\]]'jam dpal gyi rtsa ba'i rgyud chen po las kyang ji skad du/dge slong klu sgrub ces bya ba/_/rang bzhin med don de nyid rig_/sa ni drug pa sgrub [#]pa ste/_/lo ni drug brgyar 'tsho bar 'gyur/_/zhes gsungs so/_/de bzhin du 'phags pa sprin chen po'i mdo las
[\[286b.7\]]kyang /_ji skad du/_lha'i bu dag bskal pa brjod du med pa'i sngon du de bzhin gshegs pa klu [#]rigs sgron ma'i chos kyi rgyal po'i [#]brtson 'grus chen po'i klu yum bstan pa 'dzin pa/_blon po dam pa'i chos kyi mdzod 'dzin pa/_rgyal po dang blon po gnyis sangs rgyas
[\[287a\]]
[\[287a.1\]]kyi ring bsrel gyi gtam byas shing /_rgyal pos legs par bshad pas dus der 'khor thams cad ngo mtshar skyes nas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/_rgyal po 'di zab mo la mkhas pa'o zhes zhus pas/_bcom ldan 'das kyis rgyal
[\[287a.2\]]po'i yon tan rgyas par gsungs te/_mdo de nyid du blta bar bya'o/_/de nas rgyal po 'khor dang bcas pas bcom ldan 'das la rin po che spar gang gtor nas sems [#]'di lta bu bskyed de/_ma 'ongs pa'i dus na [#]shAkya thub pa'i bstan pa nub pa'i tshe bdag rab tu
[\[287a.3\]]byung ste/_chos kyi mjug [#]la bab pa na sgra chen po lan gsum du bsgrags pa [#]la/_chos gos tsam 'chang ba skra bregs pa rnams yul nas phyung zhing bskrad la/_dam pa'i chos phyung ste dam pa'i chos kyi phyir bdag gi srog gtong bar gyur cig ces smon lam btab
[\[287a.4\]]po/_/blon po dang /_btsun mos kyang smon lam btab po/_/lha'i bu dag nga 'das pa'i 'og tu lo brgya phrag mang po 'das pa na/_lho phyogs kyi [#]rgyud du mkhar gyi rgyal po bde spyod bzang po zhes bya ba 'byung bar 'gyur te/_de'i tshe lo brgyad cu na dam pa'i chos nub par
[\[287a.5\]]'gyur ba'i lhag ma tsam lus pa na nga'i nyan thos 'byung bar 'gyur/_dam pa'i chos 'byin par 'gyur/_chos kyi 'khor lo bskor bar 'gyur/_theg pa chen po yang gzhan la rgyas par 'chad par 'gyur ro zhes pa nas [#]dge slong de lung bstan pa nyon cig_/de ni [#]nga la
[\[287a.6\]]brten pa [#]dang /_nga'i bstan pa rgyas par byed pa dang /_khur chen po khyer ba dang /_nga'i shAkya gzhon nu yin te/_nga 'das pa'i 'og tu lho phyogs kyi rgyud du drang srong ri bo zhes bya ba'i yul du grong khyer chen po bsod nams ldan zhes bya ba 'byung bar 'gyur te/_grong khyer
[\[287a.7\]]chen po de'i byang phyogs su skye ste/_'bra [#]go can gyi rje'u rigs [#]rnam par dag pa [#]skye bar 'gyur ro/_/shAkya'i rigs gzhon nu li ts+tsha bI'i [#]bu sems can thams cad kyis [#]mthong na dga' ba byang chub sems dpa' mi mchog 'di/_nga'i dam pa'i chos rgyas par bya ba'i phyir der
[\[287b\]]
