[\[287b.1\]]rigs chen por skye bar 'gyur ro/_/de'i pha ma la sogs pa'i gnyen sde'i ming yang de'i ming las 'dogs so/_/'bra go [#]can gyi rje'u [#]rigs kyang de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs yin par blta'o zhes pa nas yang khye'u de yang skye bo thams cad kyis [#]sdug par
[\[287b.2\]]'gyur zhing kun gyis bkur bar 'gyur ro/_/gang gi tshe khye'u rab tu byung ba na de'i 'khor rnams kyang dam pa'i chos kyi phyir srog gtong ba yin zhes pa nas yang de'i tshig la yid ches pa ni nyung zhing phal cher de la mi mos par 'gyur ro/_/chos bzhi dang ldan na de'i tshig la yid
[\[287b.3\]]ches te/_sangs rgyas snga ma dag la mdo 'di thos pa dang /_dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyis yongs su zin pa dang /_lhag pa'i bsam pa brten [#]pas dge ba'i rtsa ba brtan [#]pa dang /_rgya chen po la mos pa lus kyi [#]mngon sum du byas pa'o/_/de la yid mi ches pa thams
[\[287b.4\]]cad ni bdud kyis [#]byin gyis brlabs pa'i gti mug can no/_/de la mos pa dag ni sangs rgyas kyis yongs su gzung [#]ba'o zhes pa nas/_yang de la bsnyen bkur byas na [#]dus gsum gyi sangs rgyas thams cad la bsnyen bkur [#]byas par 'gyur ro/_/de'i tshig mnyan pa [#]na
[\[287b.5\]]dus gsum gyi sangs rgyas thams cad kyi bka' mnyan par 'gyur ro zhes pa nas yang de 'chi ba'i dus byed pa na nga'i dam pa'i chos nub par 'gyur ro/_/de dang 'dra ba'i gang zag ni med de mi srid do/_/yang de'i phyogs byed pa dang /_de'i gzhung rgyas par byed pa
[\[287b.6\]]dang /_de'i 'khor dang /_de'i gzhung 'dzin pa de dag ni mngon par sangs rgyas pa'i dus su 'khor gyi gtso bor 'gyur ro/_/bskal pa bzang po de'i rjes la bskal pa drug cur sangs rgyas mi 'byung ngo /_/de'i rjes la [#]sangs rgyas bdun 'byung ngo /_/de nas
[\[287b.7\]]'jig rten gyi khams dang ba'i 'od ces bya bar de bzhin gshegs pa ye shes 'byung gnas 'od ces bya ba la sogs pa dang /_de'i [#]ming thos pa yang don che ba'o/_/shAkya thub pa gnyis pa'o/_/dus gsum gyi sangs rgyas thams cad kyi mdzad pa byed pa'o zhes bya
[\[288a\]]
[\[288a.1\]]ba la sogs pa gsungs te/_mdo de [#]nyid du blta bar bya'o/_/gzhan yang dus gsum gyi sangs rgyas thams cad kyi man ngag slob dpon gyi zhal snga nas gnang ba'i gsang sngags kyi gzhung gsang pa las kyang ches gsang ba/_blo gros phul
[\[288a.2\]]du byung ba/_shes rab sbyangs pa dang ldan pa/_ngang gis snying rje che ba/_sngon chad skye ba grangs med cing rgya che ba spyad pa la goms pa yod pa/_dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyis yongs su zin pa/_tshogs rnam pa gnyis bsags pa la goms pa/_tshe 'di nyid
[\[288a.3\]]la sangs rgyas nyid 'dod pas spyad par bya ste/_de ni 'di ltar dbang po rnon po'i spyod yul yin pa dang /_spang bar bya ba'i ngo bo nyid yongs su shes pa dang /_bde ba nyid du spyod pa dang /_tshogs gnyis bsags pa la mkhas pa dang /_de
[\[288a.4\]]kho na nyid kyi ting nge 'dzin bskyed pa la thabs rmad du byung ba mang ba nyid yin pa dang /_rnam par rtog pa rgyang ring du spong ba dang /_bdag la sgrub pa dang ma bral ba yin no/_/slob dpon gyi zhal snga nas/_byis pa rnams ni gzugs la chags/_/
[\[288a.5\]]'bring po rnams ni chags bral 'gyur/_/gzugs sogs ngo bo nyid shes nas/_/blo mchog rnams ni grol bar 'gyur/_/zhes gsungs so/_/'phags pa lha'i zhal snga nas kyang /_mkhas pas legs par 'thab pa'am/_/yang
[\[288a.6\]]na legs par bros par bya/_/bar ma do yi dngos pos ni/_/don dam pa'am ltung bar 'gyur/_/zhes gsungs so/_/blo gros 'bring po rnams kyis ni/_sngar ji skad bshad pa bzhin du gnas pas brtson 'grus dang /_dbang po rab kyis bskal pa grangs med pa gsum gyis
[\[288a.7\]]sangs rgyas nyid thob la/_de las gzhan pa nyid kyis bskal pa grangs med pa bdun dang /_bskal pa grangs med pa sum cu rtsa gsum gyis so/_/slob dpon gyi zhal snga nas kyi che ba brjod pa'i skabs rdzogs s+ho//_//'di'i don la gnas pa'i byang chub
[\[288b\]]
[\[288b.1\]]sems dpa'i rnal 'byor pa la/_tshe 'di nyid la phan yon dpag tu med pa thob [#]ste/_'di ltar 'khor ba'i 'jigs pa thams cad kyang mi 'byung zhing /_dus ma yin par 'chi ba las kyang rgyal bar 'gyur te/_mtshan nyid med pa'i bde chen po/_/stong nyid rnal 'byor
[\[288b.2\]]dam pa ni/_/'chi ba slu ba'i gtso bo ste/_/gzhan gyis 'chi bdag 'joms mi nus/_/zhes gsungs so/_/nad thams cad las rgyal ba thob [#]ste/_'phags pa lha'i zhal snga nas/_bshang dang gci ba 'byung ba dang /_/rims dang nad la sogs pa dang /_/rang
[\[288b.3\]]bzhin rgas [#]pa la sogs pa/_/rtag tu sgyu mas gso bar bya/_/zhes gsungs so/_/bdud dang gdon gyi rigs thams cad dang /_bar du gcod pa thams cad las rgyal bar 'gyur te/_gang 'dir rgyu ba dang ni mi rgyu ba/_/sgyu ma nam mkha'i ngo bor rnam rtog pa/_/
[\[288b.4\]]'di ni bsrung ba'i mchog tu gsungs pa ste/_/bsrung ba'i cho ga gzhan dag 'dir ci dgos/_/zhes gsungs so/_/gzhan las kyang /_thams cad nam mkha' dang 'dra bar bsgom pa ni bsrung ba'i [#]mchog yin no zhes gsungs so/_/slob dpon d+harmA gras [#]kyang /_
[\[288b.5\]]shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pas bsrungs pa [#]la ni srung ba gzhan gyis [#]bsrung mi dgos so zhes gsungs so/_/yang gsungs pa/_stong pa nyid ni rnam bsgoms na/_/'chi bdag gis ni ma mthong zhing /_/gzhan yang bdud ni bye bas kyang /_/mthong bar 'gyur ba ma
[\[288b.6\]]yin no/_/zhes gsungs so/_/sdug bsngal thams cad las kyang [#]rgyal ba thob [#]ste/_'phags pa mya ngan las 'das pa'i mdo las/_sems can thams cad la de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po yod do zhes ston par byed pa'i sems can de dag ni yon tan dpag tu
[\[288b.7\]]med pa dang ldan pa ste/_dam pa'i chos 'dod pa'i rigs kyi bu de dag ni/_sdig pa'i las grangs med pa byas pa rnams/_klad pa na ba dang /_rims kyis btab pa dang /_zug rngu dang /_skur pa btab pa tsam gyis byang bar 'gyur ro zhes gsungs so/_/'phags pa
[\[289a\]]
[\[289a.1\]]ye shes phyag rgya'i mdo las kyang /[#]de'i rgyud la bskal pa mang por bsags pa'i sdig pa'i las kyi sgrib pa yod pa de ni/_klad pan btsam gyis 'byang bar 'gyur ro zhes pa nas/_nam [#]yang tha na rmi lam sdig pa can mthong bas kyang /_las kyi
[\[289a.2\]]sgrib pa de dag kyang 'byang bar 'gyur ro zhes gsungs so/_/slob dpon gyi zhal snga nas kyang /_mthong ba'i chos la mya ngan 'das/_/bya ba byas pa'ang de nyid yin/_/zhes gsungs so/_/sdug bsngal brgya rtsa bcur bshad pa/_/rnal 'byor can la 'byung mi 'gyur/_/'jig rten
[\[289a.3\]]chos kyis mi gos te/_/pad+ma la ni 'dam bzhin no/_/'khor ba'i sdug bsngal kun bral yang /_/'khor ba las kyang 'byung mi byed/_/rang bzhin mya ngan 'das pa nyid/_/mya ngan 'das la gnas mi byed/_/nyon mongs me yis gdungs pa med/_/nyon mongs
[\[289a.4\]]ldan pa lta bur ston/_/sems med sems can [#]ma yin te/_/mnyam gzhag rjes thob med par bsgom/_/phan yon gyi skabs rdzogs so//_//nyams dga' 'tshe ba thams cad bral ba yi/_/shing rta chen po'i lam 'di bshad pa las/_/bsod nams
[\[289a.5\]]bsags pa de yis 'gro ba rnams/_/rkang gnyis dbang po'i gnas su 'gro bar shog_/[#]bka' ma lus pa'i snying po bsdus pa/_de kho na nyid gsal por ston pa dbu ma rin po che'i sgron ma/_bdag dang gzhan thams cad kyi [#]grub pa'i mtha' rgya mtsho lta bu mkhyen pa'i pha
[\[289a.6\]]rol tu phyin pa sku tshe 'di nyid la sku lus de nyid kyis rig 'dzin gyi gnas su gshegs pa'i slob dpon mkhas pa chen po b+ha byas slob dpon 'phags pa klu sgrub kyi gsung bzhin du mdzad pa rdzogs so//_//bla ma rje btsun zangs gling pa dge bsnyen mgon po la/_paN+Di ta
[\[289a.7\]]chen po dI paM ka ra shrI dz+nyA nas bka' drin zhus pa las/_phyis so ma pu ri'i gtsug lag khang du rgya brtson 'grus seng ge dang /_nag tsho tshul khrims rgyal ba gnyis kyis yang dang yang du zhus nas bsgyur cing gtan la phab pa'o//_//[#]
